h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T4.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ ^a^M2.0236^ea^ ^a^P4.0001^ea^ me suta.m. eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``cakkhu.m ^a^V2.0002^ea^, bhikkhave, anicca.m. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. sota.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m...pe0... ghaana.m anicca.m. yadanicca.m...pe0... jivhaa aniccaa. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. kaayo anicco. yadanicca.m...pe0... mano anicco. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya ^a^T4.0002^ea^ da.t.thabba.m. eva.m ^a^P4.0002^ea^ passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati, ghaanasmimpi nibbindati, jivhaayapi nibbindati, kaayasmimpi nibbindati ^a^M2.0237^ea^, manasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m. ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. sota.m dukkha.m...pe0... ghaana.m dukkha.m... jivhaa dukkhaa... kaayo dukkho... mano dukkho. ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, anattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. sota.m anattaa...pe0... ghaana.m anattaa... jivhaa anattaa... kaayo anattaa... mano anattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa ^a^T4.0003^ea^ ^a^V2.0003^ea^, bhikkhave, aniccaa. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi ^a^P4.0003^ea^, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa aniccaa. yadanicca.m ta.m dukkha.m; ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupesupi nibbindati, saddesupi nibbindati, gandhesupi nibbindati, rasesupi nibbindati, pho.t.thabbesupi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa ^a^M2.0238^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkhaa. ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa; yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa dukkhaa. ya.m dukkha.m tadanattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa, bhikkhave, anattaa. yadanattaa ta.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa anattaa. yadanattaa ta.m ^a^T4.0004^ea^ `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m ^a^V2.0004^ea^ ^a^P4.0004^ea^, bhikkhave, anicca.m atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m cakkhusmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m cakkhu.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. sota.m anicca.m... ghaana.m anicca.m... jivhaa aniccaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaaya! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitaaya jivhaaya anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m jivha.m naabhinandati; paccuppannaaya jivhaaya nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. kaayo anicco...pe0... mano anicco atiitaanaagato; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m manasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m mana.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa manassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m ^a^M2.0239^ea^, bhikkhave, dukkha.m atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m cakkhusmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m cakkhu.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. sota.m dukkha.m...pe0... ghaana.m dukkha.m...pe0... jivhaa ^a^T4.0005^ea^ dukkhaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaaya! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitaaya jivhaaya anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m jivha.m naabhinandati; paccuppannaaya jivhaaya nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. kaayo dukkho...pe0... mano dukkho atiitaanaagato; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m manasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m mana.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa manassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m ^a^V2.0005^ea^, bhikkhave, anattaa atiitaanaagata.m; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ^a^P4.0005^ea^ atiitasmi.m cakkhusmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m cakkhu.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. sota.m anattaa...pe0... ghaana.m anattaa...pe0... jivhaa anattaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaaya! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitaaya jivhaaya anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m jivha.m naabhinandati; paccuppannaaya jivhaaya nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. kaayo anattaa...pe0... mano anattaa atiitaanaagato; ko pana vaado paccuppannassa! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitasmi.m manasmi.m anapekkho hoti; anaagata.m mana.m naabhinandati; paccuppannassa manassa nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa ^a^T4.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, aniccaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaana.m! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitesu ruupesu ^a^M2.0240^ea^ anapekkho hoti; anaagate ruupe naabhinandati; paccuppannaana.m ruupaana.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa aniccaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaana.m! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitesu dhammesu anapekkho hoti; anaagate dhamme naabhinandati; paccuppannaana.m dhammaana.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa, bhikkhave, dukkhaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaana.m! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitesu ruupesu anapekkho hoti; anaagate ruupe naabhinandati ^a^V2.0006^ea^; paccuppannaana.m ruupaana.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti...pe0 ^a^P4.0006^ea^.... ekaadasama.m.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa, bhikkhave, anattaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaana.m! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitesu ruupesu anapekkho hoti; anaagate ruupe naabhinandati; paccuppannaana.m ruupaana.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti. saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa anattaa atiitaanaagataa; ko pana vaado paccuppannaana.m! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0007^ea^, sutavaa ariyasaavako atiitesu dhammesu anapekkho hoti; anaagate dhamme naabhinandati; paccuppannaana.m dhammaana.m nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hotii''ti. dvaadasama.m.
[06] aniccavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa ca, tayo ajjhattabaahiraa.
[22] yadaniccena tayo vuttaa, te te ajjhattabaahiraati..

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0241^ea^. ``pubbeva ^a^T4.0008^ea^ me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva ^a^P4.0007^ea^ sato etadahosi -- `ko nu kho cakkhussa assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko sotassa...pe0... ko ghaanassa... ko jivhaaya... ko kaayassa... ko manassa ^a^V2.0007^ea^ assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na'nti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ya.m kho cakkhu.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m cakkhussa assaado. ya.m cakkhu.m anicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, aya.m cakkhussa aadiinavo. yo cakkhusmi.m chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m cakkhussa nissara.na.m. ya.m sota.m...pe0... ya.m ghaana.m...pe0... ya.m jivha.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m jivhaaya assaado. ya.m {yaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} jivhaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m jivhaaya aadiinavo. yo jivhaaya chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m jivhaaya nissara.na.m. ya.m kaaya.m...pe0... ya.m mana.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m manassa assaado. ya.m {yo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} mano anicco dukkho vipari.naamadhammo, aya.m manassa aadiinavo. yo manasmi.m chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m manassa nissara.na'''nti.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m eva.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake ^a^T4.0009^ea^ sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti {sabbatthaapi evameva itisaddena saha dissati} pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m eva.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca ^a^P4.0008^ea^ pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti {cetovimutti (sii0 pii0 ka0) evamuparipi}, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``pubbeva ^a^M2.0242^ea^ me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `ko nu kho ruupaana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na.m? ko saddaana.m...pe0... ko gandhaana.m... ko rasaana.m... ko pho.t.thabbaana.m... ko dhammaana.m assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na'nti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ya.m kho ruupe pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m ruupaana.m assaado. ya.m ruupaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m ruupaana.m aadiinavo. yo ruupesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m ruupaana.m ^a^V2.0008^ea^ nissara.na.m. ya.m sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... ya.m dhamme pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m dhammaana.m assaado. ya.m dhammaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa ^a^T4.0010^ea^, aya.m dhammaana.m aadiinavo. yo dhammesu chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m dhammaana.m nissara.na'''nti.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m eva.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m, neva taavaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. yato ca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m eva.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~naasi.m, athaaha.m, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya `anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhussaaha.m, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo cakkhussa assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa cakkhussa assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. cakkhussaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0009^ea^, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m. yo cakkhussa aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa cakkhussa aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. cakkhussaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m cakkhussa nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa cakkhussa nissara.na.m ^a^T4.0011^ea^, pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m. sotassaaha.m ^a^M2.0243^ea^, bhikkhave... ghaanassaaha.m, bhikkhave... jivhaayaaha.m bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo jivhaaya assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa jivhaaya assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. jivhaayaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m. yo jivhaaya aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa jivhaaya aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. jivhaayaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m jivhaaya nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa jivhaaya nissara.na.m, pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m. manassaaha.m, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo manassa assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa manassa assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. manassaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0009^ea^, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m. yo manassa aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa manassa aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. manassaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m manassa nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa manassa nissara.na.m, pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m...pe0... pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo ruupaana.m assaado ^a^T4.0012^ea^ tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa ruupaana.m assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. ruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinavapariyesana.m ^a^P4.0010^ea^ acari.m. yo ruupaana.m aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa ruupaana.m aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. ruupaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m ruupaana.m nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa ruupaana.m nissara.na.m, pa~n~naaya me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m. saddaanaaha.m, bhikkhave... gandhaanaaha.m, bhikkhave... rasaanaaha.m, bhikkhave... pho.t.thabbaanaaha.m, bhikkhave... dhammaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, assaadapariyesana.m acari.m. yo dhammaana.m assaado tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa dhammaana.m assaado pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. dhammaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinavapariyesana.m acari.m. yo dhammaana.m aadiinavo tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa dhammaana.m aadiinavo pa~n~naaya me so sudi.t.tho. dhammaanaaha.m, bhikkhave, nissara.napariyesana.m acari.m. ya.m dhammaana.m nissara.na.m tadajjhagama.m. yaavataa dhammaana.m nissara.na.m, pa~n~naaya ^a^M2.0244^ea^ me ta.m sudi.t.tha.m.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~ncaaha.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m channa.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~naasi.m...pe0... pacca~n~naasi.m. ~naa.na~nca pana me dassana.m udapaadi -- `akuppaa me vimutti, ayamantimaa jaati, natthi daani punabbhavo'''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``no ^a^V2.0010^ea^ ceda.m, bhikkhave, cakkhussa assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa cakkhusmi.m saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi cakkhussa assaado ^a^T4.0013^ea^ tasmaa sattaa cakkhusmi.m saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, cakkhussa aadiinavo abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa cakkhusmi.m nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi cakkhussa aadiinavo tasmaa sattaa cakkhusmi.m nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, cakkhussa nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa cakkhusmaa nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi cakkhussa nissara.na.m tasmaa sattaa cakkhusmaa nissaranti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, sotassa assaado abhavissa... no ^a^P4.0011^ea^ ceda.m, bhikkhave, ghaanassa assaado abhavissa... no ceda.m, bhikkhave, jivhaaya assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa jivhaaya saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi jivhaaya assaado, tasmaa sattaa jivhaaya saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, jivhaaya aadiinavo abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa jivhaaya nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi jivhaaya aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa jivhaaya nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, jivhaaya nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa jivhaaya nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi jivhaaya nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa jivhaaya nissaranti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, kaayassa assaado abhavissa... no ceda.m, bhikkhave, manassa assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa manasmi.m saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi manassa assaado, tasmaa sattaa manasmi.m saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, manassa aadiinavo abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa manasmi.m nibbindeyyu.m ^a^T4.0014^ea^. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi manassa aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa manasmi.m nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, manassa nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa manasmaa nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi manassa nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa manasmaa nissaranti.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, sattaa imesa.m channa.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m ^a^M2.0245^ea^ assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~na.msu, neva taava, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa~n~nuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena {vipariyaadikatena (sii0 pii0), vipariyaadikatena (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} cetasaa vihari.msu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattaa imesa.m channa.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca ^a^V2.0011^ea^ aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~na.msu ^a^P4.0012^ea^, atha, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa~n~nuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ``no ceda.m, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa ruupesu saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ruupaana.m assaado, tasmaa sattaa ruupesu saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m aadiinavo abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa ruupesu nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ^a^T4.0015^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ruupaana.m aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa ruupesu nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa ruupehi nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ruupaana.m nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa ruupehi nissaranti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, saddaana.m... gandhaana.m... rasaana.m... pho.t.thabbaana.m... dhammaana.m assaado abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa dhammesu saarajjeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi dhammaana.m assaado, tasmaa sattaa dhammesu saarajjanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m aadiinavo abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa dhammesu nibbindeyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi dhammaana.m aadiinavo, tasmaa sattaa dhammesu nibbindanti. no ceda.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m nissara.na.m abhavissa, nayida.m sattaa dhammehi nissareyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi dhammaana.m nissara.na.m, tasmaa sattaa dhammehi nissaranti.

[03] ``yaavakiiva~nca, bhikkhave, sattaa imesa.m channa.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m naabbha~n~na.msu ^a^P4.0013^ea^, neva taava, bhikkhave, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa ^a^M2.0246^ea^ pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa~n~nuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa vihari.msu. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sattaa imesa.m channa.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m assaada~nca assaadato, aadiinava~nca aadiinavato, nissara.na~nca nissara.nato yathaabhuuta.m abbha~n~na.msu, atha, bhikkhave ^a^T4.0016^ea^, sattaa sadevakaa lokaa samaarakaa sabrahmakaa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya nissa.taa visa~n~nuttaa vippamuttaa vimariyaadiikatena cetasaa viharantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^V2.0012^ea^, bhikkhave, cakkhu.m abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo sota.m...pe0... yo ghaana.m...pe0... yo jivha.m abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo kaaya.m...pe0... yo mana.m abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaa''ti vadaami.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhu.m naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo sota.m...pe0... yo ghaana.m...pe0... yo jivha.m naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo kaaya.m...pe0... yo mana.m naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaa''ti vadaami. sattama.m.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupe abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami. yo sadde...pe0... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... dhamme abhinandati, dukkha.m so abhinandati. yo dukkha.m abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmaa''ti vadaami.

[03] ``yo ^a^P4.0014^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupe naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaati vadaami ^a^T3.0017^ea^. yo sadde...pe0... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... dhamme naabhinandati, dukkha.m so naabhinandati. yo dukkha.m naabhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmaa''ti vadaami. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``yo ^a^M2.0247^ea^ ^a^V2.0013^ea^, bhikkhave, cakkhussa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo sotassa...pe0... yo ghaanassa... yo jivhaaya... yo kaayassa... yo manassa uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhussa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo. yo sotassa... yo ghaanassa... yo jivhaaya... yo kaayassa... yo manassa nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. navama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``yo, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo. yo saddaana.m...pe0... yo gandhaana.m... yo rasaana.m... yo pho.t.thabbaana.m... yo dhammaana.m uppaado .thiti abhinibbatti paatubhaavo, dukkhasseso uppaado, rogaana.m .thiti, jaraamara.nassa paatubhaavo.

[03] ``yo ca kho, bhikkhave, ruupaana.m nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo. yo ^a^T4.0018^ea^ saddaana.m...pe0... yo gandhaana.m... yo rasaana.m... yo pho.t.thabbaana.m... yo ^a^P4.0015^ea^ dhammaana.m nirodho vuupasamo attha"ngamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, rogaana.m vuupasamo, jaraamara.nassa attha"ngamo''ti. dasama.m.
[06] yamakavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0248^ea^. ``sabba.m ^a^T4.0019^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. ki~nca, bhikkhave, sabba.m? cakkhu~nceva ruupaa ca, sota~nca {sota~nceva (?) evamitarayugalesupi} saddaa ca, ghaana~nca gandhaa ca, jivhaa ca rasaa ca, kaayo ca pho.t.thabbaa ca, mano ca dhammaa ca -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sabba.m. yo, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `ahameta.m sabba.m paccakkhaaya a~n~na.m sabba.m pa~n~naapessaamii'ti, tassa vaacaavatthukamevassa {vaacaavatthurevassa (sii0 pii0), vaacaavatthudevassa (syaa0 ka.m0)}; pu.t.tho ca na sampaayeyya, uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ``sabbappahaanaaya {sabba.m pahaanaaya (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} vo, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sabbappahaanaaya dhammo? cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, pahaatabba.m, ruupaa pahaatabbaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m pahaatabba.m, cakkhusamphasso pahaatabbo ^a^P4.0016^ea^, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi pahaatabba.m...pe0... yampida.m sotasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi pahaatabba.m... yampida.m ghaanasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi pahaatabba.m. jivhaa pahaatabbaa, rasaa pahaatabbaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m pahaatabba.m, jivhaasamphasso pahaatabbo, yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ^a^V2.0015^ea^ tampi pahaatabba.m. kaayo pahaatabbo... mano pahaatabbo, dhammaa pahaatabbaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T4.0020^ea^ pahaatabba.m, manosamphasso pahaatabbo, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi pahaatabba.m. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, sabbappahaanaaya dhammo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``sabba.m abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaanaaya vo, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, sabba.m abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaanaaya dhammo? cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m, ruupaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbaa ^a^M2.0249^ea^, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m, cakkhusamphasso abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbo, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m...pe0... jivhaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbaa, rasaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m, jivhaasamphasso abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbo, yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m. kaayo abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbo... mano abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbo, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa ^a^P4.0017^ea^ pahaatabbaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m, manosamphasso abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabbo, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ^a^T4.0021^ea^ tampi abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaatabba.m. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, sabba.m abhi~n~naa pari~n~naa pahaanaaya dhammo''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ``sabba.m ^a^V2.0016^ea^, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ki~nca, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya? cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ruupe anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. cakkhusamphassa.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya...pe0... jivha.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. rase...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... jivhaasamphassa.m...pe0... yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. kaaya.m...pe0... mana.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. dhamme...pe0... manovi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... manosamphassa.m...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m ^a^M2.0250^ea^ appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, sabba.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya.

[01] ``sabba~nca kho, bhikkhave, abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo ^a^T4.0022^ea^ dukkhakkhayaaya. ki~nca ^a^P4.0018^ea^, bhikkhave, sabba.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya? cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ruupe abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. cakkhusamphassa.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya...pe0... ^a^V2.0017^ea^ jivha.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. rase...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... jivhaasamphassa.m...pe0... yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. kaaya.m...pe0... mana.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. dhamme...pe0... manovi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... manosamphassa.m...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, sabba.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``sabba.m ^a^M2.0251^ea^, bhikkhave, anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ki~nca, bhikkhave, sabba.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya? ya~nca, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0018^ea^, cakkhu, ye ^a^T4.0023^ea^ ca ruupaa, ya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa...pe0... yaa ^a^P4.0019^ea^ ca jivhaa, ye ca rasaa, ya~nca jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa; yo ca kaayo, ye ca pho.t.thabbaa, ya~nca kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca kaayavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa; yo ca mano, ye ca dhammaa, ya~nca manovi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, sabba.m anabhijaana.m aparijaana.m aviraajaya.m appajaha.m abhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] ``sabba.m, bhikkhave, abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya. ki~nca, bhikkhave, sabba.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaaya? ya~nca, bhikkhave, cakkhu, ye ca ruupaa, ya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa...pe0... yaa ca jivhaa, ye ca rasaa, ya~nca jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa; yo ca kaayo, ye ca pho.t.thabbaa, ya~nca kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca kaayavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa; yo ca mano, ye ca dhammaa, ya~nca manovi~n~naa.na.m, ye ca manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa -- ida.m kho, bhikkhave, sabba.m abhijaana.m parijaana.m viraajaya.m pajaha.m bhabbo dukkhakkhayaayaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa gayaaya.m viharati gayaasiise saddhi.m bhikkhusahassena. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sabba.m, bhikkhave, aaditta.m. ki~nca, bhikkhave, sabba.m aaditta.m? cakkhu {cakkhu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, aaditta.m, ruupaa aadittaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, cakkhusamphasso aaditto. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m ^a^T4.0024^ea^ sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? `raagagginaa, dosagginaa, mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aaditta'nti vadaami...pe0... jivhaa aadittaa, rasaa aadittaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, jivhaasamphasso aaditto ^a^P4.0020^ea^. yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? `raagagginaa, dosagginaa, mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aaditta'nti vadaami...pe0... mano aaditto, dhammaa aadittaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m aaditta.m, manosamphasso aaditto. yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aaditta.m. kena aaditta.m? `raagagginaa, dosagginaa, mohagginaa aaditta.m, jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi aaditta'nti vadaami. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ^a^M2.0252^ea^ vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati ^a^V2.0019^ea^ ...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa ^a^T4.0025^ea^ vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandu.m. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupaadaaya aasavehi cittaani vimucci.msuuti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``sabba.m, bhikkhave, addhabhuuta.m {andhabhuuta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. ki~nca ^a^P4.0021^ea^, bhikkhave, sabba.m addhabhuuta.m? cakkhu, bhikkhave, addhabhuuta.m, ruupaa addhabhuutaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m addhabhuuta.m, cakkhusamphasso addhabhuuto, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi addhabhuuta.m. kena addhabhuuta.m? `jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi addhabhuuta'nti vadaami...pe0... jivhaa addhabhuutaa, rasaa addhabhuutaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m addhabhuuta.m, jivhaasamphasso addhabhuuto, yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi addhabhuuta.m. kena addhabhuuta.m? `jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi addhabhuuta'nti vadaami. kaayo addhabhuuto...pe0... mano addhabhuuto, dhammaa addhabhuutaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m addhabhuuta.m, manosamphasso addhabhuuto, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa ^a^T4.0026^ea^ tampi addhabhuuta.m. kena addhabhuuta.m? `jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi addhabhuuta'nti vadaami. eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati...pe0... ^a^V2.0020^ea^ yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati ^a^M2.0253^ea^, viraagaa vimuccati, vimuttasmi.m `vimutta'miti ~naa.na.m hoti, `khii.naa jaati vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] ``santi kho, migajaala, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ^a^M2.0264^ea^ ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii {nandi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. nandiyaa sati saaraago hoti; saaraage sati sa.myogo hoti. nandisa.myojanasa.myutto kho, migajaala, bhikkhu sadutiyavihaariiti vuccati. santi...pe0... santi kho, migajaala, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati ^a^V2.0040^ea^ nandii. nandiyaa sati saaraago hoti; saaraage sati sa.myogo hoti. nandisa.myojanasa.myutto kho, migajaala, bhikkhu sadutiyavihaariiti vuccati. eva.mvihaarii ca, migajaala, bhikkhu ki~ncaapi ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati ^a^T4.0044^ea^ appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani {manussaraahaseyyakaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani; atha kho sadutiyavihaariiti vuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? ta.nhaa hissa dutiyaa, saassa appahiinaa. tasmaa sadutiyavihaarii''ti vuccati.

[01] ``santi ca kho, migajaala, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nandii nirujjhati. nandiyaa asati saaraago na hoti; saaraage asati sa.myogo ^a^P4.0037^ea^ na hoti. nandisa.myojanavisa.myutto kho, migajaala, bhikkhu ekavihaariiti vuccati...pe0... santi ca kho, migajaala, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi ca kho, migajaala, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nandii nirujjhati. nandiyaa asati saaraago na hoti; saaraage asati sa.myogo na hoti. nandisa.myojanavippayutto kho, migajaala, bhikkhu ekavihaariiti vuccati. eva.mvihaarii ca, migajaala, bhikkhu ki~ncaapi gaamante viharati aaki.n.no bhikkhuuhi bhikkhuniihi upaasakehi upaasikaahi raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi ^a^T4.0045^ea^. atha kho ekavihaariiti vuccati. ta.m kissa hetu? ta.nhaa hissa dutiyaa, saassa pahiinaa. tasmaa ekavihaariiti vuccatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0265^ea^ kho aayasmaa migajaalo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa migajaalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.

[03] ``santi ^a^V2.0041^ea^ kho, migajaala, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii. nandisamudayaa dukkhasamudayo, migajaalaati vadaami...pe0... santi ca kho, migajaala, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi ca kho, migajaala, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii ^a^P4.0038^ea^. nandisamudayaa dukkhasamudayo, migajaalaati vadaami.

[03] ``santi ca kho, migajaala, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ^a^T4.0046^ea^ ti.t.thato nandii nirujjhati. nandinirodhaa dukkhanirodho, migajaalaati vadaami...pe0... santi ca kho, migajaala, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa i.t.thaa kantaa...pe0... santi ca kho, migajaala, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nandii nirujjhati. nandinirodhaa dukkhanirodho, migajaalaati vadaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa migajaalo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa migajaalo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharato nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva ^a^M2.0266^ea^ dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa migajaalo arahata.m ahosiiti. dutiya.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0042^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho aayasmaa samiddhi yena bhagavaa...pe0... bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```maaro, maaro'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, maaro vaa assa maarapa~n~natti vaa''ti?

[03] ``yattha kho, samiddhi, atthi ^a^T4.0047^ea^ cakkhu, atthi ruupaa, atthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P4.0039^ea^, atthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. atthi sota.m, atthi saddaa, atthi sotavi~n~naa.na.m, atthi sotavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. atthi ghaana.m, atthi gandhaa, atthi ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, atthi ghaanavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. atthi jivhaa, atthi rasaa, atthi jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, atthi jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. atthi kaayo, atthi pho.t.thabbaa, atthi kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, atthi kaayavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. atthi mano, atthi dhammaa, atthi manovi~n~naa.na.m, atthi manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa.

[03] ``yattha ca kho, samiddhi, natthi cakkhu, natthi ruupaa, natthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, natthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, natthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. natthi sota.m...pe0... natthi ghaana.m...pe0... natthi jivhaa, natthi rasaa, natthi jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, natthi jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, natthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa. natthi kaayo...pe0.... natthi mano, natthi dhammaa, natthi manovi~n~naa.na.m, natthi manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, natthi tattha maaro vaa maarapa~n~natti vaa''ti. tatiya.m.
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ```satto ^a^T4.0048^ea^, satto'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, satto vaa assa sattapa~n~natti vaa''ti...pe0.... catuttha.m.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ```dukkha.m ^a^M2.0267^ea^ ^a^V2.0043^ea^, dukkha'nti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dukkha.m vaa assa dukkhapa~n~natti vaa''ti...pe0.... pa~ncama.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ```loko, loko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, loko vaa assa lokapa~n~natti vaa''ti? yattha kho, samiddhi, atthi cakkhu, atthi ruupaa, atthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, atthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha loko vaa lokapa~n~natti vaati...pe0... atthi jivhaa...pe0... atthi ^a^P4.0040^ea^ mano, atthi dhammaa, atthi manovi~n~naa.na.m, atthi manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, atthi tattha loko vaa lokapa~n~natti vaa.

[03] ``yattha ca kho, samiddhi, natthi cakkhu, natthi ruupaa, natthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, natthi cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, natthi tattha loko vaa lokapa~n~natti vaa...pe0... natthi jivhaa...pe0... natthi mano, natthi dhammaa, natthi manovi~n~naa.na.m, natthi manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbaa dhammaa, natthi tattha loko vaa lokapa~n~natti vaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca upaseno raajagahe viharanti siitavane sappaso.n.dikapabbhaare. tena kho pana samayena aayasmato upasenassa kaaye aasiiviso patito ^a^T4.0049^ea^ hoti. atha kho aayasmaa upaseno bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``etha me, aavuso, ima.m kaaya.m ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa bahiddhaa niiharatha. puraaya.m kaayo idheva vikirati; seyyathaapi bhusamu.t.thii''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V2.0044^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m upasena.m etadavoca -- ``na kho pana maya.m passaama aayasmato upasenassa kaayassa vaa a~n~nathatta.m indriyaana.m vaa vipari.naama.m. atha ca panaayasmaa upaseno evamaaha -- `etha me, aavuso, ima.m kaaya.m ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa bahiddhaa niiharatha. puraaya.m kaayo idheva vikirati; seyyathaapi bhusamu.t.thii'''ti. ``yassa nuuna, aavuso saariputta, evamassa -- `aha.m cakkhuuti vaa mama cakkhuuti vaa...pe0... aha.m jivhaati vaa mama ^a^M2.0268^ea^ jivhaati vaa... aha.m manoti vaa mama manoti vaa'. tassa, aavuso saariputta, siyaa kaayassa vaa a~n~nathatta.m indriyaana.m vaa vipari.naamo. mayha~nca kho, aavuso saariputta, na eva.m hoti ^a^P4.0041^ea^ -- `aha.m cakkhuuti vaa mama cakkhuuti vaa...pe0... aha.m jivhaati vaa mama jivhaati vaa...pe0... aha.m manoti vaa mama manoti vaa'. tassa mayha~nca kho, aavuso saariputta, ki.m kaayassa vaa a~n~nathatta.m bhavissati, indriyaana.m vaa vipari.naamo''ti!

[03] ``tathaa hi panaayasmato upasenassa diigharatta.m aha"nkaaramama"nkaaramaanaanusayo susamuuhato. tasmaa aayasmato upasenassa na eva.m hoti -- `aha.m cakkhuuti vaa mama cakkhuuti vaa...pe0... aha.m jivhaati vaa mama jivhaati vaa...pe0... aha.m manoti vaa mama manoti vaa'''ti. atha ^a^T4.0050^ea^ kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato upasenassa kaaya.m ma~ncaka.m aaropetvaa bahiddhaa niihari.msu. atha kho aayasmato upasenassa kaayo tattheva vikiri; seyyathaapi bhusamu.t.thiiti. sattama.m.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa upavaa.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa upavaa.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```sandi.t.thiko dhammo, sandi.t.thiko dhammo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti, akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti?

[03] ``idha pana, upavaa.na, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa ruupappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti ruuparaagappa.tisa.mvedii ca. santa~nca ajjhatta.m ruupesu raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m ruupesu raago'ti pajaanaati. ya.m ta.m, upavaa.na, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa ruupappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti ruuparaagappa.tisa.mvedii ^a^V2.0045^ea^ ca. santa~nca ajjhatta.m ruupesu raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m ruupesu raago'ti pajaanaati. evampi kho, upavaa.na, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti...pe0....

[03] ``puna ^a^P4.0042^ea^ capara.m, upavaa.na, bhikkhu jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa rasappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti rasaraagappa.tisa.mvedii ca. santa~nca ajjhatta.m rasesu raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m rasesu raago'ti pajaanaati. ya.m ta.m, upavaa.na, bhikkhu jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa rasappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti rasaraagappa.tisa.mvedii ^a^T4.0051^ea^ ca. santa~nca ajjhatta.m rasesu ^a^M2.0269^ea^ raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m rasesu raago'ti pajaanaati. evampi kho, upavaa.na, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti...pe0....

[03] ``puna capara.m, upavaa.na, bhikkhu manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammaraagappa.tisa.mvedii ca. santa~nca ajjhatta.m dhammesu raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m dhammesu raago'ti pajaanaati. ya.m ta.m, upavaa.na, bhikkhu manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya dhammappa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammaraagappa.tisa.mvedii ca. santa~nca ajjhatta.m dhammesu raaga.m `atthi me ajjhatta.m dhammesu raago'ti pajaanaati. evampi kho, upavaa.na, sandi.t.thiko dhammo hoti...pe0... paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii''ti...pe0....

[03] ``taggha tumhe, bhikkhave, eva.m pu.t.thaa eva.m byaakaramaanaa vuttavaadino ceva me hotha, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhatha, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakarotha, na ca ^a^T4.0064^ea^ koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati. dukkhassa hi, bhikkhave, pari~n~nattha.m mayi brahmacariya.m vussati. sace pana vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katama.m pana ta.m, aavuso, dukkha.m, yassa pari~n~naaya sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `cakkhu kho, aavuso, dukkha.m, tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. ruupaa...pe0... yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi dukkha.m. tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati...pe0... mano dukkho...pe0... yampida.m ^a^M2.0278^ea^ manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi dukkha.m. tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. ida.m kho ta.m, aavuso, dukkha.m, tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti. eva.m ^a^P4.0052^ea^ pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.
[03] 82^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0058^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```loko, loko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccatii''ti? ```lujjatii'ti kho, bhikkhu, tasmaa lokoti vuccati. ki~nca lujjati? cakkhu kho, bhikkhu, lujjati. ruupaa lujjanti, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m lujjati, cakkhusamphasso lujjati ^a^T4.0065^ea^, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi lujjati...pe0... jivhaa lujjati...pe0... mano lujjati, dhammaa lujjanti, manovi~n~naa.na.m lujjati, manosamphasso lujjati, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi lujjati. lujjatiiti kho, bhikkhu, tasmaa lokoti vuccatii''ti. navama.m.
[03] 83^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa phagguno...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa phagguno bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``atthi nu kho, bhante, ta.m cakkhu, yena cakkhunaa atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitiva.t.te pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya...pe0... atthi nu kho, bhante, saa jivhaa, yaaya jivhaaya atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitiva.t.te pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya...pe0... atthi nu kho so, bhante, mano, yena manena atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitiva.t.te pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyyaa''ti?

[03] ``natthi kho ta.m, phagguna, cakkhu, yena cakkhunaa atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitiva.t.te pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya ^a^M2.0279^ea^ ...pe0... natthi kho saa ^a^V2.0059^ea^, phagguna, jivhaa, yaaya jivhaaya atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitiva.t.te pa~n~naapayamaano ^a^T4.0066^ea^ pa~n~naapeyya...pe0... natthi ^a^P4.0053^ea^ kho so, phagguna, mano, yena manena atiite buddhe parinibbute chinnapapa~nce chinnava.tume pariyaadinnava.t.te sabbadukkhaviitiva.t.te pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyyaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] gilaanavaggo a.t.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] gilaanena duve vuttaa, raadhena apare tayo.
[22] avijjaaya ca dve vuttaa, bhikkhu loko ca phaggunoti..
[03] 84^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m. atha ^a^T4.0067^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```loko, loko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccatii''ti? ``ya.m kho, aananda, palokadhamma.m, aya.m vuccati ariyassa vinaye loko. ki~nca, aananda, palokadhamma.m? cakkhu kho, aananda, palokadhamma.m, ruupaa palokadhammaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m palokadhamma.m, cakkhusamphasso palokadhammo, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa...pe0... tampi palokadhamma.m...pe0... jivhaa palokadhammaa, rasaa palokadhammaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m palokadhamma.m, jivhaasamphasso palokadhammo, yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... tampi palokadhamma.m...pe0... ^a^V2.0060^ea^ mano palokadhammo, dhammaa palokadhammaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m palokadhamma.m, manosamphasso palokadhammo, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi palokadhamma.m. ya.m kho, aananda, palokadhamma.m, aya.m vuccati ariyassa vinaye loko''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0280^ea^ ^a^P4.0054^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando...pe0... bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```su~n~no loko, su~n~no loko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, su~n~no lokoti vuccatii''ti? ``yasmaa ca kho, aananda, su~n~na.m ^a^T4.0068^ea^ attena vaa attaniyena vaa tasmaa su~n~no lokoti vuccati. ki~nca, aananda, su~n~na.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa? cakkhu kho, aananda, su~n~na.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa. ruupaa su~n~naa attena vaa attaniyena vaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m su~n~na.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa, cakkhusamphasso su~n~no attena vaa attaniyena vaa...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi su~n~na.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa. yasmaa ca kho, aananda, su~n~na.m attena vaa attaniyena vaa, tasmaa su~n~no lokoti vuccatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, aananda, cakkhu nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?

[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?

[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti?

[01] ``cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m ^a^P4.0055^ea^ vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m ^a^T4.0069^ea^ vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso ^a^M2.0281^ea^ me attaa'''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''...pe0....

[03] ``anicca.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m ^a^V2.0062^ea^ panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''...pe0....

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, aananda, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati...pe0... cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaacundo aayasmaa ca channo gijjhakuu.te pabbate viharanti. tena kho pana samayena yena aayasmaa channo aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano ^a^T4.0070^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa ^a^P4.0056^ea^ vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaacundo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaacunda.m etadavoca -- ``aayaamaavuso cunda, yenaayasmaa channo tenupasa"nkamissaama gilaanapucchakaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho aayasmaa mahaacundo aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaacundo yenaayasmaa channo tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.msu. nisajja kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m channa.m etadavoca -- ``kacci te, aavuso channa, khamaniiya.m, kacci yaapaniiya.m, kacci dukkhaa vedanaa pa.tikkamanti no abhikkamanti, pa.tikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no abhikkamo''ti?

[03] ``na ^a^V2.0063^ea^ me, aavuso saariputta, khamaniiya.m na yaapaniiya.m, baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti no pa.tikkamanti, abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, aavuso, balavaa puriso ti.nhena sikharena {khaggena (ka0)} muddhani {muddhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} abhimattheyya {abhimantheyya (sii0)}; evameva kho, aavuso, adhimattaa vaataa muddhani {muddhaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} uuhananti {upahananti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0), uhananti (ka0)}. na me, aavuso, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m...pe0... no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0282^ea^, aavuso, balavaa puriso da.lhena varattakkha.n.dena siise siisave.tha.m dadeyya; evameva kho, aavuso, adhimattaa siise siisavedanaa. na me, aavuso, khamaniiya.m ^a^T4.0071^ea^, na yaapaniiya.m...pe0... no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, aavuso, dakkho goghaatako vaa goghaatakantevaasii vaa ti.nhena govikantanena kucchi.m parikanteyya; evameva kho adhimattaa vaataa kucchi.m parikantanti. na me, aavuso, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m...pe0... no pa.tikkamo. seyyathaapi, aavuso, dve balavanto purisaa dubbalatara.m purisa.m naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa a"ngaarakaasuyaa santaapeyyu.m ^a^P4.0057^ea^ samparitaapeyyu.m; evameva kho, aavuso, adhimatto kaayasmi.m .daaho. na me, aavuso, khamaniiya.m, na yaapaniiya.m, baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti no pa.tikkamanti, abhikkamosaana.m pa~n~naayati no pa.tikkamo. sattha.m, aavuso saariputta, aaharissaami, naavaka"nkhaami {naapi ka"nkhaami (ka0)} jiivita''nti.

[03] ``maa aayasmaa channo sattha.m aaharesi. yaapetaayasmaa channo, yaapenta.m maya.m aayasmanta.m channa.m icchaama. sace aayasmato channassa natthi sappaayaani bhojanaani, aha.m aayasmato channassa sappaayaani bhojanaani pariyesissaami. sace aayasmato channassa natthi sappaayaani bhesajjaani, aha.m aayasmato channassa sappaayaani bhesajjaani pariyesissaami. sace aayasmato channassa natthi patiruupaa upa.t.thaakaa, aha.m aayasmanta.m channa.m upa.t.thahissaami. maa aayasmaa channo sattha.m aaharesi. yaapetaayasmaa channo, yaapenta.m maya.m aayasmanta.m channa.m icchaamaa''ti.

[03] ``na me, aavuso saariputta, natthi sappaayaani bhojanaani; atthi me sappaayaani ^a^T4.0072^ea^ bhojanaani. napi me natthi sappaayaani bhesajjaani; atthi me sappaayaani bhesajjaani. napi me natthi patiruupaa upa.t.thaakaa; atthi me patiruupaa upa.t.thaakaa. api ca me, aavuso, satthaa parici.n.no diigharatta.m manaapeneva, no amanaapena. eta~nhi, aavuso, saavakassa patiruupa.m ya.m satthaara.m ^a^V2.0064^ea^ paricareyya manaapeneva, no amanaapena. `anupavajja.m {ta.m anupavajja.m (bahuusu)} channo bhikkhu sattha.m aaharissatii'ti -- evameta.m, aavuso saariputta, dhaarehii''ti.

[03] ``puccheyyaama ^a^M2.0283^ea^ maya.m aayasmanta.m channa.m ka~ncideva {ki~ncideva (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} desa.m, sace aayasmaa channo okaasa.m karoti pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naayaa''ti. ``pucchaavuso ^a^P4.0058^ea^ saariputta, sutvaa vedissaamaa''ti.

[03] ``cakkhu.m, aavuso channa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassasi...pe0... jivha.m, aavuso channa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassasi...pe0... mana.m, aavuso channa, manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'ti samanupassasii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhu.m, aavuso saariputta, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaami...pe0... jivha.m, aavuso saariputta, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m ^a^T4.0073^ea^ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaami...pe0... mana.m, aavuso saariputta, manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] ``cakkhusmi.m, aavuso channa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu ki.m disvaa ki.m abhi~n~naaya cakkhu.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassasi... jivhaaya, aavuso channa, jivhaavi~n~naa.ne jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu ki.m disvaa ki.m abhi~n~naaya jivha.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassasi... manasmi.m, aavuso channa, manovi~n~naa.ne manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu ki.m disvaa ki.m abhi~n~naaya mana.m manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassasii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhusmi.m ^a^V2.0065^ea^, aavuso saariputta, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu nirodha.m disvaa nirodha.m abhi~n~naaya cakkhu.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti ^a^M2.0284^ea^ samanupassaami...pe0... jivhaaya, aavuso saariputta, jivhaavi~n~naa.ne jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu nirodha.m disvaa nirodha.m abhi~n~naaya jivha.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe ^a^P4.0059^ea^ dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti ^a^T4.0074^ea^ samanupassaami...pe0... manasmi.m, aavuso saariputta, manovi~n~naa.ne manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu nirodha.m disvaa nirodha.m abhi~n~naaya mana.m manovi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.navi~n~naatabbe dhamme `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti samanupassaamii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, aayasmaa mahaacundo aayasmanta.m channa.m etadavoca -- ``tasmaatiha, aavuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato saasana.m niccakappa.m saadhuka.m manasi kaatabba.m -- `nissitassa calita.m, anissitassa calita.m natthi. calite asati passaddhi hoti. passaddhiyaa sati nati na hoti. natiyaa asati aagatigati na hoti. aagatigatiyaa asati cutuupapaato na hoti. cutuupapaate asati nevidha na hura.m na ubhayamantarena. esevanto dukkhassaa'''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ca saariputto aayasmaa ca mahaacundo aayasmanta.m channa.m iminaa ovaadena ovaditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu. atha kho aayasmaa channo acirapakkantesu tesu aayasmantesu sattha.m aaharesi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aayasmataa, bhante, channena sattha.m aaharita.m. tassa kaa gati ko abhisamparaayo''ti? ``nanu te, saariputta, channena bhikkhunaa sammukhaayeva anupavajjataa byaakataa''ti ^a^T4.0075^ea^? ``atthi, bhante, pubbavijjana.m {pubbavicira.m (sii0), pubbavijjhana.m (pii0), pubbajira.m (ma0 ni0 3.394} naama vajjigaamo. tatthaayasmato channassa mittakulaani suhajjakulaani upavajjakulaanii''ti. ``honti hete, saariputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulaani suhajjakulaani upavajjakulaani. na kho panaaha.m, saariputta ^a^P4.0060^ea^, ettaavataa saupavajjoti vadaami. yo kho, saariputta, ta~nca kaaya.m nikkhipati, a~n~na~nca kaaya.m ^a^V2.0066^ea^ upaadiyati, tamaha.m saupavajjoti vadaami. ta.m channassa bhikkhuno natthi. `anupavajja.m channena bhikkhunaa sattha.m aaharita'nti -- evameta.m, saariputta, dhaarehii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0285^ea^ {saavatthinidaana.m. atha (?) ma0 ni0 3.395 passitabba.m} kho aayasmaa pu.n.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa pu.n.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.

[03] ``santi kho, pu.n.na, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii. `nandisamudayaa dukkhasamudayo, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami...pe0... santi kho, pu.n.na, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi kho, pu.n.na, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce ^a^T4.0076^ea^ bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato uppajjati nandii. `nandisamudayaa dukkhasamudayo, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``santi kho, pu.n.na, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nirujjhati nandii. `nandinirodhaa dukkhanirodho, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami...pe0... santi kho, pu.n.na, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu ^a^P4.0061^ea^ naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato nirujjhati nandii. `nandinirodhaa dukkhanirodho, pu.n.naa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``iminaa ^a^V2.0067^ea^ tva.m {iminaa ca tva.m}, pu.n.na, mayaa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito katamasmi.m {katarasmi.m (ma0 ni0 3.395)} janapade viharissasii''ti? ``atthi, bhante, sunaaparanto naama janapado, tatthaaha.m viharissaamii''ti.

[03] ``ca.n.daa ^a^T4.0077^ea^ kho, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa; pharusaa kho, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa. sace ta.m, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa akkosissanti paribhaasissanti, tatra te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``sace ma.m, bhante, sunaaparantakaa ^a^M2.0286^ea^ manussaa akkosissanti paribhaasissanti, tatra me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me {ma.m (sabbattha)} nayime paa.ninaa pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha {evammettha (?)}, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.
[03] ``sace pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa paa.ninaa pahaara.m dassanti, tatra pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa paa.ninaa pahaara.m ^a^T4.0078^ea^ dassanti, tatra me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me {evammettha (?)} nayime le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.
[03] ``sace pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dassanti, tatra pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa le.d.dunaa pahaara.m dassanti, tatra me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me nayime da.n.dena pahaara.m dentii'ti ^a^P4.0062^ea^. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.
