[03] ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa da.n.dena pahaara.m dassanti, tatra me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m me nayime satthena pahaara.m dentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.
[03] ``sace pana te, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa satthena pahaara.m dassanti, tatra pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``sace me, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa satthena pahaara.m dassanti, tatra me eva.m bhavissati -- `bhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, subhaddakaa vatime sunaaparantakaa manussaa, ya.m ma.m nayime ^a^T4.0079^ea^ ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropentii'ti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.
[03] ``sace ^a^M2.0287^ea^ pana ta.m, pu.n.na, sunaaparantakaa manussaa ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropessanti, tatra pana te, pu.n.na, kinti bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``sace ma.m, bhante, sunaaparantakaa manussaa ti.nhena satthena jiivitaa voropessanti, tatra me eva.m bhavissati -- `santi kho tassa bhagavato saavakaa kaayena ca jiivitena ca a.t.tiiyamaanaa haraayamaanaa jigucchamaanaa satthahaaraka.m pariyesanti, ta.m me ida.m apariyi.t.tha~n~neva satthahaaraka.m laddha'nti. evamettha, bhagavaa, bhavissati; evamettha, sugata, bhavissatii''ti.
[03] ``saadhu saadhu, pu.n.na! sakkhissasi kho tva.m, pu.n.na, iminaa damuupasamena samannaagato sunaaparantasmi.m janapade vatthu.m. yassa daani tva.m, pu.n.na, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no bhagavato vacana.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m ^a^V2.0069^ea^ abhivaadetvaa ^a^P4.0063^ea^ padakkhi.na.m katvaa senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena sunaaparanto janapado tena caarika.m pakkaami. anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena sunaaparanto janapado tadavasari. tatra suda.m aayasmaa pu.n.no sunaaparantasmi.m janapade viharati. atha kho aayasmaa pu.n.no tenevantaravassena pa~ncamattaani upaasakasataani pa.tivedesi {pa.tipaadesi (sii0 pii0), pa.tidesesi (syaa0 ka.m0)}. tenevantaravassena pa~ncamattaani upaasikaasataani pa.tivedesi. tenevantaravassena tisso vijjaa ^a^T4.0080^ea^ sacchaakaasi. tenevantaravassena parinibbaayi.

[03] atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, bhante, pu.n.no naama kulaputto bhagavataa sa.mkhittena ovaadena ovadito, so kaala"nkato. tassa kaa gati ko abhisamparaayo''ti?

[03] ``pa.n.dito, bhikkhave, pu.n.no kulaputto {kulaputto ahosi (sabbattha)}, paccapaadi {saccavaadii (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} dhammassaanudhamma.m, na ca ma.m dhammaadhikara.na.m vihesesi {vihe.thesi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. parinibbuto, bhikkhave, pu.n.no kulaputto''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0288^ea^ kho aayasmaa baahiyo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa baahiyo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.
[01] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, baahiya, cakkhu nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti?
[03] ``no ^a^V2.0070^ea^ ^a^P4.0064^ea^ heta.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti?

[03] ``aniccaa, bhante''...pe0... cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... cakkhusamphasso...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ^a^T4.0081^ea^ ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, baahiya, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa baahiyo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa baahiyo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m ^a^V2.0071^ea^, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa baahiyo arahata.m ahosiiti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ``ejaa ^a^M2.0289^ea^, bhikkhave, rogo, ejaa ga.n.do, ejaa salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tathaagato anejo viharati viitasallo. tasmaatiha ^a^P4.0065^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi aaka"nkheyya `anejo vihareyya.m {vihareyya (sii0 pii0 ka0)} viitasallo'ti, cakkhu.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhusmi.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhuto na ma~n~neyya, cakkhu ^a^T4.0082^ea^ meti na ma~n~neyya; ruupe na ma~n~neyya, ruupesu na ma~n~neyya, ruupato na ma~n~neyya, ruupaa meti na ma~n~neyya; cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasmi.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nato na ma~n~neyya, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m meti na ma~n~neyya; cakkhusamphassa.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhusamphassasmi.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhusamphassato na ma~n~neyya, cakkhusamphasso meti na ma~n~neyya. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya.

[03] ``sota.m na ma~n~neyya...pe0... ghaana.m na ma~n~neyya...pe0... jivha.m na ma~n~neyya, jivhaaya na ma~n~neyya, jivhaato na ma~n~neyya, jivhaa meti na ma~n~neyya; rase na ma~n~neyya...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m na ma~n~neyya...pe0... jivhaasamphassa.m na ma~n~neyya...pe0... yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya.

[03] ``kaaya.m na ma~n~neyya...pe0... mana.m na ma~n~neyya, manasmi.m na ma~n~neyya, manato na ma~n~neyya, mano meti na ma~n~neyya; dhamme na ma~n~neyya...pe0... mano vi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... manosamphassa.m...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya; sabba.m na ma~n~neyya, sabbasmi.m ^a^T4.0083^ea^ na ma~n~neyya, sabbato na ma~n~neyya, sabba.m meti na ma~n~neyya.

[03] ``so ^a^V2.0072^ea^ eva.m ama~n~namaano na ki~ncipi loke upaadiyati. anupaadiya.m na paritassati. aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati ^a^P4.0066^ea^. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ ``ejaa ^a^M2.0290^ea^, bhikkhave, rogo, ejaa ga.n.do, ejaa salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, tathaagato anejo viharati viitasallo. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cepi aaka"nkheyya `anejo vihareyya.m viitasallo'ti, cakkhu.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhusmi.m na ma~n~neyya, cakkhuto na ma~n~neyya, cakkhu meti na ma~n~neyya; ruupe na ma~n~neyya... cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m... cakkhusamphassa.m... yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya. ya~nhi, bhikkhave, ma~n~nati, yasmi.m ma~n~nati, yato ma~n~nati, ya.m meti ma~n~nati, tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa. a~n~nathaabhaavii bhavasatto loko bhavameva abhinandati...pe0....

[03] ``jivha.m na ma~n~neyya, jivhaaya na ma~n~neyya, jivhaato na ma~n~neyya, jivhaa meti na ma~n~neyya; rase na ma~n~neyya... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m... jivhaasamphassa.m... yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya. ya~nhi, bhikkhave, ma~n~nati, yasmi.m ma~n~nati, yato ma~n~nati, ya.m meti ma~n~nati, tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa. a~n~nathaabhaavii bhavasatto loko bhavameva abhinandati...pe0....

[03] ``mana.m na ma~n~neyya, manasmi.m na ma~n~neyya, manato na ma~n~neyya, mano meti na ma~n~neyya... manovi~n~naa.na.m... manosamphassa.m... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi ^a^T4.0084^ea^ na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya. ya~nhi, bhikkhave, ma~n~nati, yasmi.m ma~n~nati ^a^V2.0073^ea^, yato ^a^P4.0067^ea^ ma~n~nati, ya.m meti ma~n~nati, tato ta.m hoti a~n~nathaa. a~n~nathaabhaavii bhavasatto loko bhavameva abhinandati.

[03] ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, khandhadhaatuaayatanaa tampi na ma~n~neyya, tasmimpi na ma~n~neyya, tatopi na ma~n~neyya, ta.m meti na ma~n~neyya. so eva.m ama~n~namaano na ki~nci loke upaadiyati. anupaadiya.m na paritassati. aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ``dvaya.m ^a^M2.0291^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. ki~nca, bhikkhave, dvaya.m? cakkhu~nceva ruupaa ca, sota~nceva saddaa ca, ghaana~nceva gandhaa ca, jivhaa ceva rasaa ca, kaayo ceva pho.t.thabbaa ca ^a^T4.0085^ea^, mano ceva dhammaa ca -- ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dvaya.m.

[03] ``yo, bhikkhave, eva.m vadeyya -- `ahameta.m dvaya.m paccakkhaaya a~n~na.m dvaya.m pa~n~napessaamii'ti, tassa vaacaavatthukamevassa. pu.t.tho ca na sampaayeyya. uttari~nca vighaata.m aapajjeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? yathaa ta.m, bhikkhave, avisayasmi''nti. navama.m.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ``dvaya.m, bhikkhave, pa.ticca vi~n~naa.na.m sambhoti. katha~nca, bhikkhave, dvaya.m pa.ticca vi~n~naa.na.m sambhoti? cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m. cakkhu anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. ruupaa ^a^P4.0068^ea^ aniccaa vipari.naamino a~n~nathaabhaavino. ittheta.m dvaya.m cala~nceva byatha~nca anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. anicca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca uppanna.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m kuto nicca.m bhavissati! yaa kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m sa"ngati sannipaato samavaayo, aya.m vuccati cakkhusamphasso. cakkhusamphassopi anicco ^a^V2.0074^ea^ vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhusamphassassa uppaadaaya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. anicca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca uppanno cakkhusamphasso kuto nicco bhavissati! phu.t.tho ^a^T4.0086^ea^, bhikkhave, vedeti, phu.t.tho ceteti, phu.t.tho sa~njaanaati. itthetepi dhammaa calaa ceva byathaa ca aniccaa vipari.naamino a~n~nathaabhaavino. sota.m...pe0....

[03] ``jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m. jivhaa aniccaa vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii {vipari.naaminii a~n~nathaabhaavinii (?)}. rasaa aniccaa vipari.naamino a~n~nathaabhaavino. ittheta.m dvaya.m cala~nceva byatha~nca anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya ^a^M2.0292^ea^, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. anicca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca uppanna.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kuto nicca.m bhavissati! yaa kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m sa"ngati sannipaato samavaayo, aya.m vuccati jivhaasamphasso. jivhaasamphassopi anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhaasamphassassa uppaadaaya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. anicca.m ^a^P4.0069^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca uppanno jivhaasamphasso, kuto nicco bhavissati! phu.t.tho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phu.t.tho ceteti, phu.t.tho sa~njaanaati. itthetepi dhammaa calaa ceva byathaa ca aniccaa vipari.naamino a~n~nathaabhaavino. kaaya.m...pe0....

[03] ``mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m. mano anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. dhammaa aniccaa vipari.naamino a~n~nathaabhaavino. ittheta.m dvaya.m cala~nceva ^a^T4.0087^ea^ byatha~nca anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. manovi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m vipari.naami a~n~nathaabhaavi. yopi hetu yopi paccayo manovi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. anicca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca uppanna.m manovi~n~naa.na.m, kuto nicca.m bhavissati! yaa kho, bhikkhave, imesa.m ti.n.na.m dhammaana.m sa"ngati sannipaato samavaayo, aya.m vuccati manosamphasso. manosamphassopi anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. yopi hetu yopi paccayo manosamphassassa uppaadaaya, sopi hetu sopi paccayo anicco vipari.naamii a~n~nathaabhaavii. anicca.m kho pana, bhikkhave, paccaya.m pa.ticca ^a^V2.0075^ea^ uppanno manosamphasso, kuto nicco bhavissati! phu.t.tho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phu.t.tho ceteti, phu.t.tho sa~njaanaati. itthetepi dhammaa calaa ceva byathaa ca aniccaa vipari.naamino a~n~nathaabhaavino. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, dvaya.m pa.ticca vi~n~naa.na.m sambhotii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^M2.0293^ea^. ``chayime ^a^T4.0088^ea^ ^a^P4.0070^ea^, bhikkhave, phassaayatanaa adantaa aguttaa arakkhitaa asa.mvutaa dukkhaadhivaahaa honti. katame cha? cakkhu, bhikkhave, phassaayatana.m adanta.m agutta.m arakkhita.m asa.mvuta.m dukkhaadhivaaha.m hoti...pe0... jivhaa, bhikkhave, phassaayatana.m adanta.m agutta.m arakkhita.m asa.mvuta.m dukkhaadhivaaha.m hoti...pe0... mano, bhikkhave, phassaayatana.m adanta.m agutta.m arakkhita.m asa.mvuta.m dukkhaadhivaaha.m hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cha phassaayatanaa adantaa aguttaa arakkhitaa asa.mvutaa dukkhaadhivaahaa honti''.

[27] piyamhi sadde na samucchito siyaa.
[26] athoppiye dosagata.m vinodaye,
[22] na caappiya.m meti mana.m padosaye..

[27] athopi ghatvaa asuci.m akantiya.m.

[27] papa~ncayantaa upayanti sa~n~nino.

[22] bhavattha {bhavatha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} jaatimara.nassa paaragaa''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P4.0072^ea^ kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto {maalu"nkyaputto (sii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto ^a^T4.0090^ea^ aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.
[03] ``ettha ^a^M2.0295^ea^ daani, maalukyaputta, ki.m dahare bhikkhuu vakkhaama! yatra hi naama tva.m, bhikkhu, ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto sa.mkhittena ovaada.m yaacasii''ti.

[03] ``ki~ncaapaaha.m, bhante, ji.n.no vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto. desetu me, bhante ^a^V2.0078^ea^, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m, desetu sugato sa.mkhittena dhamma.m, appeva naamaaha.m bhagavato bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyya.m. appeva naamaaha.m bhagavato bhaasitassa daayaado assa''nti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, maalukyaputta, ye te cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa adi.t.thaa adi.t.thapubbaa, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti? atthi te tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ye te sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa assutaa assutapubbaa, na ca su.naasi, na ca te hoti su.neyyanti? atthi te tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[03] ``ye te ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa aghaayitaa aghaayitapubbaa, na ca ghaayasi, na ca te hoti ghaayeyyanti? atthi te tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ye ^a^P4.0073^ea^ te manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa ^a^T4.0091^ea^ avi~n~naataa avi~n~naatapubbaa, na ca vijaanaasi, na ca te hoti vijaaneyyanti? atthi te tattha chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ettha ca te, maalukyaputta, di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissati, sute sutamatta.m bhavissati, mute mutamatta.m bhavissati, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatta.m bhavissati. yato kho te, maalukyaputta, di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu di.t.the di.t.thamatta.m bhavissati, sute sutamatta.m bhavissati ^a^M2.0296^ea^, mute mutamatta.m bhavissati, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatamatta.m bhavissati; tato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tena. yato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tena; tato tva.m, maalukyaputta ^a^V2.0079^ea^, na tattha. yato tva.m, maalukyaputta, na tattha; tato tva.m, maalukyaputta, nevidha, na hura.m, na ubhayamantarena. esevanto dukkhassaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0299^ea^ kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m ^a^V2.0083^ea^ kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa maalukyaputto arahata.m ahosiiti. dutiya.m.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``parihaanadhamma~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami aparihaanadhamma~nca cha ca abhibhaayatanaani. ta.m su.naatha. katha~nca, bhikkhave, parihaanadhammo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa {akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) upari aasiivisavagge sattamasutte pana ``aakusalaa sarasa"nkappaa'' tveva sabbattha dissati} sa.myojaniyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu adhivaaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantiikaroti {byantikaroti (pii0) byanti.m karoti (ka0)} na anabhaava.m gameti, veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `parihaayaami kusalehi ^a^T4.0096^ea^ dhammehi'. parihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati...pe0....

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa uppajjanti...pe0... puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasaa dhamma.m ^a^P4.0077^ea^ vi~n~naaya uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu adhivaaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantiikaroti na anabhaava.m gameti, veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. parihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, parihaanadhammo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, aparihaanadhammo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti, veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `na parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. aparihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati...pe0....

[03] ``puna ^a^M2.0300^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa uppajjanti...pe0... puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti, veditabbameta.m ^a^V2.0084^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `na parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. aparihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, aparihaanadhammo hoti.

[03] ``katamaani ^a^T4.0097^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, cha abhibhaayatanaani? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa nuppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `abhibhuutameta.m aayatana.m'. abhibhaayatana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati...pe0... puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya nuppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `abhibhuutameta.m aayatana.m'. abhibhaayatana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati. imaani vuccanti, bhikkhave, cha abhibhaayatanaanii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``pamaadavihaari~nca ^a^P4.0078^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, desessaami appamaadavihaari~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katha~nca, bhikkhave, pamaadavihaarii hoti? cakkhundriya.m asa.mvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato citta.m byaasi~ncati {byaasiccati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}. cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu tassa byaasittacittassa paamojja.m na hoti. paamojje asati piiti na hoti. piitiyaa asati passaddhi na hoti. passaddhiyaa asati dukkha.m hoti. dukkhino citta.m na samaadhiyati. asamaahite citte dhammaa na paatubhavanti. dhammaana.m apaatubhaavaa pamaadavihaarii tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati...pe0... jivhindriya.m asa.mvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato citta.m byaasi~ncati jivhaavi~n~neyyesu rasesu, tassa byaasittacittassa...pe0... pamaadavihaarii tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati...pe0... manindriya.m asa.mvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato citta.m byaasi~ncati manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu, tassa byaasittacittassa paamojja.m na hoti. paamojje asati piiti na hoti ^a^T4.0098^ea^. piitiyaa asati passaddhi na hoti. passaddhiyaa asati dukkha.m hoti. dukkhino citta.m na samaadhiyati. asamaahite citte dhammaa na paatubhavanti ^a^M2.0301^ea^. dhammaana.m apaatubhaavaa pamaadavihaarii tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, pamaadavihaarii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, appamaadavihaarii hoti? cakkhundriya.m sa.mvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato ^a^V2.0085^ea^ citta.m na byaasi~ncati cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu, tassa abyaasittacittassa paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m viharati. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. samaahite citte dhammaa ^a^P4.0079^ea^ paatubhavanti. dhammaana.m paatubhaavaa appamaadavihaarii tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati...pe0... jivhindriya.m sa.mvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato citta.m na byaasi~ncati...pe0... appamaadavihaarii tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. manindriya.m sa.mvutassa, bhikkhave, viharato citta.m na byaasi~ncati, manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu, tassa abyaasittacittassa paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m viharati. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. samaahite citte dhammaa paatubhavanti. dhammaana.m paatubhaavaa appamaadavihaarii tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, appamaadavihaarii hotii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ``sa.mvara~nca vo, bhikkhave, desessaami, asa.mvara~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katha~nca, bhikkhave, asa.mvaro hoti? santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ^a^T4.0099^ea^ ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. parihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. parihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asa.mvaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sa.mvaro hoti? santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, veditabbameta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhunaa -- `na parihaayaami kusalehi ^a^P4.0080^ea^ dhammehi'. aparihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati ^a^M2.0302^ea^ ...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa ^a^V2.0086^ea^ rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, veditabbameta.m bhikkhunaa -- `na parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. aparihaana~nheta.m vutta.m bhagavataati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sa.mvaro hotii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha. samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? `cakkhu anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T4.0100^ea^ pajaanaati; `ruupaa aniccaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `cakkhusamphasso anicco'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `mano anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. dhammaa... manovi~n~naa.na.m... manosamphasso... `yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha. samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ``pa.tisallaane {pa.tisallaana.m (sii0 pii0 ka0), pa.tisalliinaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisalliino, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? `cakkhu anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `ruupaa aniccaa'ti ^a^P4.0081^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; `cakkhusamphasso anicco'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. `yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampmppi anicca'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. pa.tisallaane, bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisalliino, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m ^a^V2.0087^ea^ {yampi (pii0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? cakkhu, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m ^a^M2.0303^ea^. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati ^a^T4.0101^ea^. ruupaa na tumhaaka.m. te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. cakkhusamphasso na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. so vo pahiino hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sota.m na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. saddaa na tumhaaka.m. te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. sotavi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. sotasamphasso na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. so vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. yampida.m sotasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ghaana.m na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. gandhaa na tumhaaka.m. te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ghaanasamphasso na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. so vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. yampida.m ghaanasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati.

[03] jivhaa na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. saa vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. rasaa na tumhaaka.m. te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. jivhaasamphasso na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. so vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m ^a^P4.0082^ea^ sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi na tumhaaka.m. ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati ^a^V2.0088^ea^ ...pe0....

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m imasmi.m jetavane ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m ta.m jano hareyya vaa .daheyya vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya, api nu tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `amhe jano harati vaa .dahati vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karotii'''ti?

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``udako ^a^P4.0083^ea^ {uddako (sii0 pii0)} suda.m, bhikkhave, raamaputto eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `ida.m jaatu vedaguu, ida.m jaatu sabbajii {sabbaji (pii0)}, ida.m jaatu apalikhata.m ga.n.damuula.m palikha.ni'nti. ta.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, udako raamaputto avedaguuyeva samaano `vedaguusmii'ti bhaasati, asabbajiiyeva samaano `sabbajiismii'ti bhaasati, apalikhata.myeva ga.n.damuula.m palikhata.m me `ga.n.damuula'nti bhaasati. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ida.m jaatu vedaguu, ida.m jaatu sabbajii, ida.m jaatu apalikhata.m ga.n.damuula.m palikha.ni'''nti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, vedaguu hoti? yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati; eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedaguu hoti.

[03] ``udako suda.m, bhikkhave, raamaputto eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `ida.m jaatu vedaguu, ida.m jaatu sabbajii, ida.m jaatu apalikhata.m ga.n.damuula.m palikha.ni'nti. ta.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, udako raamaputto avedaguuyeva samaano `vedaguusmii'ti bhaasati, asabbajiiyeva samaano `sabbajiismii'ti bhaasati; apalikhata.myeva ga.n.damuula.m `palikhata.m me ga.n.damuula'nti bhaasati. idha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `ida.m jaatu vedaguu, ida.m jaatu sabbajii, ida.m jaatu apalikhata.m ga.n.damuula.m palikha.ni'''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m, da.t.theyya.m {di.t.theyya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, patteyyanti vadaami. na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaamii''ti. ida.m vatvaa bhagavaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m paavisi. atha kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- ``ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `naaha.m, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m, da.t.theyya.m, patteyyanti vadaami. na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaamii'ti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa''ti?

[03] atha ^a^M2.0314^ea^ kho tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``aya.m kho aayasmaa aanando satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito ^a^V2.0101^ea^, sambhaavito ca ^a^T4.0117^ea^ vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa aanando imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho te bhikkhuu yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m ^a^P4.0094^ea^ etadavocu.m --

[03] ``ida.m kho no, aavuso aananda, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `naaha.m, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m, da.t.theyya.m, patteyyanti vadaami. na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaamii'ti. tesa.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m acirapakkantassa bhagavato etadahosi -- `ida.m kho no, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- naaha.m, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m, da.t.theyya.m, patteyyanti vadaami. na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaamiiti. ko nu kho imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajeyyaa'ti ^a^T4.0118^ea^? tesa.m no, aavuso, amhaaka.m etadahosi -- `aya.m kho, aavuso, aayasmaa aanando satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa aanando imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. ya.mnuuna maya.m yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkameyyaama; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaamaa'ti. vibhajataayasmaa aanando''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano mahato rukkhassa ti.t.thato saaravato atikkammeva, muula.m atikkammeva, khandha.m saakhaapalaase saara.m pariyesitabba.m ma~n~neyya; eva.m sampadamida.m aayasmantaana.m satthari sammukhiibhuute ta.m bhagavanta.m atisitvaa ^a^M2.0315^ea^ amhe etamattha.m pa.tipucchitabba.m ma~n~natha {ma~n~netha (pii0 ka0)}. so haavuso, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m ^a^V2.0102^ea^ passati -- cakkhubhuuto, ~naa.nabhuuto, dhammabhuuto, brahmabhuuto, vattaa, pavattaa, atthassa ninnetaa, amatassa daataa, dhammassaamii, tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha ^a^P4.0095^ea^. yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa vo dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] ``addhaavuso aananda, bhagavaa jaana.m jaanaati, passa.m passati -- cakkhubhuuto, ~naa.nabhuuto, dhammabhuuto, brahmabhuuto, vattaa, pavattaa, atthassa ninnetaa, amatassa daataa, dhammassaamii, tathaagato. so ceva panetassa kaalo ahosi ya.m bhagavanta.myeva etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaama ^a^T4.0119^ea^. yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya tathaa na.m dhaareyyaama. api caayasmaa aanando satthu ceva sa.mva.n.nito, sambhaavito ca vi~n~nuuna.m sabrahmacaariina.m. pahoti caayasmaa aanando imassa bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m vibhajitu.m. vibhajataayasmaa aanando agaru.m karitvaa''ti.
[03] ``tenahaavuso, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato aanandassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa aanando etadavoca --

[01] ``ya.m kho vo, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `naaha.m, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m, da.t.theyya.m, patteyyanti vadaami. na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaamii'ti, imassa khvaaha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. yena kho, aavuso, lokasmi.m lokasa~n~nii hoti lokamaanii -- aya.m vuccati ariyassa vinaye loko. kena caavuso, lokasmi.m lokasa~n~nii hoti lokamaanii? cakkhunaa kho, aavuso, lokasmi.m lokasa~n~nii hoti lokamaanii. sotena kho, aavuso... ghaanena kho, aavuso... jivhaaya kho, aavuso, lokasmi.m lokasa~n~nii hoti lokamaanii ^a^M2.0316^ea^. kaayena kho, aavuso... manena kho, aavuso, lokasmi.m lokasa~n~nii hoti lokamaanii. yena kho, aavuso, lokasmi.m lokasa~n~nii ^a^T4.0120^ea^ hoti lokamaanii -- aya.m vuccati ariyassa vinaye loko. ya.m ^a^P4.0096^ea^ kho vo, aavuso, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena uddesa.m uddisitvaa vitthaarena attha.m avibhajitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa vihaara.m pavi.t.tho -- `naaha.m, bhikkhave, gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m ^a^V2.0103^ea^, da.t.theyya.m, patteyyanti vadaami. na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, appatvaa lokassa anta.m dukkhassa antakiriya.m vadaamii'ti, imassa khvaaha.m, aavuso, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena uddesassa uddi.t.thassa vitthaarena attha.m avibhattassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaami. aaka"nkhamaanaa ca pana tumhe aayasmanto bhagavanta.myeva upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m pa.tipuccheyyaatha. yathaa vo bhagavaa byaakaroti tathaa na.m dhaareyyaathaa''ti.

[03] ``santi kho, devaanaminda, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti tadupaadaana.m. saupaadaano, devaanaminda, bhikkhu no parinibbaayati...pe0....

[03] ``santi kho, devaanaminda, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi kho, devaanaminda, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti tadupaadaana.m. saupaadaano, devaanaminda, bhikkhu no parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, devaanaminda, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti.

[03] ``santi ca kho, devaanaminda, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, devaanaminda, bhikkhu parinibbaayati...pe0... ^a^T4.0129^ea^.

[03] ``santi kho, devaanaminda, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi kho, devaanaminda, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato ^a^V2.0109^ea^ na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, devaanaminda, bhikkhu ^a^M2.0322^ea^ parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, devaanaminda, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P4.0103^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho pa~ncasikho gandhabbadevaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti? ``santi kho, pa~ncasikha, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa...pe0... santi kho, pa~ncasikha, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti tadupaadaana.m. saupaadaano, pa~ncasikha ^a^T4.0130^ea^, bhikkhu no parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, pa~ncasikha, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti''.

[03] ``santi ca kho, pa~ncasikha, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa...pe0... santi kho, pa~ncasikha, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, pa~ncasikha, bhikkhu parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, pa~ncasikha, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame ^a^V2.0110^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``saddhivihaariko ^a^M2.0323^ea^, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhu sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto''ti.

[03] ``evameta.m, aavuso, hoti indriyesu aguttadvaarassa, bhojane amatta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m ananuyuttassa. `so vataavuso, bhikkhu indriyesu aguttadvaaro bhojane amatta~n~nuu jaagariya.m ^a^P4.0104^ea^ ananuyutto yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m santaanessatii'ti ^a^T4.0131^ea^ neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. `so vataavuso, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro, bhojane matta~n~nuu, jaagariya.m anuyutto yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m santaanessatii'ti .thaanameta.m vijjati.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, aavuso, indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya, na madaaya, na ma.n.danaaya, na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa, brahmacariyaanuggahaaya. iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati ^a^T4.0132^ea^, anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. eva.m kho, aavuso, bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya ^a^V2.0111^ea^ aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti ^a^P4.0105^ea^. rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappeti paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano, u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. eva.m kho, aavuso, jaagariya.m ^a^M2.0324^ea^ anuyutto hoti. tasmaatihaavuso, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `indriyesu guttadvaaraa bhavissaama, bhojane matta~n~nuno, jaagariya.m anuyuttaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, aavuso, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- ``paripakkaa kho raahulassa vimuttiparipaacaniyaa dhammaa; ya.mnuunaaha.m raahula.m uttari.m aasavaana.m khaye vineyya''nti. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saavatthiya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto aayasmanta.m raahula.m aamantesi -- ``ga.nhaahi, raahula, nisiidana.m. yena andhavana.m tenupasa"nkamissaama divaavihaaraayaa''ti ^a^T4.0133^ea^. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato pa.tissutvaa nisiidana.m aadaaya bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi.

[03] ``manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manovi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti.

[03] idamavoca ^a^V2.0115^ea^ bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa raahulo bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandi. imasmi~nca pana veyyaakara.nasmi.m bha~n~namaane aayasmato raahulassa anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. anekaana~nca ^a^M2.0326^ea^ devataasahassaana.m viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi -- ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``sa.myojaniye ca, bhikkhave, dhamme desessaami sa.myojana~nca. ta.m su.naatha. katame ^a^P4.0108^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa, katama~nca sa.myojana.m? santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa ^a^T4.0136^ea^ piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa. yo tattha chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa. yo tattha chandaraago ta.m tattha sa.myojana''nti. navama.m.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0137^ea^ ^a^M2.0327^ea^ ^a^P4.0109^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho uggo gahapati vesaaliko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uggo gahapati vesaaliko bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti?
