[03] ``santi ^a^T4.0138^ea^ ca kho, gahapati, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa, i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa ^a^V2.0117^ea^ rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, gahapati, bhikkhu parinibbaayati...pe0... santi kho, gahapati, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi kho, gahapati, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati, tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato. na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano ^a^M2.0328^ea^, gahapati, bhikkhu parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, gahapati, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vajjiisu viharati hatthigaame. atha kho uggo gahapati hatthigaamako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho uggo gahapati hatthigaamako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti? ko pana, bhante hetu ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti? (yathaa purimasuttanta.m, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). aya.m ^a^P4.0110^ea^ kho, gahapati, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva ^a^T4.0139^ea^ dhamme parinibbaayantiiti. dutiya.m.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha kho, upaali gahapati, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho, upaali gahapati, bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti? (yathaa purimasuttanta.m, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). aya.m kho, gahapati, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantiiti. tatiya.m.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0118^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho raajaa udeno yenaayasmaa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa udeno aayasmanta.m pi.n.dolabhaaradvaaja.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bho bhaaradvaaja, hetu ^a^M2.0329^ea^ ko paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu {susu (sii0 ka0)} kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa anikii.litaavino kaamesu yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caranti, addhaana~nca aapaadentii''ti? ``vutta.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tena ^a^T4.0140^ea^ bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena -- `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, maatumattiisu maatucitta.m upa.t.thapetha, bhaginimattiisu ^a^P4.0111^ea^ bhaginicitta.m upa.t.thapetha, dhiitumattiisu dhiitucitta.m upa.t.thapethaa'ti. aya.m kho, mahaaraaja, hetu, aya.m paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa anikii.litaavino kaamesu yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caranti, addhaana~nca aapaadentii''ti.

[03] ``lola.m {lo.la.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} kho, bho bhaaradvaaja, citta.m. appekadaa maatumattiisupi lobhadhammaa uppajjanti, bhaginimattiisupi lobhadhammaa uppajjanti, dhiitumattiisupi lobhadhammaa uppajjanti. atthi nu kho, bho bhaaradvaaja, a~n~no ca hetu, a~n~no ca paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu kaa.lakesaa...pe0... addhaana~nca aapaadentii''ti?

[03] ``vutta.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena -- `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhatha -- atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m {a.t.thimi~njaa (sii0)} vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta'nti. ayampi kho, mahaaraaja, hetu, aya.m paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu kaa.lakesaa...pe0... ^a^T4.0141^ea^ addhaana~nca aapaadentii''ti. ``ye te, bho bhaaradvaaja, bhikkhuu bhaavitakaayaa bhaavitasiilaa bhaavitacittaa bhaavitapa~n~naa, tesa.m ta.m sukara.m hoti. ye ca kho te ^a^V2.0119^ea^, bho bhaaradvaaja, bhikkhuu abhaavitakaayaa abhaavitasiilaa abhaavitacittaa abhaavitapa~n~naa, tesa.m ta.m dukkara.m hoti. appekadaa, bho bhaaradvaaja, asubhato manasi ^a^M2.0330^ea^ karissaamiiti {manasi karissaamaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} subhatova {subhato vaa (sii0), subhato ca (syaa0 ka.m0)} aagacchati. atthi nu kho, bho bhaaradvaaja ^a^P4.0112^ea^, a~n~no ca kho hetu a~n~no ca paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu kaa.lakesaa...pe0... addhaana~nca aapaadentii''ti?

[03] ``vutta.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena -- `etha tumhe, bhikkhave, indriyesu guttadvaaraa viharatha. cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa maa nimittaggaahino ahuvattha, maanubya~njanaggaahino. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjatha. rakkhatha cakkhundriya.m; cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjatha. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya maa nimittaggaahino ahuvattha, maanubya~njanaggaahino. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjatha ^a^T4.0142^ea^. rakkhatha manindriya.m; manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjathaa'ti. ayampi kho, mahaaraaja, hetu aya.m paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa anikii.litaavino kaamesu yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caranti, addhaana~nca aapaadentii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho bhaaradvaaja; abbhuta.m, bho bhaaradvaaja! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m {yaava subhaasitamida.m (sii0)}, bho bhaaradvaaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena. esova kho, bho bhaaradvaaja, hetu, esa paccayo yenime daharaa bhikkhuu susuu kaa.lakesaa bhadrena yobbanena samannaagataa pa.thamena vayasaa anikii.litaavino kaamesu yaavajiiva.m paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m caranti, addhaana~nca aapaadentiiti. ahampi kho, bho {ahampi bho (sii0 pii0)} bhaaradvaaja, yasmi.m samaye arakkhiteneva kaayena, arakkhitaaya vaacaaya, arakkhitena cittena, anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa, asa.mvutehi indriyehi antepura.m pavisaami, ativiya ma.m tasmi.m samaye lobhadhammaa parisahanti. yasmi~nca khvaaha.m, bho bhaaradvaaja, samaye rakkhiteneva kaayena, rakkhitaaya vaacaaya, rakkhitena cittena, upa.t.thitaaya satiyaa ^a^P4.0113^ea^, sa.mvutehi indriyehi antepura.m pavisaami, na ma.m tathaa ^a^M2.0331^ea^ tasmi.m samaye lobhadhammaa parisahanti. abhikkanta.m, bho bhaaradvaaja; abhikkanta.m, bho bhaaradvaaja! seyyathaapi ^a^V2.0120^ea^, bho bhaaradvaaja, nikkujjita.m {nikujjita.m (pii0)} vaa ukkujjeyya ^a^T4.0143^ea^, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa bhaaradvaajena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bho bhaaradvaaja, ta.m bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m bhaaradvaajo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho so.no gahapatiputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so.no gahapatiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti? (yathaa purimasuttanta.m, eva.m vitthaaretabba.m). aya.m kho, so.na, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantiiti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho ghosito gahapati yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho ghosito gahapati aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ```dhaatunaanatta.m, dhaatunaanatta'nti ^a^P4.0114^ea^, bhante aananda, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti? ``sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhaatu, ruupaa ca manaapaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca ^a^T4.0144^ea^ sukhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhaatu, ruupaa ca amanaapaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca dukkhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhaatu, ruupaa ca manaapaa upekkhaavedaniyaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa ^a^M2.0332^ea^ vedanaa...pe0... sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhaadhaatu, rasaa ca manaapaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na~nca sukhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati ^a^V2.0121^ea^ sukhaa vedanaa. sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhaadhaatu, rasaa ca amanaapaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na~nca dukkhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhaadhaatu, rasaa ca upekkhaavedaniyaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na~nca adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa...pe0... sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhaatu, dhammaa ca manaapaa, manovi~n~naa.na~nca sukhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhaatu, dhammaa ca amanaapaa, manovi~n~naa.na~nca dukkhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. sa.mvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhaatu, dhammaa ca upekkhaavedaniyaa, manovi~n~naa.na~nca adukkhamasukhavedaniya.m. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. ettaavataa kho, gahapati, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0145^ea^ ^a^P4.0115^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakaccaano avantiisu viharati kuraraghare {kulaghare (syaa0 ka0)} papaate {pavatte (sii0 pii0), sampavatte (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) ettheva a.t.thamapi.t.thepi} pabbate. atha kho haaliddikaani {haaliddakaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} gahapati yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho haaliddikaani gahapati aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``vuttamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- `dhaatunaanatta.m pa.ticca uppajjati phassanaanatta.m; phassanaanatta.m pa.ticca uppajjati vedanaanaanatta'nti. katha.m nu kho, bhante, dhaatunaanatta.m pa.ticca uppajjati phassanaanatta.m; phassanaanatta.m pa.ticca uppajjati vedanaanaanatta''nti? ``idha, gahapati, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa `manaapa.m ittheta'nti pajaanaati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sukhavedaniya~nca {sukhavedaniya.m, sukhavedaniya.m (sii0 pii0), sukhavedaniya~nca, sukhavedaniya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) eva.m ``dukkhavedaniya~nca adukkhamasukhavedaniya~ncaa''ti padesupi. a.t.thakathaa.tiikaa oloketabbaa}. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. cakkhunaa kho paneva {paneva.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} ruupa.m disvaa `amanaapa.m ittheta'nti pajaanaati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m dukkhavedaniya~nca. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. cakkhunaa kho paneva ruupa.m disvaa `upekkhaa.t.thaaniya.m ^a^M2.0333^ea^ {upekkhaavedaniya.m (ka0)} ittheta'nti pajaanaati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m adukkhamasukhavedaniya~nca. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, bhikkhu sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya `manaapa.m ittheta'nti pajaanaati manovi~n~naa.na.m sukhavedaniya~nca ^a^P4.0116^ea^. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa. manasaa kho paneva dhamma.m vi~n~naaya ^a^T4.0146^ea^ `amanaapa.m ittheta'nti pajaanaati manovi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V2.0122^ea^ dukkhavedaniya~nca. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. manasaa kho paneva dhamma.m vi~n~naaya `upekkhaa.t.thaaniya.m ittheta'nti pajaanaati manovi~n~naa.na.m adukkhamasukhavedaniya~nca. phassa.m pa.ticca uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. eva.m kho, gahapati, dhaatunaanatta.m pa.ticca uppajjati phassanaanatta.m; phassanaanatta.m pa.ticca uppajjati vedanaanaanatta''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa bhaggesu viharati susumaaragire bhesaka.laavane migadaaye. atha kho nakulapitaa gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho nakulapitaa gahapati bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti? ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti? ``santi kho, gahapati, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti tadupaadaana.m. saupaadaano, gahapati, bhikkhu no parinibbaayati...pe0... santi kho, gahapati, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi kho, gahapati, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa ^a^T4.0147^ea^. ta~nce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaaya ti.t.thato tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti tadupaadaana.m. saupaadaano, gahapati, bhikkhu no parinibbaayati ^a^M2.0334^ea^. aya.m kho, gahapati, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme no parinibbaayanti''.

[03] ``santi ca kho, gahapati, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhunaabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti, na tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, gahapati, bhikkhu parinibbaayati...pe0... santi kho, gahapati, jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa...pe0... santi kho, gahapati, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ta~nce bhikkhu naabhinandati naabhivadati naajjhosaaya ti.t.thati. tassa ta.m naabhinandato naabhivadato anajjhosaaya ti.t.thato na tannissita.m vi~n~naa.na.m hoti na ^a^V2.0123^ea^ tadupaadaana.m. anupaadaano, gahapati, bhikkhu parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, gahapati, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa mahaakaccaano avantiisu viharati makkarakate {makkaraka.te (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m. atha ^a^P4.0117^ea^ kho lohiccassa braahma.nassa sambahulaa ^a^T4.0148^ea^ antevaasikaa ka.t.thahaarakaa maa.navakaa yenaayasmato mahaakaccaanassa ara~n~naku.tikaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa parito parito ku.tikaaya anuca"nkamanti anuvicaranti uccaasaddaa mahaasaddaa kaanici kaanici seleyyakaani karonti {selissakaani karontaa (sii0)} -- ``ime pana mu.n.dakaa sama.nakaa ibbhaa ka.nhaa {ki.nhaa (sii0 pii0)} bandhupaadaapaccaa, imesa.m bharatakaana.m sakkataa garukataa maanitaa puujitaa apacitaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano vihaaraa nikkhamitvaa te maa.navake etadavoca -- ``maa maa.navakaa saddamakattha; dhamma.m vo bhaasissaamii''ti. eva.m vutte, te maa.navakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakaccaano te maa.navake gaathaahi ajjhabhaasi --
[21] ``siiluttamaa pubbataraa ahesu.m,
[27] te braahma.naa ye puraa.na.m saranti.
[26] guttaani dvaaraani surakkhitaani,
[22] ahesu.m tesa.m abhibhuyya kodha.m..
[21] ``dhamme ^a^M2.0335^ea^ ca jhaane ca rataa ahesu.m,
[27] te braahma.naa ye puraa.na.m saranti.
[26] ime ca vokkamma japaamaseti,
[22] gottena mattaa visama.m caranti..
[21] ``kodhaabhibhuutaa puthuattada.n.daa {kodhaabhibhuutaasuputhuttada.n.daa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)},
[27] virajjamaanaa sata.nhaata.nhesu.
[26] aguttadvaarassa ^a^V2.0124^ea^ bhavanti moghaa,
[22] supineva laddha.m purisassa vitta.m..
[21] ``anaasakaa ^a^P4.0118^ea^ tha.n.dilasaayikaa ca.
[22] paato sinaana~nca tayo ca vedaa..
[21] ``kharaajina.m ja.taapa"nko, mantaa siilabbata.m tapo.
[22] kuhanaa va"nkada.n.daa ca, udakaacamanaani ca..
[21] ``va.n.naa ^a^T4.0149^ea^ ete braahma.naana.m, kataa ki~ncikkhabhaavanaa.
[27] citta~nca susamaahita.m, vippasannamanaavila.m.
[22] akhila.m sabbabhuutesu, so maggo brahmapattiyaa''ti..

[03] atha kho te maa.navakaa kupitaa anattamanaa yena lohicco braahma.no tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa lohicca.m braahma.na.m etadavocu.m -- ``yagghe! bhava.m jaaneyya, sama.no mahaakaccaano braahma.naana.m mante {manta.m (ka0)} eka.msena apavadati, pa.tikkosatii''ti? eva.m vutte, lohicco braahma.no kupito ahosi anattamano. atha kho lohiccassa braahma.nassa etadahosi -- ``na kho pana meta.m patiruupa.m yoha.m a~n~nadatthu maa.navakaana.myeva sutvaa sama.na.m mahaakaccaana.m akkoseyya.m {akkoseyya.m virujjheyya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paribhaaseyya.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa puccheyya''nti.

[03] atha kho lohicco braahma.no tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m yenaayasmaa mahaakaccaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P4.0119^ea^ aayasmataa mahaakaccaanena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho lohicco braahma.no ^a^M2.0336^ea^ aayasmanta.m mahaakaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``aagama.msu nu khvidha, bho kaccaana, amhaaka.m sambahulaa antevaasikaa ka.t.thahaarakaa maa.navakaa''ti? ``aagama.msu khvidha te, braahma.na, sambahulaa antevaasikaa ka.t.thahaarakaa maa.navakaa''ti. ``ahu pana bhoto kaccaanassa tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti? ``ahu kho me, braahma.na, tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m kocideva kathaasallaapo''ti ^a^T4.0150^ea^. ``yathaa katha.m pana bhoto kaccaanassa tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m ahosi ^a^V2.0125^ea^ kathaasallaapo''ti? ``eva.m kho me, braahma.na, tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m ahosi kathaasallaapo --
[21] ``siiluttamaa pubbataraa ahesu.m,
[27] te braahma.naa ye puraa.na.m saranti....pe0....
[26] akhila.m sabbabhuutesu,
[22] so maggo brahmapattiyaa''ti..
[03] ``eva.m kho me, braahma.na, tehi maa.navakehi saddhi.m ahosi kathaasallaapo''ti.

[03] ```aguttadvaaro'ti {aguttadvaaro aguttadvaaroti (ka0)} bhava.m kaccaano aaha. kittaavataa nu kho, bho kaccaana, aguttadvaaro hotii''ti? ``idha, braahma.na, ekacco cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe adhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati {anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0) upari aasiivisavagge avassutasutte pana ``anupa.t.thitakaayassatii''tveva sabbattha dissati} ca viharati, parittacetaso ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^P4.0120^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyaruupe ca dhamme byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati, parittacetaso ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. eva.m kho, braahma.na, aguttadvaaro hotii''ti. ``acchariya.m, bho kaccaana; abbhuta.m, bho kaccaana! yaava~ncida.m bhotaa ^a^T4.0151^ea^ kaccaanena aguttadvaarova samaano aguttadvaaroti akkhaato.

[03] ```guttadvaaro'ti ^a^M2.0337^ea^ bhava.m kaccaano aaha. kittaavataa nu kho, bho kaccaana, guttadvaaro hotii''ti? ``idha, braahma.na, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati, appamaa.nacetaso ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme ^a^V2.0126^ea^ naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati, appamaa.nacetaso ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. eva.m kho, braahma.na, guttadvaaro hotii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho kaccaana; abbhuta.m, bho kaccaana! yaava~ncida.m ^a^P4.0121^ea^ bhotaa kaccaanena guttadvaarova samaano guttadvaaroti akkhaato. abhikkanta.m, bho kaccaana; abhikkanta.m, bho kaccaana! seyyathaapi, bho kaccaana, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhotaa kaccaanena anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bho kaccaana, ta.m bhagavanta.m ^a^T4.0152^ea^ sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m kaccaano dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata.m. yathaa ca bhava.m kaccaano makkarakate upaasakakulaani upasa"nkamati; evameva lohiccakula.m upasa"nkamatu. tattha ye maa.navakaa vaa maa.navikaa vaa bhavanta.m kaccaana.m abhivaadessanti paccu.t.thissanti aasana.m vaa udaka.m vaa dassanti, tesa.m ta.m bhavissati diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa udaayii kaama.n.daaya.m viharati todeyyassa braahma.nassa ambavane. atha kho verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa antevaasii maa.navako yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa udaayinaa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m maa.navaka.m ^a^M2.0338^ea^ aayasmaa udaayii dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. atha kho so maa.navako aayasmataa udaayinaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa yena verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa verahaccaanigotta.m braahma.ni.m etadavoca -- ``yagghe, bhoti, jaaneyyaasi {bhoti jaaneyya (sii0 pii0 ka0), bhotii jaaneyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}! sama.no udaayii dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^P4.0122^ea^, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetii''ti.

[03] ``tena hi tva.m, maa.navaka, mama vacanena sama.na.m udaayi.m nimantehi svaatanaaya bhattenaa''ti ^a^V2.0127^ea^. ``eva.m bhotii''ti kho ^a^T4.0153^ea^ so maa.navako verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu kira, bhava.m, udaayi, amhaaka.m aacariyabhariyaaya verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa udaayii tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii aayasmanta.m udaayi.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii aayasmanta.m udaayi.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m paadukaa aarohitvaa ucce aasane nisiiditvaa siisa.m ogu.n.thitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``bha.na, sama.na, dhamma''nti. ``bhavissati, bhagini, samayo''ti vatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami {pakkaami (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.

[03] dutiyampi kho so maa.navako yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa udaayinaa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho ta.m maa.navaka.m aayasmaa udaayii dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassesi samaadapesi samuttejesi sampaha.msesi. dutiyampi kho so maa.navako aayasmataa udaayinaa dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassito samaadapito samuttejito ^a^T4.0154^ea^ sampaha.msito u.t.thaayaasanaa yena verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M2.0339^ea^ verahaccaanigotta.m braahma.ni.m etadavoca -- ``yagghe, bhoti, jaaneyyaasi! sama.no udaayii dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^P4.0123^ea^, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasetii''ti.

[03] ``evameva.m pana tva.m, maa.navaka, sama.nassa udaayissa va.n.na.m bhaasasi. sama.no panudaayii `bha.na, sama.na, dhamma'nti vutto samaano `bhavissati, bhagini, samayo'ti vatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkanto''ti. ``tathaa hi pana tva.m, bhoti, paadukaa aarohitvaa ucce aasane nisiiditvaa siisa.m ogu.n.thitvaa etadavoca -- `bha.na, sama.na, dhamma'nti. dhammagaruno hi te bhavanto dhammagaaravaa''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, maa.navaka, mama vacanena sama.na.m udaayi.m nimantehi svaatanaaya bhattenaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhotii''ti kho so maa.navako verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``adhivaasetu kira ^a^V2.0128^ea^ bhava.m udaayii amhaaka.m aacariyabhariyaaya verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa udaayii tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa udaayii tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena verahaccaanigottaaya braahma.niyaa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii aayasmanta.m ^a^T4.0155^ea^ udaayi.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii aayasmanta.m udaayi.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m paadukaa orohitvaa niice aasane nisiiditvaa siisa.m vivaritvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``kismi.m nu kho, bhante, sati arahanto sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti, kismi.m asati arahanto sukhadukkha.m na pa~n~napentii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhusmi.m kho, bhagini, sati arahanto sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti, cakkhusmi.m asati arahanto sukhadukkha.m ^a^P4.0124^ea^ na pa~n~napenti...pe0... jivhaaya sati arahanto sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti, jivhaaya asati arahanto sukhadukkha.m na pa~n~napenti...pe0.... manasmi.m sati arahanto sukhadukkha.m pa~n~napenti, manasmi.m asati arahanto sukhadukkha.m na pa~n~napentii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, verahaccaanigottaa braahma.nii aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante; abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya ^a^M2.0340^ea^, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya, cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m ayyena udaayinaa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, ayya udaayi, ta.m bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami, dhamma~nca, bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasika.m ma.m ayyo udaayii dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dasama.m.
[06] gahapativaggo terasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] vesaalii ^a^T4.0156^ea^ vajji naa.landaa, bhaaradvaaja so.no ca ghosito.
[22] haaliddiko nakulapitaa, lohicco verahaccaaniiti..

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0157^ea^ ^a^V2.0129^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati devadaha.m naama sakyaana.m nigamo. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbesa.myeva bhikkhuuna.m chasu phassaayatanesu appamaadena kara.niiyanti vadaami, na ca panaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbesa.myeva bhikkhuuna.m chasu phassaayatanesu ^a^P4.0125^ea^ naappamaadena kara.niiyanti vadaami. ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu arahanto khii.naasavaa vusitavanto katakara.niiyaa ohitabhaaraa anuppattasadatthaa parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojanaa sammada~n~naa vimuttaa, tesaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m chasu phassaayatanesu naappamaadena kara.niiyanti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? kata.m tesa.m appamaadena, abhabbaa te pamajjitu.m. ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu sekkhaa {sekhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} appattamaanasaa anuttara.m yogakkhema.m patthayamaanaa viharanti, tesaaha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuuna.m chasu phassaayatanesu appamaadena kara.niiyanti vadaami. ta.m kissa hetu? santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa manoramaapi, amanoramaapi. tyaassa phussa phussa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso apariyaadaanaa aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa {apammu.t.thaa (sii0), appamu.t.thaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, appamaadaphala.m ^a^M2.0341^ea^ sampassamaano tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m chasu ^a^T4.0158^ea^ phassaayatanesu appamaadena kara.niiyanti vadaami...pe0... santi, bhikkhave, manovi~n~neyyaa dhammaa manoramaapi amanoramaapi. tyaassa phussa phussa citta.m na pariyaadaaya ti.t.thanti. cetaso apariyaadaanaa aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m asalliina.m, upa.t.thitaa sati asammu.t.thaa, passaddho kaayo asaaraddho, samaahita.m citta.m ekagga.m. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, appamaadaphala.m sampassamaano tesa.m bhikkhuuna.m chasu {chassu (sii0)} phassaayatanesu appamaadena kara.niiyanti vadaamii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``laabhaa ^a^P4.0126^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, suladdha.m vo, bhikkhave, kha.no vo pa.tiladdho brahmacariyavaasaaya. di.t.thaa mayaa, bhikkhave, chaphassaayatanikaa naama nirayaa. tattha ya.m ki~nci cakkhunaa ^a^V2.0130^ea^ ruupa.m passati ani.t.tharuupa.myeva passati, no i.t.tharuupa.m; akantaruupa.myeva passati, no kantaruupa.m; amanaaparuupa.myeva passati, no manaaparuupa.m. ya.m ki~nci sotena sadda.m su.naati...pe0... ya.m ki~nci ghaanena gandha.m ghaayati...pe0... ya.m ki~nci jivhaaya rasa.m saayati...pe0... ya.m ki~nci kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusati...pe0... ya.m ^a^T4.0159^ea^ ki~nci manasaa dhamma.m vijaanaati ani.t.tharuupa.myeva vijaanaati, no i.t.tharuupa.m; akantaruupa.myeva vijaanaati, no kantaruupa.m; amanaaparuupa.myeva vijaanaati, no manaaparuupa.m. laabhaa vo, bhikkhave, suladdha.m vo, bhikkhave, kha.no vo pa.tiladdho brahmacariyavaasaaya. di.t.thaa mayaa, bhikkhave, chaphassaayatanikaa naama saggaa. tattha ya.m ki~nci cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati i.t.tharuupa.myeva passati, no ani.t.tharuupa.m; kantaruupa.myeva passati, no akantaruupa.m; manaaparuupa.myeva passati, no amanaaparuupa.m...pe0... ya.m ki~nci jivhaaya rasa.m saayati...pe0... ya.m ki~nci manasaa dhamma.m vijaanaati i.t.tharuupa.myeva vijaanaati, no ani.t.tharuupa.m; kantaruupa.myeva vijaanaati, no akantaruupa.m; manaaparuupa.myeva vijaanaati, no amanaaparuupa.m. laabhaa vo, bhikkhave, suladdha.m vo, bhikkhave, kha.no vo pa.tiladdho brahmacariyavaasaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaaraamaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa ruuparataa ruupasammuditaa. ruupavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa dukkhaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa viharanti. saddaaraamaa, bhikkhave ^a^M2.0342^ea^, devamanussaa saddarataa saddasammuditaa. saddavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa dukkhaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa viharanti. gandhaaraamaa... rasaaraamaa... pho.t.thabbaaraamaa... dhammaaraamaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa ^a^P4.0127^ea^ dhammarataa dhammasammuditaa. dhammavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa dukkhaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa viharanti. tathaagato ca kho, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho ^a^T4.0160^ea^ ruupaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava.m ca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa na ruupaaraamo na ruuparato na ruupasammudito. ruupavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa sukho, bhikkhave, tathaagato viharati. saddaana.m... gandhaana.m... rasaana.m... pho.t.thabbaana.m... dhammaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa na dhammaaraamo, na dhammarato, na dhammasammudito. dhammavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa sukho, bhikkhave, tathaagato viharati''. idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``ruupaa ^a^V2.0131^ea^ saddaa rasaa gandhaa, phassaa dhammaa ca kevalaa.
[22] i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa ca, yaavatatthiiti vuccati..
[21] ``sadevakassa lokassa, ete vo sukhasammataa.
[22] yattha cete nirujjhanti, ta.m tesa.m dukkhasammata.m..
[21] ``sukha.m {sukhanti (sii0)} di.t.thamariyebhi, sakkaayassa nirodhana.m.
[22] paccaniikamida.m hoti, sabbalokena passata.m..
[21] ``ya.m pare sukhato aahu, tadariyaa aahu dukkhato.
[22] ya.m pare dukkhato aahu, tadariyaa sukhato viduu..
[21] ``passa dhamma.m duraajaana.m, sammuu.lhettha aviddasu.
[22] nivutaana.m tamo hoti, andhakaaro apassata.m..
[21] ``sata~nca ^a^P4.0128^ea^ viva.ta.m hoti, aaloko passataami.
[22] santike na vijaananti, maggaa {magaa (sii0)} dhammassa akovidaa..
[21] ``bhavaraagaparetebhi ^a^T4.0161^ea^, bhavaraagaanusaariibhi {bhavasotaanusaaribhi (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), bhavasotaanusaarihi (sii0)}.
[22] maaradheyyaanupannehi, naaya.m dhammo susambudho..
[21] ``ko ^a^M2.0343^ea^ nu a~n~natra mariyebhi, pada.m sambuddhumarahati.
[22] ya.m pada.m sammada~n~naaya, parinibbanti anaasavaa''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaaraamaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa ruuparataa ruupasammuditaa. ruupavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa dukkhaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa viharanti. saddaaraamaa... gandhaaraamaa... rasaaraamaa ^a^V2.0132^ea^... pho.t.thabbaaraamaa... dhammaaraamaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa dhammarataa dhammasammuditaa. dhammavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa dukkhaa, bhikkhave, devamanussaa viharanti. tathaagato ca, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho ruupaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa na ruupaaraamo na ruuparato na ruupasammudito. ruupavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa sukho, bhikkhave, tathaagato viharati. saddaana.m... gandhaana.m... rasaana.m... pho.t.thabbaana.m... dhammaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa na dhammaaraamo na dhammarato na dhammasammudito. dhammavipari.naamaviraaganirodhaa sukho, bhikkhave, tathaagato viharatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? cakkhu, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m; ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati...pe0... ^a^T4.0162^ea^ jivhaa na tumhaaka.m ^a^P4.0129^ea^; ta.m pajahatha. saa vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati...pe0... mano na tumhaaka.m; ta.m pajahatha. so vo pahiino hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m imasmi.m jetavane ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m ta.m jano hareyya vaa .daheyya vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa kareyya, api nu tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `amhe jano harati vaa .dahati vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karotii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``na hi no eta.m, bhante, attaa vaa attaniya.m vaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhu na tumhaaka.m; ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati...pe0... jivhaa na tumhaaka.m; ta.m pajahatha. saa vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati...pe0... mano na tumhaaka.m ^a^M2.0344^ea^; ta.m pajahatha. so vo pahiino hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m, ta.m pajahatha. ta.m vo pahiina.m hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissati ^a^V2.0133^ea^. ki~nca, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m? ruupaa, bhikkhave, na tumhaaka.m; te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa ^a^T4.0163^ea^ na tumhaaka.m; te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissanti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ya.m imasmi.m jetavane...pe0... evameva kho, bhikkhave, ruupaa na tumhaaka.m; te pajahatha. te vo pahiinaa hitaaya sukhaaya bhavissantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, anicca.m. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto nicca.m bhavissati...pe0... ^a^P4.0130^ea^ jivhaa aniccaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhaaya uppaadaaya sopi anicco. aniccasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, jivhaa kuto niccaa bhavissati...pe0... mano anicco. yopi, bhikkhave, hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuuto, bhikkhave, mano kuto nicco bhavissati! eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati...pe0... jivhaayapi nibbindati...pe0... nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, dukkha.m. yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto sukha.m bhavissati...pe0... jivhaa dukkhaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhaaya uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, jivhaa kuto sukhaa bhavissati...pe0... mano dukkho. yopi hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuuto, bhikkhave, mano kuto sukho bhavissati! eva.m passa.m...pe0... `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m ^a^T4.0164^ea^ ^a^V2.0134^ea^ ^a^M2.0345^ea^, bhikkhave, anattaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppaadaaya, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuuta.m, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto attaa bhavissati...pe0... jivhaa anattaa. yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhaaya uppaadaaya, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, jivhaa kuto attaa bhavissati...pe0... mano anattaa. yopi hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppaadaaya ^a^P4.0131^ea^, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuuto, bhikkhave, mano kuto attaa bhavissati! eva.m passa.m...pe0... `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa, bhikkhave, aniccaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo ruupaana.m uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, ruupaa kuto niccaa bhavissanti! saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa aniccaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammaana.m uppaadaaya, sopi anicco. aniccasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, dhammaa kuto niccaa bhavissanti! eva.m passa.m...pe0... `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa, bhikkhave, dukkhaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo ruupaana.m uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, ruupaa kuto sukhaa bhavissanti! saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa dukkhaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammaana.m uppaadaaya, sopi dukkho. dukkhasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, dhammaa kuto sukhaa bhavissanti! eva.m passa.m...pe0... `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``ruupaa ^a^T4.0165^ea^ ^a^V2.0135^ea^, bhikkhave, anattaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo ruupaana.m uppaadaaya, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, ruupaa kuto attaa bhavissanti! saddaa... gandhaa... rasaa... pho.t.thabbaa... dhammaa anattaa. yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammaana.m uppaadaaya, sopi anattaa. anattasambhuutaa, bhikkhave, dhammaa ^a^M2.0346^ea^ kuto attaa bhavissanti! eva.m passa.m ^a^P4.0132^ea^, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupesupi nibbindati, saddesupi... gandhesupi... rasesupi... pho.t.thabbesupi... dhammesupi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. dvaadasama.m.
[06] devadahavaggo cuddasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] devadaho kha.no ruupaa, dve natumhaakameva ca.
[22] hetunaapi tayo vuttaa, duve ajjhattabaahiraati..

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``navapuraa.naani ^a^T4.0166^ea^, bhikkhave, kammaani desessaami kammanirodha.m kammanirodhagaamini~nca pa.tipada.m. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamiiti. katama~nca, bhikkhave, puraa.nakamma.m? cakkhu, bhikkhave, puraa.nakamma.m abhisa"nkhata.m abhisa~ncetayita.m vedaniya.m da.t.thabba.m...pe0... jivhaa puraa.nakammaa abhisa"nkhataa abhisa~ncetayitaa vedaniyaa da.t.thabbaa...pe0... mano puraa.nakammo abhisa"nkhato abhisa~ncetayito vedaniyo da.t.thabbo. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puraa.nakamma.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, navakamma.m? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, etarahi ^a^V2.0136^ea^ kamma.m karoti kaayena vaacaaya manasaa, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, navakamma.m. katamo ca, bhikkhave, kammanirodho? yo kho, bhikkhave, kaayakammavaciikammamanokammassa nirodhaa vimutti.m ^a^P4.0133^ea^ phusati, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kammanirodho. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, kammanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kammanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa. iti kho, bhikkhave, desita.m mayaa puraa.nakamma.m, desita.m ^a^M2.0347^ea^ navakamma.m, desito kammanirodho, desitaa kammanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa. ya.m ^a^T4.0167^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, satthaaraa kara.niiya.m saavakaana.m hitesinaa anukampakena anukampa.m upaadaaya, kata.m vo ta.m mayaa. etaani, bhikkhave, rukkhamuulaani, etaani su~n~naagaaraani. jhaayatha, bhikkhave, maa pamaadattha; maa pacchaavippa.tisaarino ahuvattha. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``nibbaanasappaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, pa.tipada.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhu.m aniccanti passati, ruupaa aniccaati passati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati, cakkhusamphasso aniccoti passati. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti passati...pe0... jivhaa aniccaati passati, rasaa aniccaati passati, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati, jivhaasamphasso aniccoti passati ^a^P4.0134^ea^, yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti passati...pe0... mano aniccoti passati, dhammaa aniccaati passati, manovi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti passati, manosamphasso aniccoti passati, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti passati. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``nibbaanasappaaya.m ^a^V2.0137^ea^ ^a^T4.0168^ea^ vo, bhikkhave, pa.tipada.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, cakkhu.m dukkhanti passati, ruupaa dukkhaati passati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m dukkhanti passati, cakkhusamphasso dukkhoti passati, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi dukkhanti passati...pe0... jivhaa dukkhaati passati...pe0... mano dukkhoti passati, dhammaa dukkhaati passati, manovi~n~naa.na.m dukkhanti passati, manosamphasso dukkhoti passati, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi ^a^M2.0348^ea^ dukkhanti passati. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``nibbaanasappaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, pa.tipada.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhu.m anattaati passati, ruupaa anattaati passati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anattaati passati, cakkhusamphasso anattaati passati, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa ^a^P4.0135^ea^ uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anattaati passati...pe0... mano anattaati passati, dhammaa anattaati passati, manovi~n~naa.na.m anattaati passati, manosamphasso anattaati passati, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m ^a^T4.0169^ea^ vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anattaati passati. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``nibbaanasappaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, pa.tipada.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha...pe0... katamaa ca saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa? ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, cakkhu nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m ^a^V2.0138^ea^, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ruupaa niccaa vaa aniccaa vaa''ti?
[03] ``aniccaa, bhante''...pe0....
[01] ``cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m... cakkhusamphasso...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi nicca.m vaa anicca.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``anicca.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vaa ta.m sukha.m vaa''ti?
[03] ``dukkha.m, bhante''.
[01] ``ya.m panaanicca.m dukkha.m vipari.naamadhamma.m, kalla.m nu ta.m samanupassitu.m -- `eta.m mama, esohamasmi, eso me attaa'''ti?
[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati ^a^P4.0136^ea^. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ...pe0... naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaati. aya.m kho saa, bhikkhave, nibbaanasappaayaa pa.tipadaa''ti ^a^T4.0170^ea^. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``anantevaasikamida.m ^a^M2.0349^ea^, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m vussati anaacariyaka.m. santevaasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saacariyako dukkha.m na phaasu {phaasu.m (sii0 pii0)} viharati. anantevaasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anaacariyako sukha.m phaasu viharati. katha~nca, bhikkhu, santevaasiko saacariyako dukkha.m na phaasu viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. tyaassa anto vasanti, antassa vasanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa santevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m samudaacaranti, samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa saacariyakoti vuccati...pe0....

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. tyaassa anto vasanti, antassa vasanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa santevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m samudaacaranti, samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa saacariyakoti vuccati...pe0....

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. tyaassa anto vasanti, antassa vasanti ^a^P4.0137^ea^ paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa santevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m samudaacaranti, samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa saacariyakoti vuccati. eva.m kho ^a^T4.0171^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santevaasiko saacariyako dukkha.m, na phaasu viharati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anantevaasiko anaacariyako sukha.m phaasu viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. tyaassa na anto vasanti, naassa anto vasanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati ^a^V2.0140^ea^. tasmaa anantevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m na samudaacaranti, na samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa anaacariyakoti vuccati...pe0....

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa na uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. tyaassa na anto vasanti, naassa ^a^M2.0350^ea^ anto vasanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa anantevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m na samudaacaranti, na samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa anaacariyakoti vuccati...pe0....

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa. tyaassa na anto vasanti, naassa anto vasanti paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa anantevaasikoti vuccati. te na.m na samudaacaranti, na samudaacaranti na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaati. tasmaa anaacariyakoti vuccati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anantevaasiko anaacariyako sukha.m phaasu viharati. anantevaasikamida.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m vussati ^a^T4.0172^ea^. anaacariyaka.m santevaasiko ^a^P4.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saacariyako dukkha.m, na phaasu viharati. anantevaasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anaacariyako sukha.m phaasu viharatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``sace vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `kimatthiya.m, aavuso, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha -- `dukkhassa kho, aavuso, pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti. sace pana vo, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m puccheyyu.m -- `katama.m panaavuso, dukkha.m, yassa pari~n~naaya sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti? eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaatha --

[03] ``cakkhu kho, aavuso, dukkha.m; tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. ruupaa dukkhaa ^a^V2.0141^ea^; tesa.m pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m dukkha.m; tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. cakkhusamphasso dukkho; tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi dukkha.m; tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati...pe0... jivhaa dukkhaa... mano dukkho; tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m ^a^T4.0173^ea^ vaa tampi dukkha.m; tassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussati. ida.m kho, aavuso ^a^M2.0351^ea^, dukkha.m; yassa pari~n~naaya bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii'ti. eva.m pu.t.thaa tumhe, bhikkhave, tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m byaakareyyaathaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``atthi nu kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma bhikkhu a~n~natreva saddhaaya, a~n~natra ruciyaa, a~n~natra anussavaa, a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa, a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa ^a^P4.0139^ea^ a~n~na.m byaakareyya -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti {pajaanaatiiti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa, bhagava.mnettikaa bhagava.mpa.tisara.naa. saadhu vata, bhante, bhagavanta.myeva pa.tibhaatu etassa bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, bhikkhave, su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``atthi, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma bhikkhu a~n~natreva saddhaaya, a~n~natra ruciyaa, a~n~natra anussavaa, a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa, a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa a~n~na.m byaakareyya -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pariyaayo, ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma bhikkhu a~n~natreva saddhaaya...pe0... a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa a~n~na.m ^a^T4.0174^ea^ byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaati pajaanaamii'ti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, atthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati ^a^V2.0142^ea^; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, natthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati. ya.m ta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, atthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, natthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati. api nume, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhaaya vaa veditabbaa, ruciyaa vaa veditabbaa, anussavena vaa veditabbaa, aakaaraparivitakkena vaa veditabbaa, di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa vaa veditabbaa''ti? ``no heta.m ^a^M2.0352^ea^, bhante''. ``nanume, bhikkhave, dhammaa pa~n~naaya disvaa veditabbaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``aya.m kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma bhikkhu a~n~natreva saddhaaya, a~n~natra ruciyaa, a~n~natra anussavaa, a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa, a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti...pe0....

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m...pe0... raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, natthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati ^a^T4.0175^ea^. ya.m ta.m, bhikkhave, jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, atthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, natthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; api nume, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhaaya vaa veditabbaa, ruciyaa vaa veditabbaa, anussavena vaa veditabbaa, aakaaraparivitakkena vaa veditabbaa, di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa vaa veditabbaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``nanume, bhikkhave, dhammaa pa~n~naaya disvaa veditabbaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma bhikkhu a~n~natreva saddhaaya, a~n~natra ruciyaa, a~n~natra anussavaa, a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa, a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti {pajaanaatiiti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} ...pe0....

[03] ``puna ^a^P4.0140^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, atthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, natthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati. ya.m ta.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu manasaa ^a^V2.0143^ea^ dhamma.m vi~n~naaya santa.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, atthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; asanta.m vaa ajjhatta.m raagadosamoha.m, natthi me ajjhatta.m raagadosamohoti pajaanaati; api nume, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhaaya vaa veditabbaa, ruciyaa vaa veditabbaa, anussavena ^a^T4.0176^ea^ vaa veditabbaa, aakaaraparivitakkena vaa veditabbaa, di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa vaa veditabbaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``nanume, bhikkhave, dhammaa pa~n~naaya disvaa veditabbaa''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``ayampi kho, bhikkhave, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma bhikkhu ^a^M2.0353^ea^ a~n~natreva saddhaaya, a~n~natra ruciyaa, a~n~natra anussavaa, a~n~natra aakaaraparivitakkaa, a~n~natra di.t.thinijjhaanakkhantiyaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaamii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```indriyasampanno, indriyasampanno'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hotii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhundriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayaanupassii viharanto cakkhundriye nibbindati...pe0... jivhindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayaanupassii viharanto jivhindriye nibbindati...pe0... manindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayaanupassii viharanto manindriye nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati...pe0... vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. ettaavataa kho, bhikkhu, indriyasampanno hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P4.0141^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ```dhammakathiko ^a^T4.0177^ea^, dhammakathiko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhammakathiko hotii''ti?

[03] ``cakkhussa ^a^V2.0144^ea^ ce, bhikkhu nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaaya. cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaaya. cakkhussa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaaya...pe0... jivhaaya ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaaya...pe0... manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya dhamma.m deseti, `dhammakathiko bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaaya. manassa ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti, `dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaaya. manassa ^a^M2.0354^ea^ ce, bhikkhu, nibbidaa viraagaa nirodhaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, `di.t.thadhammanibbaanappatto bhikkhuu'ti ala.mvacanaayaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] navapuraa.navaggo pa~ncadasamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kamma.m cattaari sappaayaa, anantevaasi kimatthiyaa.
[22] atthi nu kho pariyaayo, indriyakathikena caati..
[06] sa.laayatanavagge tatiyapa.n.naasako samatto.
[01] tassa vagguddaana.m --
[21] yogakkhemi ^a^T4.0178^ea^ ca loko ca, gahapati devadahena ca.
[22] navapuraa.nena pa.n.naaso, tatiyo tena vuccatiiti..

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ``anicca.myeva ^a^T4.0179^ea^ ^a^P4.0142^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhu.m aniccanti passati, saassa {saaya.m (pii0 ka0)} hoti sammaadi.t.thi ^a^V2.0145^ea^. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati...pe0... anicca.myeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jivha.m aniccanti passati, saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa...pe0... citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati...pe0... anicca.myeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mana.m aniccanti passati, saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``anicceyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ruupe aniccaati passati, saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo ^a^M2.0355^ea^. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. anicceyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... dhamme aniccaati passati, saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. sammaa passa.m nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha; cakkhaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T4.0180^ea^ samanupassatha. cakkhu.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, cakkhaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto cakkhusmimpi nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. sota.m ^a^P4.0143^ea^, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha... ghaana.m... jivha.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha; jivhaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. jivha.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, jivhaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto jivhaayapi nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. kaaya.m... mana.m, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha; manaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. mana.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto ^a^V2.0146^ea^, manaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto manasmimpi nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ``ruupe, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha; ruupaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. ruupe, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, ruupaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto ruupesupi nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccati. sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe... dhamme, bhikkhave, yoniso manasi karotha; dhammaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassatha. dhamme, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yoniso manasikaronto, dhammaaniccata~nca yathaabhuuta.m samanupassanto dhammesupi nibbindati. nandikkhayaa raagakkhayo; raagakkhayaa nandikkhayo ^a^T4.0181^ea^. nandiraagakkhayaa citta.m suvimuttanti vuccatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0356^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati jiivakambavane. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti...pe0... ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha. samaahitassa, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0144^ea^, bhikkhuno yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati? cakkhu.m aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, ruupaa aniccaati yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, cakkhusamphasso aniccoti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati...pe0... jivhaa aniccaati yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati...pe0... mano aniccoti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, dhammaa aniccaati yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati. samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha. samaahitassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0147^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati jiivakambavane. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi...pe0... ``pa.tisallaane, bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisalliinassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati. ki~nca yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati? cakkhu.m aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, ruupaa aniccaati yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti ^a^T4.0182^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, cakkhusamphasso aniccoti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati...pe0... mano aniccoti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati, dhammaa... manovi~n~naa.na.m... manosamphasso... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa ^a^P4.0145^ea^ adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi aniccanti yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayati. pa.tisallaane bhikkhave, yogamaapajjatha. pa.tisalliinassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yathaabhuuta.m okkhaayatii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa ko.t.thiko bhagavanta.m etadavoca ^a^M2.0357^ea^ -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti.

[01] ``ya.m kho, ko.t.thika, anicca.m tatra te chando pahaatabbo. ki~nca, ko.t.thika, anicca.m? cakkhu kho, ko.t.thika, anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. ruupaa aniccaa; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. cakkhusamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo...pe0... jivhaa aniccaa; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. rasaa ^a^T4.0183^ea^ aniccaa; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. jivhaasamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. yampida.m ^a^V2.0148^ea^ jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo...pe0... mano anicco; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. dhammaa aniccaa; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. manovi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. manosamphasso anicco; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca.m; tatra te chando pahaatabbo. ya.m kho, ko.t.thika, anicca.m tatra te chando pahaatabbo''ti. sattama.m.

[03] ``mano vaa, aavuso, dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m abhavissa, dhammaa vaa manassa sa.myojana.m, nayida.m brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayetha sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yasmaa ca kho, aavuso, na mano dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m, na dhammaa manassa sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m, tasmaa brahmacariyavaaso pa~n~naayati sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya.

[03] ``iminaapeta.m ^a^M2.0374^ea^, aavuso, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa na cakkhu ruupaana.m sa.myojana.m, na ruupaa cakkhussa sa.myojana.m. ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m...pe0... na jivhaa rasaana.m sa.myojana.m...pe0... na mano dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m, na dhammaa manassa sa.myojana.m. ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m.

[01] ``sa.mvijjati kho, aavuso, bhagavato cakkhu. passati bhagavaa cakkhunaa ruupa.m. chandaraago bhagavato natthi. suvimuttacitto bhagavaa. sa.mvijjati kho, aavuso, bhagavato sota.m. su.naati bhagavaa sotena sadda.m. chandaraago ^a^T4.0206^ea^ bhagavato natthi. suvimuttacitto bhagavaa. sa.mvijjati kho, aavuso, bhagavato ghaana.m. ghaayati bhagavaa ghaanena gandha.m. chandaraago bhagavato natthi. suvimuttacitto ^a^V2.0169^ea^ bhagavaa. sa.mvijjati kho, aavuso, bhagavato jivhaa. saayati bhagavaa jivhaaya rasa.m. chandaraago bhagavato natthi. suvimuttacitto bhagavaa. sa.mvijjati kho, aavuso, bhagavato kaayo. phusati bhagavaa kaayena pho.t.thabba.m. chandaraago bhagavato natthi. suvimuttacitto bhagavaa. sa.mvijjati kho, aavuso, bhagavato mano. vijaanaati bhagavaa manasaa ^a^P4.0165^ea^ dhamma.m. chandaraago bhagavato natthi. suvimuttacitto bhagavaa.

[03] ``iminaa kho eta.m, aavuso, pariyaayena veditabba.m yathaa na cakkhu ruupaana.m sa.myojana.m, na ruupaa cakkhussa sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. na sota.m... na ghaana.m... na jivhaa rasaana.m sa.myojana.m, na rasaa jivhaaya sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. na kaayo... na mano dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m, na dhammaa manassa sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 233^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca kaamabhuu kosambiya.m viharanti ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa kaamabhuu saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^T4.0207^ea^ aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m ^a^M2.0375^ea^ katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa kaamabhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso aananda, cakkhu ruupaana.m sa.myojana.m, ruupaa cakkhussa sa.myojana.m...pe0... jivhaa rasaana.m sa.myojana.m, rasaa jivhaaya sa.myojana.m...pe0... mano dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m, dhammaa manassa sa.myojana''nti?

[03] ``na kho, aavuso kaamabhuu {kaamabhu (sii0) moggallaane 65-ge vaati sutta.m passitabba.m}, cakkhu ruupaana.m sa.myojana.m, na ruupaa cakkhussa sa.myojana.m. ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m...pe0... na jivhaa rasaana.m ^a^V2.0170^ea^ sa.myojana.m, na rasaa jivhaaya sa.myojana.m...pe0... na mano dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m, na dhammaa manassa sa.myojana.m. ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P4.0166^ea^, aavuso, kaa.lo ca baliibaddo odaato ca baliibaddo ekena daamena vaa yottena vaa sa.myuttaa assu. yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `kaa.lo baliibaddo odaatassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana.m, odaato baliibaddo kaa.lassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana'nti, sammaa nu kho so vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``na kho, aavuso, kaa.lo baliibaddo odaatassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana.m, napi odaato baliibaddo kaa.lassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana.m. yena ca kho te ekena daamena vaa yottena vaa sa.myuttaa, ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. evameva kho ^a^T4.0208^ea^, aavuso, na cakkhu ruupaana.m sa.myojana.m, na ruupaa cakkhussa sa.myojana.m...pe0... na jivhaa...pe0... na mano...pe0... ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago, ta.m tattha sa.myojana''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca aanando aayasmaa ca udaayii kosambiya.m viharanti ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa udaayii saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aanandena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa udaayii aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``yatheva ^a^M2.0376^ea^ nu kho, aavuso aananda, aya.m kaayo bhagavataa anekapariyaayena akkhaato viva.to pakaasito -- `itipaaya.m kaayo anattaa'ti, sakkaa evameva vi~n~naa.na.m pida.m aacikkhitu.m desetu.m pa~n~napetu.m pa.t.thapetu.m vivaritu.m vibhajitu.m uttaaniikaatu.m -- `itipida.m vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa'''ti?

[03] ``yatheva kho, aavuso udaayii, aya.m kaayo bhagavataa anekapariyaayena akkhaato viva.to pakaasito -- `itipaaya.m kaayo anattaa'ti, sakkaa evameva vi~n~naa.na.m pida.m aacikkhitu.m ^a^V2.0171^ea^ desetu.m pa~n~napetu.m pa.t.thapetu.m vivaritu.m vibhajitu.m uttaaniikaatu.m -- `itipida.m vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa'''ti.

[03] ``cakkhu~nca, aavuso, pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti ^a^P4.0167^ea^. ``yo caavuso, hetu, yo ca paccayo cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, so ca hetu, so ca paccayo sabbena sabba.m ^a^T4.0209^ea^ sabbathaa sabba.m aparisesa.m nirujjheyya. api nu kho cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m pa~n~naayethaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``iminaapi kho eta.m, aavuso, pariyaayena bhagavataa akkhaata.m viva.ta.m pakaasita.m -- `itipida.m vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa'''ti...pe0....

[03] ``jivha~ncaavuso, pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati jivhaavi~n~naa.na''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``yo caavuso, hetu yo ca paccayo jivhaavi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, so ca hetu, so ca paccayo sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m aparisesa.m nirujjheyya, api nu kho jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m pa~n~naayethaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``iminaapi kho eta.m, aavuso, pariyaayena bhagavataa akkhaata.m viva.ta.m pakaasita.m -- `itipida.m vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa'''ti...pe0....

[03] ``mana~ncaavuso, pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na''nti? ``evamaavuso''ti. ``yo caavuso, hetu, yo ca paccayo manovi~n~naa.nassa uppaadaaya, so ca hetu, so ca paccayo sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m aparisesa.m nirujjheyya, api nu kho manovi~n~naa.na.m pa~n~naayethaa''ti? ``no heta.m, aavuso''. ``iminaapi kho eta.m, aavuso, pariyaayena bhagavataa akkhaata.m viva.ta.m pakaasita.m -- `itipida.m vi~n~naa.na.m anattaa'''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, puriso saaratthiko saaragavesii saarapariyesana.m caramaano ti.nha.m ku.thaari.m aadaaya vana.m paviseyya. so tattha ^a^M2.0377^ea^ passeyya mahanta.m kadalikkhandha.m uju.m nava.m akukkukajaata.m {akukku.takajaata.m (syaa0 ka.m0), akukkaja.tajaata.m (ka0)}. tamena.m muule chindeyya ^a^T4.0210^ea^ ^a^P4.0168^ea^; muule chetvaa agge chindeyya; agge chetvaa pattava.t.ti.m vinibbhujeyya {vinibbhujjeyya (pii0), vinibbhajjeyya (syaa0 ka.m0)}. so tattha pheggumpi naadhigaccheyya, kuto saara.m! evameva kho, aavuso, bhikkhu chasu phassaayatanesu nevattaana.m na attaniya.m samanupassati. so eva.m asamanupassanto {eva.m samanupassanto (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} na ki~nci loke ^a^V2.0172^ea^ upaadiyati. anupaadiya.m na paritassati. aparitassa.m paccatta~n~neva parinibbaayati. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 235^b^.^eb^ ``aadittapariyaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ca, bhikkhave, aadittapariyaayo, dhammapariyaayo? vara.m, bhikkhave, tattaaya ayosalaakaaya aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya {sa~njotibhuutaaya (syaa0 ka.m0)} cakkhundriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m, na tveva cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu anubya~njanaso nimittaggaaho. nimittassaadagathita.m {nimittassaadagadhita.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) ma0 ni0 3.316-317} vaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.theyya, anubya~njanassaadagathita.m vaa tasmi~nce samaye kaala.m kareyya, .thaanameta.m vijjati, ya.m dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m gaccheyya -- niraya.m vaa, tiracchaanayoni.m vaa. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinava.m disvaa eva.m vadaami.

[03] ``vara.m, bhikkhave, ti.nhena ayosa"nkunaa aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena sotindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m, na tveva sotavi~n~neyyesu saddesu anubya~njanaso nimittaggaaho. nimittassaadagathita.m vaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.theyya ^a^T4.0211^ea^, anubya~njanassaadagathita.m vaa tasmi~nce samaye kaala"nkareyya, .thaanameta.m vijjati, ya.m dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m gaccheyya -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinava.m disvaa eva.m vadaami ^a^P4.0169^ea^.

[03] ``vara.m ^a^M2.0378^ea^, bhikkhave, ti.nhena nakhacchedanena aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena ghaanindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m, na tveva ghaanavi~n~neyyesu gandhesu anubya~njanaso nimittaggaaho. nimittassaadagathita.m vaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.theyya, anubya~njanassaadagathita.m vaa tasmi~nce samaye kaala.m kareyya. .thaanameta.m vijjati, ya.m dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m gaccheyya -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinava.m disvaa eva.m vadaami.

[03] ``vara.m, bhikkhave, ti.nhena khurena aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena jivhindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m, na tveva jivhaavi~n~neyyesu rasesu anubya~njanaso nimittaggaaho. nimittassaadagathita.m ^a^V2.0173^ea^ vaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.theyya, anubya~njanassaadagathita.m vaa tasmi~nce samaye kaala.m kareyya. .thaanameta.m vijjati, ya.m dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m gaccheyya -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinava.m disvaa eva.m vadaami.

[03] ``vara.m, bhikkhave, ti.nhaaya sattiyaa aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya kaayindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m, na tveva kaayavi~n~neyyesu pho.t.thabbesu anubya~njanaso nimittaggaaho. nimittassaadagathita.m vaa, bhikkhave, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.theyya, anubya~njanassaadagathita.m vaa tasmi~nce ^a^T4.0212^ea^ samaye kaala.m kareyya. .thaanameta.m vijjati, ya.m dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m gaccheyya -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, aadiinava.m disvaa eva.m vadaami.

[03] ``vara.m, bhikkhave, sotta.m. sotta.m kho panaaha.m, bhikkhave, va~njha.m jiivitaana.m vadaami, aphala.m jiivitaana.m vadaami, momuuha.m jiivitaana.m vadaami, na tveva tathaaruupe vitakke vitakkeyya yathaaruupaana.m vitakkaana.m vasa.m gato sa"ngha.m bhindeyya. ima.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0170^ea^, va~njha.m jiivitaana.m aadiinava.m disvaa eva.m vadaami.

[03] ``tattha, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ti.t.thatu taava tattaaya ayosalaakaaya aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya cakkhundriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m. handaaha.m idameva manasi karomi -- iti cakkhu anicca.m, ruupaa aniccaa, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, cakkhusamphasso anicco, yampida.m cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca.m''' {anicca''nti (?)}.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu ^a^M2.0379^ea^ taava ti.nhena ayosa"nkunaa aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena sotindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m. handaaha.m idameva manasi karomi -- iti sota.m anicca.m, saddaa aniccaa, sotavi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, sotasamphasso anicco, yampida.m sotasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca.m.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu ^a^V2.0174^ea^ taava ti.nhena nakhacchedanena aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena ghaanindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m. handaaha.m idameva manasi karomi -- iti ^a^T4.0213^ea^ ghaana.m anicca.m, gandhaa aniccaa, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, ghaanasamphasso anicco, yampida.m ghaanasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m...pe0... tampi anicca.m.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu taava ti.nhena khurena aadittena sampajjalitena sajotibhuutena jivhindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m. handaaha.m idameva manasi karomi -- iti jivhaa aniccaa, rasaa aniccaa, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, jivhaasamphasso anicco, yampida.m jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati...pe0... tampi anicca.m.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu taava ti.nhaaya sattiyaa aadittaaya sampajjalitaaya sajotibhuutaaya kaayindriya.m sampalima.t.tha.m. handaaha.m idameva manasi karomi -- iti kaayo anicco, pho.t.thabbaa aniccaa ^a^P4.0171^ea^, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, kaayasamphasso anicco, yampida.m kaayasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m...pe0... tampi anicca.m.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu taava sotta.m. handaaha.m idameva manasi karomi -- iti mano anicco, dhammaa aniccaa, manovi~n~naa.na.m anicca.m, manosamphasso anicco, yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tampi anicca.m''.

[03] ``eva.m passa.m, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, ruupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati...pe0... yampida.m manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati vedayita.m sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa tasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m ^a^T4.0214^ea^ kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, aadittapariyaayo, dhammapariyaayo''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ``hatthesu ^a^V2.0175^ea^ ^a^M2.0380^ea^, bhikkhave, sati aadaananikkhepana.m pa~n~naayati; paadesu sati abhikkamapa.tikkamo pa~n~naayati; pabbesu sati sami~njanapasaara.na.m pa~n~naayati; kucchismi.m sati jighacchaa pipaasaa pa~n~naayati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmi.m sati cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0... jivhaaya sati jivhaasamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0... manasmi.m sati manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0....

[03] ``hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati aadaananikkhepana.m na pa~n~naayati; paadesu asati abhikkamapa.tikkamo na pa~n~naayati; pabbesu asati sami~njanapasaara.na.m na pa~n~naayati; kucchismi.m asati jighacchaa pipaasaa na pa~n~naayati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmi.m asati cakkhusamphassapaccayaa ^a^P4.0172^ea^ nuppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0... jivhaaya asati jivhaasamphassapaccayaa nuppajjati...pe0... manasmi.m asati manosamphassapaccayaa nuppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha''nti. navama.m.

[03] 237^b^.^eb^ ``hatthesu, bhikkhave, sati aadaananikkhepana.m hoti; paadesu sati abhikkamapa.tikkamo hoti; pabbesu sati sami~njanapasaara.na.m hoti; kucchismi.m sati jighacchaa pipaasaa hoti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmi.m sati cakkhusamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0... ^a^T4.0215^ea^ jivhaaya sati...pe0... manasmi.m sati manosamphassapaccayaa uppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0....

[03] ``hatthesu, bhikkhave, asati aadaananikkhepana.m na hoti; paadesu asati abhikkamapa.tikkamo na hoti; pabbesu asati sami~njanapasaara.na.m na hoti; kucchismi.m asati jighacchaa pipaasaa na hoti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, cakkhusmi.m asati cakkhusamphassapaccayaa nuppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha.m...pe0... jivhaaya asati jivhaasamphassapaccayaa ^a^V2.0176^ea^ nuppajjati...pe0... manasmi.m asati manosamphassapaccayaa nuppajjati ajjhatta.m sukha.m dukkha''nti. dasama.m.
