[22] hatthapaaduupamaa dveti, vaggo tena pavuccatiiti..

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^T4.0216^ea^, bhikkhave, cattaaro aasiivisaa uggatejaa ghoravisaa. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhappa.tikuulo. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ime te, ambho purisa, cattaaro aasiivisaa uggatejaa ghoravisaa kaalena ^a^P4.0173^ea^ kaala.m vu.t.thaapetabbaa, kaalena kaala.m nhaapetabbaa, kaalena kaala.m bhojetabbaa, kaalena kaala.m sa.mvesetabbaa {pavesetabbaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}. yadaa ca kho te, ambho purisa, imesa.m catunna.m aasiivisaana.m uggatejaana.m ghoravisaana.m a~n~nataro vaa a~n~nataro vaa kuppissati, tato tva.m, ambho purisa, mara.na.m vaa nigacchasi, mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. ya.m te, ambho purisa, kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'''ti.

[03] ``atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso bhiito catunna.m aasiivisaana.m uggatejaana.m ghoravisaana.m yena vaa tena vaa palaayetha. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ime kho, ambho purisa, pa~nca vadhakaa paccatthikaa pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhaa, yattheva na.m passissaama tattheva jiivitaa voropessaamaati. ya.m te, ambho purisa, kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V2.0177^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, puriso bhiito catunna.m aasiivisaana.m uggatejaana.m ghoravisaana.m, bhiito pa~ncanna.m vadhakaana.m paccatthikaana.m yena vaa ^a^T4.0217^ea^ tena vaa palaayetha. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `aya.m te, ambho purisa, cha.t.tho antaracaro vadhako ukkhittaasiko pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandho yattheva na.m passissaami tattheva siro paatessaamiiti. ya.m te, ambho purisa, kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^M2.0382^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, puriso bhiito catunna.m aasiivisaana.m uggatejaana.m ghoravisaana.m, bhiito pa~ncanna.m vadhakaana.m paccatthikaana.m, bhiito cha.t.thassa antaracarassa vadhakassa ukkhittaasikassa yena vaa tena vaa palaayetha. so passeyya su~n~na.m gaama.m. ya~n~nadeva ghara.m paviseyya rittaka~n~neva paviseyya tucchaka~n~neva paviseyya su~n~naka~n~neva paviseyya. ya~n~nadeva bhaajana.m parimaseyya rittaka~n~neva parimaseyya tucchaka~n~neva parimaseyya su~n~naka~n~neva parimaseyya. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `idaani, ambho purisa, ima.m su~n~na.m gaama.m coraa gaamaghaatakaa pavisanti {vadhissanti (sii0 pii0)}. ya.m te, ambho purisa, kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'''ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^P4.0174^ea^ kho so, bhikkhave, puriso bhiito catunna.m aasiivisaana.m uggatejaana.m ghoravisaana.m, bhiito pa~ncanna.m vadhakaana.m paccatthikaana.m, bhiito cha.t.thassa antaracarassa vadhakassa ukkhittaasikassa, bhiito coraana.m gaamaghaatakaana.m yena vaa tena vaa palaayetha. so passeyya mahanta.m udaka.n.nava.m orima.m tiira.m saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhaya.m, paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhaya.m. na cassa naavaa santaara.nii uttarasetu vaa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya. atha ^a^T4.0218^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa evamassa -- `aya.m kho mahaaudaka.n.navo orima.m tiira.m saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhaya.m, paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhaya.m, natthi ca {na cassa (sii0 ka0), natthassa (syaa0 ka.m0)} naavaa santaara.nii uttarasetu vaa apaaraa paara.m gamanaaya. ya.mnuunaaha.m ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m sa.mka.d.dhitvaa kulla.m bandhitvaa ta.m kulla.m nissaaya hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m gaccheyya'''nti.

[03] ``atha kho so, bhikkhave, puriso ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m sa.mka.d.dhitvaa kulla.m bandhitvaa ta.m kulla.m nissaaya hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayamamaano sotthinaa paara.m gaccheyya, ti.n.no paara"ngato {paaragato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} thale ti.t.thati braahma.no.

[03] ``upamaa ^a^V2.0178^ea^ kho myaaya.m, bhikkhave, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya~ncettha {aya.m cevettha (sii0)} attho -- cattaaro aasiivisaa uggatejaa ghoravisaati kho, bhikkhave, catunneta.m mahaabhuutaana.m adhivacana.m -- pathaviidhaatuyaa, aapodhaatuyaa, tejodhaatuyaa, vaayodhaatuyaa.

[03] ``pa~nca ^a^M2.0383^ea^ vadhakaa paccatthikaati kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandhassa, vedanupaadaanakkhandhassa, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandhassa, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandhassa, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandhassa.
[03] ``cha.t.tho antaracaro vadhako ukkhittaasikoti kho, bhikkhave, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m.

[03] ``su~n~no gaamoti kho, bhikkhave, channeta.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m. cakkhuto cepi na.m, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii upaparikkhati rittaka~n~neva khaayati, tucchaka~n~neva ^a^P4.0175^ea^ khaayati, su~n~naka~n~neva ^a^T4.0219^ea^ khaayati...pe0... jivhaato cepi na.m, bhikkhave...pe0... manato cepi na.m, bhikkhave, pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii upaparikkhati rittaka~n~neva khaayati, tucchaka~n~neva khaayati, su~n~naka~n~neva khaayati.

[03] ``coraa gaamaghaatakaati kho, bhikkhave, channeta.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m. cakkhu, bhikkhave, ha~n~nati manaapaamanaapesu ruupesu; sota.m, bhikkhave...pe0... ghaana.m, bhikkhave...pe0... jivhaa, bhikkhave, ha~n~nati manaapaamanaapesu rasesu; kaayo, bhikkhave...pe0... mano, bhikkhave, ha~n~nati manaapaamanaapesu dhammesu.
[03] ``mahaa udaka.n.navoti kho, bhikkhave, catunneta.m oghaana.m adhivacana.m -- kaamoghassa, bhavoghassa, di.t.thoghassa, avijjoghassa.
[03] ``orima.m tiira.m saasa"nka.m sappa.tibhayanti kho, bhikkhave, sakkaayasseta.m adhivacana.m.
[03] ``paarima.m tiira.m khema.m appa.tibhayanti kho, bhikkhave, nibbaanasseta.m adhivacana.m.
[03] ``kullanti ^a^V2.0179^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, ariyasseta.m a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.
[03] ``tassa hatthehi ca paadehi ca vaayaamoti kho, bhikkhave, viiriyaarambhasseta.m adhivacana.m.
[03] ``ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.noti kho, bhikkhave, arahato eta.m adhivacana''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 239^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^T4.0220^ea^ ^a^M2.0384^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa aaraddhaa hoti aasavaana.m khayaaya. katamehi tiihi? indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, bhojane matta~n~nuu, jaagariya.m anuyutto.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P4.0176^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti, naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m. tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriya.m; cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati manindriya.m; manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, subhuumiya.m caatumahaapathe aaja~n~naratho yutto assa .thito odhastapatodo {odhatapatodo (syaa0 ka.m0), odhasatapatodo (pii0)}. tamena.m dakkho yoggaacariyo assadammasaarathi abhiruhitvaa vaamena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvaa, dakkhi.nena hatthena patoda.m gahetvaa, yenicchaka.m yadicchaka.m saareyyapi paccaasaareyyapi. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m aarakkhaaya ^a^T4.0221^ea^ sikkhati ^a^V2.0180^ea^, sa.myamaaya sikkhati, damaaya sikkhati, upasamaaya sikkhati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya, na madaaya, na ma.n.danaaya, na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa, yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa, brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati, anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. seyyathaapi ^a^P4.0177^ea^, bhikkhave, puriso va.na.m aalimpeyya ^a^M2.0385^ea^ yaavadeva rohanatthaaya {ropanatthaaya (sii0 pii0), sevanatthaaya (syaa0 ka.m0), gopanatthaaya (ka0)}, seyyathaa vaa pana akkha.m abbha~njeyya yaavadeva bhaarassa nitthara.natthaaya; eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya, na madaaya, na ma.n.danaaya, na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa, yaapanaaya, vihi.msuuparatiyaa, brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati, anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m ^a^T4.0222^ea^ kappeti paade paada.m accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu di.t.theva dhamme sukhasomanassabahulo viharati, yoni cassa aaraddhaa hoti aasavaana.m khayaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, kummo kacchapo saayanhasamaya.m anunadiitiire gocarapasuto ahosi. si"ngaalopi {sigaalopi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kho, bhikkhave, saayanhasamaya.m anunadiitiire gocarapasuto ahosi. addasaa ^a^V2.0181^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, kummo kacchapo si"ngaala.m duuratova gocarapasuta.m. disvaana so.n.dipa~ncamaani a"ngaani ^a^P4.0178^ea^ sake kapaale samodahitvaa appossukko tu.nhiibhuuto sa"nkasaayati. si"ngaalopi kho, bhikkhave, addasa kumma.m kacchapa.m duuratova gocarapasuta.m. disvaana yena kummo kacchapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa kumma.m kacchapa.m paccupa.t.thito ahosi -- `yadaaya.m kummo kacchapo so.n.dipa~ncamaana.m a"ngaana.m a~n~natara.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa a"nga.m abhininnaamessati, tattheva na.m gahetvaa uddaalitvaa khaadissaamii'ti. yadaa kho, bhikkhave, kummo kacchapo ^a^M2.0386^ea^ so.n.dipa~ncamaana.m a"ngaana.m a~n~natara.m vaa a~n~natara.m vaa a"nga.m na abhininnaami, atha si"ngaalo kummamhaa nibbijja pakkaami, otaara.m alabhamaano.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, tumhepi maaro paapimaa satata.m samita.m paccupa.t.thito -- `appeva naamaaha.m imesa.m cakkhuto ^a^T4.0223^ea^ vaa otaara.m labheyya.m...pe0... jivhaato vaa otaara.m labheyya.m...pe0... manato vaa otaara.m labheyya'nti. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, indriyesu guttadvaaraa viharatha. cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa maa nimittaggaahino ahuvattha, maa anubya~njanaggaahino. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjatha, rakkhatha cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjatha. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya maa nimittaggaahino ahuvattha, maa anubya~njanaggaahino. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjatha, rakkhatha manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjatha. yato tumhe, bhikkhave, indriyesu guttadvaaraa viharissatha, atha tumhehipi maaro paapimaa nibbijja pakkamissati, otaara.m alabhamaano -- kummamhaava si"ngaalo''ti.
[21] ``kummo ^a^P4.0179^ea^ a"ngaani sake kapaale,
[27] samodaha.m bhikkhu manovitakke.
[26] anissito a~n~namahe.thayaano,
[22] parinibbuto nuupavadeyya ka~ncii''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 241^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0182^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire. addasaa kho bhagavaa mahanta.m daarukkhandha.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa sotena vuyhamaana.m. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amu.m ^a^T4.0224^ea^ mahanta.m daarukkhandha.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa sotena vuyhamaana''nti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``sace so, bhikkhave, daarukkhandho na orima.m tiira.m upagacchati, na paarima.m tiira.m upagacchati, na majjhe sa.msiidissati, na thale ussiidissati, na manussaggaaho gahessati, na ^a^M2.0387^ea^ amanussaggaaho gahessati, na aava.t.taggaaho gahessati, na antopuuti bhavissati; eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, daarukkhandho samuddaninno bhavissati samuddapo.no samuddapabbhaaro. ta.m kissa hetu? samuddaninno, bhikkhave, ga"ngaaya nadiyaa soto samuddapo.no samuddapabbhaaro.

[03] ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, sace tumhepi na orima.m tiira.m upagacchatha, na paarima.m tiira.m upagacchatha; na majjhe sa.msiidissatha, na thale ussiidissatha, na manussaggaaho gahessati, na amanussaggaaho gahessati, na aava.t.taggaaho gahessati, na antopuutii bhavissatha; eva.m tumhe ^a^P4.0180^ea^, bhikkhave, nibbaananinnaa bhavissatha nibbaanapo.naa nibbaanapabbhaaraa. ta.m kissa hetu? nibbaananinnaa, bhikkhave, sammaadi.t.thi nibbaanapo.naa nibbaanapabbhaaraa''ti. eva.m vutte, a~n~nataro bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, orima.m tiira.m, ki.m paarima.m tiira.m, ko majjhe sa.msaado {sa.msiido (ka0), sa.msiidito (syaa0 ka.m0)}, ko thale ussaado, ko manussaggaaho, ko amanussaggaaho, ko aava.t.taggaaho, ko antopuutibhaavo''ti?

[03] ```orima.m tiira'nti kho, bhikkhu, channeta.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m. `paarima.m tiira'nti kho ^a^T4.0225^ea^, bhikkhu, channeta.m baahiraana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m. `majjhe sa.msaado'ti kho, bhikkhu, nandiiraagasseta.m adhivacana.m. `thale ussaado'ti kho, bhikkhu, asmimaanasseta.m adhivacana.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhu, manussaggaaho? idha, bhikkhu, gihiihi sa.msa.t.tho {gihisa.msa.t.tho (ka0)} viharati, sahanandii ^a^V2.0183^ea^ sahasokii, sukhitesu sukhito, dukkhitesu dukkhito, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu attanaa tesu yoga.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, manussaggaaho.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhu, amanussaggaaho? idha, bhikkhu, ekacco a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, amanussaggaaho. `aava.t.taggaaho'ti kho, bhikkhu, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhu, antopuutibhaavo? idha, bhikkhu, ekacco dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asucisa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no ^a^M2.0388^ea^ sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii ^a^P4.0181^ea^ brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhu, `antopuutibhaavo'''ti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena nando gopaalako bhagavato aviduure .thito hoti. atha kho nando gopaalako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aha.m kho, bhante, na orima.m tiira.m upagacchaami, na paarima.m tiira.m upagacchaami, na majjhe sa.msiidissaami, na ^a^T4.0226^ea^ thale ussiidissaami, na ma.m manussaggaaho gahessati, na amanussaggaaho gahessati, na aava.t.taggaaho gahessati, na antopuuti bhavissaami. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. ``tena hi tva.m, nanda, saamikaana.m gaavo niyyaatehii''ti {niiyyaadehiiti (sii0), niyyaadehiiti (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. ``gamissanti, bhante, gaavo vacchagiddhiniyo''ti. ``niyyaateheva tva.m, nanda, saamikaana.m gaavo''ti. atha kho nando gopaalako saamikaana.m gaavo niyyaatetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``niyyaatitaa {niyyaataa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0 sii0 a.t.tha0)}, bhante, saamikaana.m gaavo. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. alattha kho nando gopaalako bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno ca panaayasmaa nando eko vuupaka.t.tho...pe0... a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa nando arahata.m ahosiiti. catuttha.m.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0184^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kimilaaya.m {kimbilaaya.m (sii0 pii0), kimmilaaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} viharati ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire. addasaa kho bhagavaa mahanta.m daarukkhandha.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa sotena vuyhamaana.m. disvaana bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amu.m mahanta.m ^a^P4.0182^ea^ daarukkhandha.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa sotena vuyhamaana''nti? ``eva.m bhante''...pe0... eva.m vutte, aayasmaa kimilo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ki.m nu kho, bhante, orima.m tiira.m...pe0... katamo ca, kimila, antopuutibhaavo. idha, kimila, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m ^a^T4.0227^ea^ aapanno hoti yathaaruupaaya aapattiyaa na vu.t.thaana.m pa~n~naayati. aya.m vuccati, kimila, antopuutibhaavoti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0389^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame. tena kho pana samayena kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m nava.m santhaagaara.m {sandhaagaara.m (ka0)} acirakaarita.m hoti anajjhaavu.t.tha.m {anajjhaavuttha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena. atha kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m nava.m santhaagaara.m acirakaarita.m {acirakaarita.m hoti (ka0)} anajjhaavu.t.tha.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena ^a^P4.0183^ea^. ta.m, bhante, bhagavaa pa.thama.m paribhu~njatu. bhagavataa pa.thama.m paribhutta.m pacchaa kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa paribhu~njissanti. tadassa kaapilavatthavaana.m sakyaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena nava.m santhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sabbasanthari.m {sabbasanthari.m santhata.m (ka0)} santhaagaara.m santharitvaa aasanaani pa~n~naapetvaa udakama.nika.m pati.t.thaapetvaa telappadiipa.m aaropetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sabbasantharisanthata.m {sabbasanthari.m santhata.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, bhante, santhaagaara.m, aasanaani pa~n~nattaani, udakama.niko pati.t.thaapito, telappadiipo ^a^T4.0228^ea^ aaropito. yassa daani ^a^V2.0185^ea^, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena nava.m santhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa paade pakkhaaletvaa santhaagaara.m pavisitvaa majjhima.m thambha.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi. bhikkhusa"nghopi kho paade pakkhaaletvaa santhaagaara.m pavisitvaa pacchima.m bhitti.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa paade pakkhaaletvaa santhaagaara.m pavisitvaa puratthima.m bhitti.m nissaaya pacchimaabhimukhaa nisiidi.msu bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. atha kho bhagavaa kaapilavatthave sakye bahudeva ratti.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa uyyojesi -- ``abhikkantaa kho, gotamaa, ratti. yassa daani kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti ^a^M2.0390^ea^. ``eva.m ^a^P4.0184^ea^, bhante''ti kho kaapilavatthavaa sakyaa bhagavato pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu.

[03] atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantesu kaapilavatthavesu sakyesu aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesi -- ``vigatathinamiddho kho, moggallaana, bhikkhusa"ngho. pa.tibhaatu ta.m, moggallaana, bhikkhuuna.m dhammii kathaa. pi.t.thi me aagilaayati; tamaha.m aayamissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napetvaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi ^a^T4.0229^ea^, paade paada.m accaadhaaya, sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa. tatra kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca -- ``avassutapariyaaya~nca vo, aavuso, desessaami, anavassutapariyaaya~nca. ta.m su.naatha, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] ``katha.m, aavuso, avassuto hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe adhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati viharati parittacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti ^a^P4.0185^ea^...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati ^a^V2.0186^ea^ parittacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. aya.m vuccati, aavuso, bhikkhu avassuto cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu...pe0... avassuto jivhaavi~n~neyyesu rasesu...pe0... avassuto manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu. eva.mvihaari~ncaavuso, bhikkhu.m cakkhuto cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati ^a^T4.0230^ea^ labhateva maaro otaara.m, labhati maaro aaramma.na.m...pe0... jivhaato cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, labhateva {labhetha (ka0)} maaro otaara.m ^a^M2.0391^ea^, labhati {labhetha (ka0)} maaro aaramma.na.m...pe0... manato cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, labhateva maaro otaara.m, labhati maaro aaramma.na.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, na.laagaara.m vaa ti.naagaara.m vaa sukkha.m kolaapa.m terovassika.m. puratthimaaya cepi na.m disaaya puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya upasa"nkameyya, labhetheva {labhetha (ka0)} aggi otaara.m, labhetha aggi aaramma.na.m; pacchimaaya cepi na.m disaaya puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya upasa"nkameyya...pe0... uttaraaya cepi na.m disaaya...pe0... dakkhi.naaya cepi na.m disaaya...pe0... he.t.thimato cepi na.m...pe0... uparimato cepi na.m... yato kutoci cepi na.m puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya upasa"nkameyya, labhetheva aggi otaara.m labhetha aggi aaramma.na.m. evameva kho, aavuso, eva.mvihaari.m bhikkhu.m cakkhuto cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, labhateva maaro otaara.m, labhati maaro aaramma.na.m...pe0... jivhaato cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati...pe0... manato cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, labhateva maaro otaara.m, labhati maaro aaramma.na.m. eva.mvihaari~ncaavuso, bhikkhu.m ruupaa adhibha.msu, na bhikkhu ruupe adhibhosi; saddaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu, na bhikkhu ^a^P4.0186^ea^ sadde adhibhosi; gandhaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu, na bhikkhu gandhe adhibhosi; rasaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu, na bhikkhu rase adhibhosi; pho.t.thabbaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu, na bhikkhu pho.t.thabbe adhibhosi ^a^T4.0231^ea^; dhammaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu, na bhikkhu dhamme adhibhosi. aya.m vuccataavuso, bhikkhu ruupaadhibhuuto, saddaadhibhuuto, gandhaadhibhuuto, rasaadhibhuuto, pho.t.thabbaadhibhuuto, dhammaadhibhuuto, adhibhuuto, anadhibhuu, {anadhibhuuto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} adhibha.msu na.m paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa sadaraa dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa. eva.m kho, aavuso, avassuto hoti.

[03] ``katha~ncaavuso, anavassuto hoti? idhaavuso, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati appamaa.nacetaso ^a^V2.0187^ea^, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... manasaa ^a^M2.0392^ea^ dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati appamaa.nacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. aya.m vuccataavuso, bhikkhu anavassuto cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu...pe0... anavassuto manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu. eva.mvihaari~ncaavuso, bhikkhu.m cakkhuto cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, neva labhati maaro otaara.m, na labhati maaro aaramma.na.m...pe0... jivhaato cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati...pe0... manato cepi ^a^T4.0232^ea^ na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, neva labhati maaro otaara.m, na labhati maaro aaramma.na.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, aavuso, kuu.taagaara.m vaa saalaa vaa bahalamattikaa ^a^P4.0187^ea^ addaavalepanaa. puratthimaaya cepi na.m disaaya puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya upasa"nkameyya, neva labhetha aggi otaara.m, na labhetha aggi aaramma.na.m...pe0... pacchimaaya cepi na.m... uttaraaya cepi na.m... dakkhi.naaya cepi na.m... he.t.thimato cepi na.m... uparimato cepi na.m... yato kutoci cepi na.m puriso aadittaaya ti.nukkaaya upasa"nkameyya, neva labhetha aggi otaara.m, na labhetha aggi aaramma.na.m. evameva kho, aavuso, eva.mvihaari.m bhikkhu.m cakkhuto cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, neva labhati maaro otaara.m, na labhati maaro aaramma.na.m...pe0... manato cepi na.m maaro upasa"nkamati, neva labhati maaro otaara.m, na labhati maaro aaramma.na.m. eva.mvihaarii caavuso, bhikkhu ruupe adhibhosi, na ruupaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu; sadde bhikkhu adhibhosi, na saddaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu; gandhe bhikkhu adhibhosi, na gandhaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu; rase bhikkhu adhibhosi, na rasaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu; pho.t.thabbe bhikkhu adhibhosi, na pho.t.thabbaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu; dhamme bhikkhu adhibhosi, na dhammaa bhikkhu.m adhibha.msu. aya.m vuccataavuso, bhikkhu ruupaadhibhuu, saddaadhibhuu, gandhaadhibhuu, rasaadhibhuu, pho.t.thabbaadhibhuu, dhammaadhibhuu, adhibhuu, anadhibhuuto {anadhibhuuto kehici kilesehi (ka0)}, adhibhosi te paapake akusale dhamme sa.mkilesike ponobbhavike sadare ^a^T4.0233^ea^ dukkhavipaake aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niye. eva.m kho, aavuso, anavassuto hotii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0393^ea^ ^a^V2.0188^ea^ kho bhagavaa vu.t.thahitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaamoggallaana.m aamantesi -- ``saadhu saadhu, moggallaana! saadhu kho tva.m, moggallaana, bhikkhuuna.m avassutapariyaaya~nca anavassutapariyaaya~nca abhaasii''ti.
[03] idamavoca aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano. samanu~n~no satthaa ^a^P4.0188^ea^ ahosi. attamanaa te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa bhaasita.m abhinandunti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbesa.myeva dukkhadhammaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tathaa kho panassa kaamaa di.t.thaa honti, yathaassa kaame passato, yo kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapari.laaho, so naanuseti. tathaa kho panassa caaro ca vihaaro ca anubuddho hoti, yathaa caranta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa naanusenti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbesa.myeva dukkhadhammaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati? `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti -- eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbesa.myeva dukkhadhammaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kaamaa di.t.thaa honti? yathaassa kaame ^a^T4.0234^ea^ passato, yo kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapari.laaho, so naanuseti. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, a"ngaarakaasu saadhikaporisaa pu.n.naa a"ngaaraana.m viitaccikaana.m viitadhuumaana.m. atha puriso aagaccheyya jiivitukaamo amaritukaamo sukhakaamo dukkhapa.tikuulo. tamena.m dve balavanto purisaa naanaabaahaasu gahetvaa, ta.m a"ngaarakaasu.m upaka.d.dheyyu.m. so iticiiticeva kaaya.m sannaameyya. ta.m kissa hetu? ~naata {~naa.na.m (ka0)} ~nhi, bhikkhave, tassa ^a^P4.0189^ea^ purisassa {purisassa hoti (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), purisassa hetu hoti (ka0) ma0 ni0 2.45} ima.m caaha.m a"ngaarakaasu.m papatissaami, tatonidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigacchissaami mara.namatta.m vaa dukkhanti. evameva kho ^a^M2.0394^ea^, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0189^ea^, bhikkhuno a"ngaarakaasuupamaa kaamaa di.t.thaa honti, yathaassa kaame passato, yo kaamesu kaamacchando kaamasneho kaamamucchaa kaamapari.laaho, so naanuseti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno caaro ca vihaaro ca anubuddho hoti, yathaa caranta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa naanussavanti {naanusenti (ka0)}? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso bahuka.n.taka.m daaya.m paviseyya. tassa puratopi ka.n.tako, pacchatopi ka.n.tako, uttaratopi ka.n.tako, dakkhi.natopi ka.n.tako, he.t.thatopi ka.n.tako, uparitopi ka.n.tako. so satova abhikkameyya, satova pa.tikkameyya -- `maa ma.m ka.n.tako'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, aya.m vuccati ariyassa vinaye ka.n.tako''ti. iti viditvaa {ka.n.dako. ta.m ka.n.dakoti iti viditvaa (sii0)} sa.mvaro ca asa.mvaro ca ^a^T4.0235^ea^ veditabbo.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, asa.mvaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe adhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati parittacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati parittacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asa.mvaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sa.mvaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati appamaa.nacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa ^a^P4.0190^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti...pe0... jivhaa rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati appamaa.nacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa ^a^M2.0395^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa ^a^T4.0236^ea^ aparisesaa nirujjhanti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sa.mvaro hoti.

[03] ``tassa ^a^V2.0190^ea^ ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno eva.m carato eva.m viharato kadaaci karahaci satisammosaa uppajjanti, paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa, dandho, bhikkhave, satuppaado. atha kho na.m khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso divasa.msantatte {divasasantatte (sii0)} ayoka.taahe dve vaa tii.ni vaa udakaphusitaani nipaateyya. dandho, bhikkhave, udakaphusitaana.m nipaato, atha kho na.m khippameva parikkhaya.m pariyaadaana.m gaccheyya. evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno eva.m carato, eva.m viharato kadaaci karahaci satisammosaa uppajjanti paapakaa akusalaa sarasa"nkappaa sa.myojaniyaa, dandho, bhikkhave, satuppaado. atha kho na.m khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno caaro ca vihaaro ca anubuddho hoti; yathaa caranta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa naanussavanti. ta~nce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu.m eva.m caranta.m eva.m viharanta.m raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa, bhogehi abhiha.t.thu.m pavaareyyu.m -- `ehi {eva.m (sii0)}, bho purisa, ki.m te ime kaasaavaa anudahanti, ki.m mu.n.do kapaalamanucarasi, ehi hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu, pu~n~naani ca karohii'ti. so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ^a^T4.0237^ea^ eva.m caranto eva.m viharanto sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^P4.0191^ea^, bhikkhave, ga"ngaa nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa. atha mahaajanakaayo aagaccheyya kuddaala-pi.taka.m aadaaya -- `maya.m ima.m ga"nga.m nadi.m pacchaaninna.m karissaama pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara'nti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, bhikkhave, api nu kho so mahaajanakaayo ga"nga.m nadi.m pacchaaninna.m kareyya pacchaapo.na.m pacchaapabbhaara''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``ga"ngaa, bhante, nadii paaciinaninnaa paaciinapo.naa paaciinapabbhaaraa; saa na sukaraa pacchaaninnaa kaatu.m pacchaapo.naa pacchaapabbhaaraa. yaavadeva ca pana so mahaajanakaayo kilamathassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, ta~nce bhikkhu.m eva.m caranta.m eva.m viharanta.m raajaano vaa raajamahaamattaa ^a^M2.0396^ea^ vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii vaa saalohitaa vaa bhogehi abhiha.t.thu.m pavaareyyu.m -- `ehi, bho purisa, ki.m te ime kaasaavaa anudahanti, ki.m mu.n.do kapaalamanucarasi, ehi hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njassu, pu~n~naani ^a^V2.0191^ea^ ca karohii'ti. so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m caranto eva.m viharanto sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. ta.m kissa hetu? ya~nhi ta.m, bhikkhave, citta.m diigharatta.m vivekaninna.m vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara.m, tathaa {ka~nca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} hiinaayaavattissatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T4.0238^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti? ``yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca ^a^P4.0192^ea^ attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu asantu.t.tho tassa bhikkhussa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena {pa~nhaaveyyaakara.nena (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, yena~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti? ``yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu asantu.t.tho tassa bhikkhussa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena, yena~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti? ``yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu asantu.t.tho tassa bhikkhussa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena, yena~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca -- ``kittaavataa ^a^M2.0397^ea^ nu kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti? ``yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m ^a^V2.0192^ea^, sabba.m ta.m ^a^T4.0239^ea^ nirodhadhammanti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa, kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti.

[03] atha kho so bhikkhu asantu.t.tho tassa bhikkhussa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, yena~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, so bhikkhu ma.m etadavoca -- `yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii'ti. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, asantu.t.tho tassa bhikkhussa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena ^a^P4.0193^ea^, yena~n~nataro bhikkhu tenupasa"nkami.m; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m etadavoca.m -- `kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii'ti? eva.m vutte, bhante, so bhikkhu ma.m etadavoca -- `yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m upaadaanakkhandhaana.m...pe0... catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhammanti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii'ti. atha khvaaha.m, bhante, asantu.t.tho tassa bhikkhussa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.m ( ) {(upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca.m) (ka0)}. kittaavataa ^a^T4.0240^ea^ nu kho, bhante, bhikkhuno dassana.m suvisuddha.m hotii''ti?

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, purisassa ki.msuko adi.t.thapubbo assa. so yena~n~nataro puriso ki.msukassa dassaavii tenupasa"nkameyya. upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m purisa.m eva.m vadeyya -- `kiidiso, bho purisa, ki.msuko'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `kaa.lako kho, ambho purisa, ki.msuko -- seyyathaapi jhaamakhaa.nuu'ti. tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena taadisovassa ki.msuko yathaapi {yathaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0) dutiyavaaraadiisu pana ``yathaapi''tveva dissati} tassa purisassa dassana.m. atha kho, so bhikkhu, puriso asantu.t.tho tassa purisassa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena, yena~n~nataro puriso ki.msukassa dassaavii tenupasa"nkameyya; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m purisa.m eva.m vadeyya -- `kiidiso ^a^M2.0398^ea^, bho purisa, ki.msuko'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `lohitako kho, ambho purisa, ki.msuko -- seyyathaapi ma.msapesii'ti. tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena taadisovassa ki.msuko yathaapi tassa purisassa dassana.m. atha kho so bhikkhu puriso asantu.t.tho tassa purisassa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena, yena~n~nataro puriso ki.msukassa dassaavii tenupasa"nkameyya ^a^V2.0193^ea^; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m purisa.m eva.m vadeyya -- `kiidiso, bho purisa, ki.msuko'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `ociirakajaato {ojiirakajaato (sii0), odiirakajaato (pii0)} kho, ambho purisa, ki.msuko aadinnasipaa.tiko -- seyyathaapi siriiso'ti. tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena taadisovassa ki.msuko, yathaapi tassa purisassa dassana.m. atha kho so bhikkhu puriso asantu.t.tho tassa purisassa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena ^a^P4.0194^ea^, yena~n~nataro puriso ki.msukassa dassaavii tenupasa"nkameyya; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m ^a^T4.0241^ea^ purisa.m eva.m vadeyya -- `kiidiso, bho purisa, ki.msuko'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `bahalapattapalaaso sandacchaayo {sa.n.dacchaayo (syaa0 ka.m0)} kho, ambho purisa, ki.msuko -- seyyathaapi nigrodho'ti. tena kho pana, bhikkhu, samayena taadisovassa ki.msuko, yathaapi tassa purisassa dassana.m. evameva kho, bhikkhu, yathaa yathaa adhimuttaana.m tesa.m sappurisaana.m dassana.m suvisuddha.m hoti, tathaa tathaa kho tehi sappurisehi byaakata.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhu, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m da.lhuddhaapa.m {da.lhuddaapa.m (sii0 pii0)} da.lhapaakaaratora.na.m chadvaara.m. tatrassa dovaariko pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii, a~n~naataana.m nivaaretaa, ~naataana.m pavesetaa. puratthimaaya disaaya aagantvaa siigha.m duutayuga.m ta.m dovaarika.m eva.m vadeyya -- `kaha.m, bho purisa, imassa nagarassa nagarassaamii'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `eso, bhante, majjhe si"nghaa.take nisinno'ti. atha kho ta.m siigha.m duutayuga.m nagarassaamikassa yathaabhuuta.m vacana.m niyyaatetvaa yathaagatamagga.m pa.tipajjeyya. pacchimaaya disaaya aagantvaa siigha.m duutayuga.m...pe0... uttaraaya disaaya... dakkhi.naaya disaaya aagantvaa siigha.m duutayuga.m ta.m dovaarika.m eva.m vadeyya -- `kaha.m, bho purisa, imassa nagarassaamii'ti? so eva.m vadeyya -- `eso, bhante, majjhe si"nghaa.take nisinno'ti. atha kho ta.m siigha.m duutayuga.m nagarassaamikassa yathaabhuuta.m vacana.m niyyaatetvaa yathaagatamagga.m pa.tipajjeyya.

[03] ``upamaa ^a^M2.0399^ea^ kho myaaya.m, bhikkhu, kataa atthassa vi~n~naapanaaya. aya~ncettha attho ^a^T4.0242^ea^ -- `nagara'nti kho, bhikkhu, imasseta.m caatumahaabhuutikassa kaayassa adhivacana.m maataapettikasambhavassa odanakummaasuupacayassa aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammassa. `cha dvaaraa'ti kho, bhikkhu, channeta.m ajjhattikaana.m aayatanaana.m adhivacana.m. `dovaariko'ti kho, bhikkhu, satiyaa eta.m adhivacana.m. `siigha.m ^a^P4.0195^ea^ duutayuga'nti kho, bhikkhu, samathavipassanaaneta.m adhivacana.m. `nagarassaamii'ti kho, bhikkhu, vi~n~naa.nasseta.m adhivacana.m. `majjhe si"nghaa.tako'ti kho ^a^V2.0194^ea^, bhikkhu, catunneta.m mahaabhuutaana.m adhivacana.m -- pathaviidhaatuyaa, aapodhaatuyaa, tejodhaatuyaa, vaayodhaatuyaa. `yathaabhuuta.m vacana'nti kho, bhikkhu, nibbaanasseta.m adhivacana.m. `yathaagatamaggo'ti kho, bhikkhu, ariyasseta.m a.t.tha"ngikassa maggassa adhivacana.m, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thiyaa...pe0... sammaasamaadhissaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ``yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa cakkhuvi~n~neyyesu ruupesu uppajjeyya chando vaa raago vaa doso vaa moho vaa pa.tigha.m vaapi {pa.tigha.m vaa (sii0)} cetaso, tato citta.m nivaareyya. sabhayo ceso maggo sappa.tibhayo ca saka.n.tako ca sagahano ca ummaggo ca kummaggo ca duhitiko ca. asappurisasevito ceso maggo, na ceso maggo sappurisehi sevito. na tva.m eta.m arahasiiti. tato citta.m nivaaraye cakkhuvi~n~neyyehi ruupehi...pe0... yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa jivhaavi~n~neyyesu rasesu...pe0... manovi~n~neyyesu dhammesu uppajjeyya chando vaa raago vaa doso vaa ^a^T4.0243^ea^ moho vaa pa.tigha.m vaapi cetaso tato citta.m nivaareyya. sabhayo ceso maggo sappa.tibhayo ca saka.n.tako ca sagahano ca ummaggo ca kummaggo ca duhitiko ca. asappurisasevito ceso maggo, na ceso maggo sappurisehi sevito. na tva.m eta.m arahasiiti. tato citta.m nivaaraye manovi~n~neyyehi dhammehi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ki.t.tha.m sampanna.m. ki.t.thaarakkho {ki.t.thaarakkhako (sii0)} ca pamatto, go.no ca ki.t.thaado adu.m ki.t.tha.m otaritvaa ^a^P4.0196^ea^ yaavadattha.m mada.m aapajjeyya pamaada.m aapajjeyya ^a^M2.0400^ea^; evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano chasu phassaayatanesu asa.mvutakaarii pa~ncasu kaamagu.nesu yaavadattha.m mada.m aapajjati pamaada.m aapajjati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ki.t.tha.m sampanna.m ki.t.thaarakkho ca appamatto go.no ca ki.t.thaado adu.m ki.t.tha.m otareyya. tamena.m ki.t.thaarakkho naasaaya.m suggahita.m ga.nheyya. naasaaya.m suggahita.m gahetvaa uparigha.taaya.m suniggahita.m nigga.nheyya. uparigha.taaya.m suniggahita.m niggahetvaa da.n.dena sutaa.lita.m taa.leyya. da.n.dena sutaa.lita.m taa.letvaa osajjeyya. dutiyampi kho, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0195^ea^ ...pe0... tatiyampi kho, bhikkhave, go.no ki.t.thaado adu.m ki.t.tha.m otareyya. tamena.m ki.t.thaarakkho naasaaya.m suggahita.m ga.nheyya. naasaaya.m suggahita.m gahetvaa uparigha.taaya.m suniggahita.m nigga.nheyya. uparigha.taaya.m suniggahita.m niggahetvaa da.n.dena sutaa.lita.m taa.leyya. da.n.dena sutaa.lita.m taa.letvaa osajjeyya. eva~nhi ^a^T4.0244^ea^ so, bhikkhave, go.no ki.t.thaado gaamagato vaa ara~n~nagato vaa, .thaanabahulo vaa assa nisajjabahulo vaa na ta.m ki.t.tha.m puna otareyya -- tameva purima.m da.n.dasamphassa.m samanussaranto. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yato kho bhikkhuno chasu phassaayatanesu citta.m udujita.m hoti sudujita.m, ajjhattameva santi.t.thati, sannisiidati, ekodi hoti, samaadhiyati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ra~n~no vaa raajamahaamattassa vaa vii.naaya saddo assutapubbo assa. so vii.naasadda.m su.neyya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `ambho, kassa {kissa (sii0 pii0)} nu kho eso saddo eva.mrajaniiyo eva.mkamaniiyo eva.mmadaniiyo ^a^P4.0197^ea^ eva.mmucchaniiyo eva.mbandhaniiyo'ti? tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `esaa, kho, bhante, vii.naa naama, yassaa eso saddo eva.mrajaniiyo eva.mkamaniiyo eva.mmadaniiyo eva.mmucchaniiyo eva.mbandhaniiyo'ti. so eva.m vadeyya -- `gacchatha me, bho, ta.m vii.na.m aaharathaa'ti. tassa ta.m vii.na.m aahareyyu.m. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `aya.m kho saa, bhante, vii.naa yassaa eso saddo eva.mrajaniiyo eva.mkamaniiyo eva.mmadaniiyo eva.mmucchaniiyo eva.mbandhaniiyo'ti. so eva.m vadeyya -- `ala.m me, bho, taaya vii.naaya, tameva me sadda.m aaharathaa'ti. tamena.m eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `aya.m kho, bhante, vii.naa naama anekasambhaaraa mahaasambhaaraa. anekehi sambhaarehi samaaraddhaa vadati ^a^M2.0401^ea^, seyyathida.m -- do.ni~nca pa.ticca camma~nca pa.ticca da.n.da~nca pa.ticca upadhaara.ne ca ^a^T4.0245^ea^ pa.ticca tantiyo ca pa.ticca ko.na~nca pa.ticca purisassa ca tajja.m vaayaama.m pa.ticca evaaya.m, bhante, vii.naa naama anekasambhaaraa mahaasambhaaraa. anekehi sambhaarehi samaaraddhaa vadatii'ti. so ta.m vii.na.m dasadhaa vaa satadhaa vaa phaaleyya, dasadhaa vaa satadhaa vaa ta.m phaaletvaa sakalika.m sakalika.m kareyya. sakalika.m sakalika.m karitvaa agginaa .daheyya, agginaa .dahitvaa masi.m kareyya. masi.m karitvaa mahaavaate vaa ophuneyya {opuneyya (sii0 pii0), ophu.neyya (?)}, nadiyaa vaa siighasotaaya pavaaheyya. so eva.m vadeyya -- `asatii kiraaya.m, bho, vii.naa naama, yatheva.m ya.m {yathevaaya.m (sii0), yathevaya.m (pii0)} ki~nci vii.naa naama ettha ca panaaya.m jano {ettha panaaya.m jano (syaa0 ka.m0), ettha ca mahaajano (pii0 ka0)} ativela.m pamatto pala.lito'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ruupa.m samanvesati {samannesati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), samanesati (pii0)} yaavataa ruupassa gati, vedana.m samanvesati yaavataa vedanaaya gati, sa~n~na.m samanvesati yaavataa sa~n~naaya gati, sa"nkhaare samanvesati yaavataa sa"nkhaaraana.m gati, vi~n~naa.na.m samanvesati ^a^V2.0196^ea^ yaavataa vi~n~naa.nassa gati. tassa ruupa.m samanvesato yaavataa ruupassa gati, vedana.m samanvesato...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m samanvesato yaavataa vi~n~naa.nassa gati. yampissa ta.m hoti ^a^P4.0198^ea^ ahanti vaa mamanti vaa asmiiti vaa tampi tassa na hotii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso arugatto pakkagatto saravana.m paviseyya. tassa kusaka.n.takaa ceva paade vijjheyyu.m, sarapattaani ca gattaani ^a^T4.0246^ea^ {sarapattaani pakkagattaani (syaa0 ka.m0), arupakkaani gattaani (pii0 ka0)} vilekheyyu.m. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, puriso bhiyyosomattaaya tatonidaana.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvediyetha. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu gaamagato vaa ara~n~nagato vaa labhati vattaara.m -- `aya~nca so {aya~nca kho (pii0 ka0), aya.m so (?)} aayasmaa eva.mkaarii eva.msamaacaaro asucigaamaka.n.tako'ti. ta.m ka.n.takoti {ta.m ``asucigaamaka.n.dato''ti (ka0)} iti viditvaa sa.mvaro ca asa.mvaro ca veditabbo.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M2.0402^ea^, bhikkhave, asa.mvaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe adhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati parittacetaso. ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme byaapajjati, anupa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati parittacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso chappaa.nake gahetvaa naanaavisaye naanaagocare da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. ahi.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya ^a^T4.0247^ea^ rajjuyaa bandheyya. susumaara.m {su.msumaara.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. pakkhi.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. kukkura.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya ^a^P4.0199^ea^. si"ngaala.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. makka.ta.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandhitvaa majjhe ga.n.thi.m karitvaa ossajjeyya. atha kho, te, bhikkhave ^a^V2.0197^ea^, chappaa.nakaa naanaavisayaa naanaagocaraa saka.m saka.m gocaravisaya.m aavi~ncheyyu.m {aavi~njeyyu.m (sii0)} -- ahi aavi~ncheyya `vammika.m pavekkhaamii'ti, susumaaro aavi~ncheyya `udaka.m pavekkhaamii'ti, pakkhii aavi~ncheyya `aakaasa.m .dessaamii'ti, kukkuro aavi~ncheyya `gaama.m pavekkhaamii'ti, si"ngaalo aavi~ncheyya `siivathika.m {sivathika.m (ka0)} pavekkhaamii'ti, makka.to aavi~ncheyya `vana.m pavekkhaamii'ti. yadaa kho te, bhikkhave, chappaa.nakaa jhattaa assu kilantaa, atha kho yo nesa.m paa.nakaana.m balavataro assa tassa te anuvatteyyu.m, anuvidhaayeyyu.m vasa.m gaccheyyu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kaayagataasati abhaavitaa abahuliikataa, ta.m cakkhu aavi~nchati manaapiyesu ruupesu, amanaapiyaa ruupaa pa.tikuulaa honti...pe0... mano aavi~nchati manaapiyesu dhammesu, amanaapiyaa dhammaa pa.tikuulaa honti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, asa.mvaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sa.mvaro hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ^a^T4.0248^ea^ ruupa.m disvaa piyaruupe ruupe naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe ruupe na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca ^a^M2.0403^ea^ viharati appamaa.nacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti...pe0... jivhaa rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya piyaruupe dhamme naadhimuccati, appiyaruupe dhamme ^a^P4.0200^ea^ na byaapajjati, upa.t.thitakaayassati ca viharati appamaa.nacetaso, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso chappaa.nake gahetvaa naanaavisaye naanaagocare da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. ahi.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. susumaara.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. pakkhi.m gahetvaa...pe0... kukkura.m gahetvaa... si"ngaala.m gahetvaa... makka.ta.m gahetvaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandheyya. da.lhaaya rajjuyaa bandhitvaa da.lhe khiile vaa thambhe vaa upanibandheyya. atha kho te, bhikkhave, chappaa.nakaa naanaavisayaa naanaagocaraa saka.m saka.m gocaravisaya.m aavi~ncheyyu.m -- ahi aavi~ncheyya `vammika.m pavekkhaamii'ti, susumaaro aavi~ncheyya `udaka.m pavekkhaamii'ti, pakkhii aavi~ncheyya `aakaasa.m .dessaamii'ti, kukkuro aavi~ncheyya `gaama.m pavekkhaamii'ti, si"ngaalo aavi~ncheyya `siivathika.m pavekkhaamii'ti, makka.to aavi~ncheyya `vana.m pavekkhaamii'ti ^a^T4.0249^ea^. yadaa kho te, bhikkhave, chappaa.nakaa jhattaa assu kilantaa ^a^V2.0198^ea^, atha tameva khiila.m vaa thambha.m vaa upati.t.theyyu.m, upanisiideyyu.m, upanipajjeyyu.m. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kaayagataasati bhaavitaa bahuliikataa, ta.m cakkhu naavi~nchati manaapiyesu ruupesu, amanaapiyaa ruupaa nappa.tikuulaa honti...pe0... jivhaa naavi~nchati manaapiyesu rasesu...pe0... mano naavi~nchati manaapiyesu dhammesu, amanaapiyaa dhammaa nappa.tikuulaa honti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sa.mvaro hoti.

[03] ```da.lhe khiile vaa thambhe vaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, kaayagataaya satiyaa eta.m adhivacana.m. tasmaatiha vo, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `kaayagataa no sati bhaavitaa bhavissati bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa'ti. eva~nhi kho, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^M2.0404^ea^ ^a^P4.0201^ea^, bhikkhave, yavakalaapii caatumahaapathe nikkhittaa assa. atha cha purisaa aagaccheyyu.m byaabha"ngihatthaa. te yavakalaapi.m chahi byaabha"ngiihi haneyyu.m. eva~nhi saa, bhikkhave, yavakalaapii suhataa assa chahi byaabha"ngiihi ha~n~namaanaa. atha sattamo puriso aagaccheyya byaabha"ngihattho. so ta.m yavakalaapi.m sattamaaya byaabha"ngiyaa haneyya. eva~nhi saa bhikkhave, yavakalaapii suhatataraa assa, sattamaaya byaabha"ngiyaa ha~n~namaanaa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano cakkhusmi.m ha~n~nati manaapaamanaapehi ruupehi...pe0... jivhaaya ha~n~nati manaapaamanaapehi rasehi...pe0... manasmi.m ha~n~nati ^a^T4.0250^ea^ manaapaamanaapehi dhammehi. sace so, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano aayati.m punabbhavaaya ceteti, eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, moghapuriso suhatataro hoti, seyyathaapi saa yavakalaapii sattamaaya byaabha"ngiyaa ha~n~namaanaa.

[03] ``bhuutapubba.m, bhikkhave, devaasurasa"ngaamo samupabyuu.lho {samupabbuu.lho (sii0 pii0)} ahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo asure aamantesi -- `sace, maarisaa, devaasurasa"ngaame samupabyuu.lhe asuraa jineyyu.m devaa paraajineyyu.m, yena na.m sakka.m devaanaminda.m ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi bandhitvaa mama santike aaneyyaatha asurapura'nti. sakkopi kho, bhikkhave, devaanamindo deve taavati.mse aamantesi -- `sace, maarisaa, devaasurasa"ngaame samupabyuu.lhe devaa jineyyu.m asuraa paraajineyyu.m, yena ^a^V2.0199^ea^ na.m vepacitti.m asurinda.m ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi bandhitvaa mama santike aaneyyaatha sudhamma.m devasabha'nti. tasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, sa"ngaame devaa jini.msu, asuraa paraajini.msu ^a^P4.0202^ea^. atha kho, bhikkhave, devaa taavati.msaa vepacitti.m asurinda.m ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi bandhitvaa sakkassa devaanamindassa santike aanesu.m sudhamma.m devasabha.m. tatra suda.m, bhikkhave, vepacitti asurindo ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi baddho {bandho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} hoti. yadaa kho, bhikkhave, vepacittissa asurindassa eva.m hoti -- `dhammikaa kho devaa, adhammikaa asuraa ^a^M2.0405^ea^, idheva daanaaha.m ^a^T4.0251^ea^ devapura.m gacchaamii'ti. atha ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi mutta.m attaana.m samanupassati, dibbehi ca pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti. yadaa ca kho, bhikkhave, vepacittissa asurindassa eva.m hoti -- `dhammikaa kho asuraa, adhammikaa devaa, tattheva daanaaha.m asurapura.m gamissaamii'ti, atha ka.n.thapa~ncamehi bandhanehi baddha.m attaana.m samanupassati. dibbehi ca pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi parihaayati. eva.m sukhuma.m kho, bhikkhave, vepacittibandhana.m. tato sukhumatara.m maarabandhana.m. ma~n~namaano kho, bhikkhave, baddho maarassa, ama~n~namaano mutto paapimato.

[03] ```asmii'ti, bhikkhave, ma~n~nitameta.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti ma~n~nitameta.m, `bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `na bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `ruupii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `aruupii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `sa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `asa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m, `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ma~n~nitameta.m. ma~n~nita.m, bhikkhave, rogo, ma~n~nita.m ga.n.do, ma~n~nita.m salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ama~n~namaanena {ama~n~nitamaanena (pii0 ka0)} cetasaa viharissaamaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ```asmii'ti, bhikkhave, i~njitameta.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti i~njitameta.m, `bhavissa'nti i~njitameta.m, `na bhavissa'nti i~njitameta.m, `ruupii bhavissa'nti i~njitameta.m, `aruupii bhavissa'nti i~njitameta.m, `sa~n~nii bhavissa'nti i~njitameta.m, `asa~n~nii bhavissa'nti i~njitameta.m, `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ^a^T4.0252^ea^ i~njitameta.m. i~njita.m, bhikkhave ^a^P4.0203^ea^, rogo, i~njita.m ga.n.do, i~njita.m salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `ani~njamaanena {ani~njiyamaanena (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} cetasaa viharissaamaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ```asmii'ti ^a^V2.0200^ea^, bhikkhave, phanditameta.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti phanditameta.m, `bhavissa'nti...pe0... `na bhavissa'nti... `ruupii bhavissa'nti... `aruupii bhavissa'nti... `sa~n~nii bhavissa'nti... `asa~n~nii bhavissa'nti... `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'nti phanditameta.m. phandita.m, bhikkhave, rogo, phandita.m ga.n.do, phandita.m salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `aphandamaanena {aphandiyamaanena (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} cetasaa viharissaamaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ```asmii'ti, bhikkhave, papa~ncitameta.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti papa~ncitameta.m, `bhavissa'nti...pe0... `na bhavissa'nti... `ruupii bhavissa'nti... `aruupii bhavissa'nti... `sa~n~nii bhavissa'nti... `asa~n~nii bhavissa'nti... `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'nti papa~ncitameta.m ^a^M2.0406^ea^. papa~ncita.m, bhikkhave, rogo, papa~ncita.m ga.n.do, papa~ncita.m salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `nippapa~ncena cetasaa viharissaamaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba.m.

[03] ```asmii'ti, bhikkhave, maanagatameta.m, `ayamahamasmii'ti maanagatameta.m, `bhavissa'nti maanagatameta.m, `na bhavissa'nti maanagatameta.m, `ruupii bhavissa'nti maanagatameta.m, `aruupii bhavissa'nti maanagatameta.m, `sa~n~nii bhavissa'nti maanagatameta.m, `asa~n~nii bhavissa'nti maanagatameta.m, `nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissa'nti ^a^T4.0253^ea^ maanagatameta.m. maanagata.m, bhikkhave, rogo, maanagata.m ga.n.do, maanagata.m salla.m. tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, `nihatamaanena cetasaa viharissaamaa'ti -- eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] aasiivisavaggo ekuunaviisatimo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] aasiiviso ^a^P4.0204^ea^ ratho kummo, dve daarukkhandhaa avassuto.
[22] dukkhadhammaa ki.msukaa vii.naa, chappaa.naa yavakalaapiiti..
[06] sa.laayatanavagge catutthapa.n.naasako samatto.
[01] tassa ^a^V2.0201^ea^ vagguddaana.m --
[21] nandikkhayo sa.t.thinayo, samuddo uragena ca.
[22] catupa.n.naasakaa ete, nipaatesu pakaasitaati..
[06] sa.laayatanasa.myutta.m samatta.m.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^T4.0254^ea^ ^a^V2.0202^ea^ ^a^M2.0407^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaati.
[21] ``samaahito sampajaano, sato buddhassa saavako.
[22] vedanaa ca pajaanaati, vedanaana~nca sambhava.m..
[21] ``yattha cetaa nirujjhanti, magga~nca khayagaamina.m.
[22] vedanaana.m khayaa bhikkhu, nicchaato parinibbuto''ti.. pa.thama.m.
[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaati.
[21] ``sukha.m ^a^P4.0205^ea^ vaa yadi vaa dukkha.m, adukkhamasukha.m saha.
[22] ajjhatta~nca bahiddhaa ca, ya.m ki~nci atthi vedita.m..
[21] ``eta.m ^a^V2.0203^ea^ dukkhanti ~natvaana, mosadhamma.m palokina.m.
[22] phussa phussa vaya.m passa.m, eva.m tattha virajjatii''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. sukhaaya, bhikkhave, vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahaatabbo, dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahaatabbo, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahaatabbo. yato ^a^T4.0255^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo pahiino hoti, dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo pahiino hoti, adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^M2.0408^ea^ vedanaaya avijjaanusayo pahiino hoti, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu niranusayo sammaddaso acchecchi {acchejji (bahuusu)} ta.nha.m, vivattayi {vaavattayi (sii0)} sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa'''ti.
[21] ``sukha.m vedayamaanassa {vediyamaanassa (sii0 pii0)}, vedana.m appajaanato.
[22] so raagaanusayo hoti, anissara.nadassino..
[21] ``dukkha.m vedayamaanassa, vedana.m appajaanato.
[22] pa.tighaanusayo hoti, anissara.nadassino..
[21] ``adukkhamasukha.m santa.m, bhuuripa~n~nena desita.m.
[22] ta~ncaapi abhinandati, neva dukkhaa pamuccati..
[21] ``yato ^a^P4.0206^ea^ ca bhikkhu aataapii, sampaja~n~na.m na ri~ncati.
[22] tato so vedanaa sabbaa, parijaanaati pa.n.dito..
[21] ``so vedanaa pari~n~naaya, di.t.the dhamme anaasavo.
[22] kaayassa bhedaa dhamma.t.tho, sa"nkhya.m nopeti vedaguu''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ ``assutavaa ^a^V2.0204^ea^, bhikkhave, puthujjano ya.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `atthi mahaasamudde paataalo'ti. ta.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano asanta.m avijjamaana.m eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `atthi mahaasamudde paataalo'ti. saariirikaana.m kho eta.m, bhikkhave, dukkhaana.m vedanaana.m adhivacana.m yadida.m `paataalo'ti. assutavaa, bhikkhave, puthujjano saariirikaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya ^a^T4.0256^ea^ phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `assutavaa puthujjano paataale na paccu.t.thaasi, gaadha~nca naajjhagaa'. sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako saariirikaaya dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano neva socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `sutavaa ariyasaavako paataale paccu.t.thaasi, gaadha~nca ajjhagaa'''ti.
[21] ``yo ^a^M2.0409^ea^ etaa naadhivaaseti, uppannaa vedanaa dukhaa.
[22] saariirikaa paa.naharaa, yaahi phu.t.tho pavedhati..
[21] ``akkandati parodati, dubbalo appathaamako.
[22] na so paataale paccu.t.thaasi, atho gaadhampi naajjhagaa..
[21] ``yo ^a^P4.0207^ea^ cetaa adhivaaseti, uppannaa vedanaa dukhaa.
[27] saariirikaa paa.naharaa, yaahi phu.t.tho na vedhati.
[22] sa ve paataale paccu.t.thaasi, atho gaadhampi ajjhagaa''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. sukhaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa dukkhato da.t.thabbaa, dukkhaa vedanaa sallato da.t.thabbaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa aniccato da.t.thabbaa. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukhaa vedanaa dukkhato di.t.thaa hoti, dukkhaa vedanaa sallato di.t.thaa hoti, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa aniccato ^a^V2.0205^ea^ di.t.thaa hoti ^a^T4.0257^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu sammaddaso acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa'''ti.
[21] ``yo sukha.m dukkhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato.
[22] adukkhamasukha.m santa.m, addakkhi na.m aniccato..
[21] ``sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, parijaanaati vedanaa.
[27] so vedanaa pari~n~naaya, di.t.the dhamme anaasavo.
[22] kaayassa bhedaa dhamma.t.tho, sa"nkhya.m nopeti vedaguu''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ``assutavaa, bhikkhave, puthujjano sukhampi vedana.m vedayati {vediyati (sii0 pii0)}, dukkhampi vedana.m vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedana.m vedayati. sutavaa, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako sukhampi vedana.m vedayati ^a^P4.0208^ea^, dukkhampi vedana.m vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi ^a^M2.0410^ea^ vedana.m vedayati. tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayaaso {adhippaayo (sii0 ka0), adhippaayaso (syaa0 ka.m0), adhippaayoso (pii0)} ki.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanenaa''ti? bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0... assutavaa. bhikkhave, puthujjano dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati ^a^T4.0258^ea^ paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. so dve vedanaa vedayati -- kaayika~nca, cetasika~nca. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, purisa.m sallena vijjheyya {sallena anuvijjheyyu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. tamena.m dutiyena sallena anuvedha.m vijjheyya {sallena anuvijjheyyu.m (sii0), sallena anuvedha.m vijjheyyu.m (syaa0 ka.m0), sallena vijjheyyu.m (pii0)}. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, puriso dvisallena vedana.m vedayati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavaa puthujjano dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano socati kilamati paridevati urattaa.li.m kandati sammoha.m aapajjati. so dve vedanaa vedayati -- kaayika~nca, cetasika~nca. tassaayeva kho pana dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano pa.tighavaa hoti. tamena.m dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighavanta.m, yo dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo, so anuseti. so dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano kaamasukha.m abhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? na hi so, bhikkhave, pajaanaati assutavaa puthujjano a~n~natra kaamasukhaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya nissara.na.m, tassa kaamasukha~nca abhinandato, yo sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo, so anuseti. so taasa.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca ^a^V2.0206^ea^ nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa taasa.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m appajaanato, yo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo, so anuseti. so sukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, sa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. dukkha~nce vedana.m vedayati, sa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. adukkhamasukha~nce ^a^P4.0209^ea^ vedana.m vedayati, sa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `assutavaa puthujjano sa~n~nutto jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, sa~n~nutto dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami.

[03] ``sutavaa ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na ^a^M2.0411^ea^ sammoha.m aapajjati. so eka.m vedana.m vedayati -- kaayika.m, na cetasika.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^T4.0259^ea^, bhikkhave, purisa.m sallena vijjheyya. tamena.m dutiyena sallena anuvedha.m na vijjheyya. eva~nhi so, bhikkhave, puriso ekasallena vedana.m vedayati. evameva kho, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. so eka.m vedana.m vedayati -- kaayika.m, na cetasika.m. tassaayeva kho pana dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano pa.tighavaa na hoti. tamena.m dukkhaaya vedanaaya appa.tighavanta.m, yo dukkhaaya vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo, so naanuseti. so dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano kaamasukha.m naabhinandati. ta.m kissa hetu? pajaanaati hi so, bhikkhave, sutavaa ariyasaavako a~n~natra kaamasukhaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya nissara.na.m. tassa kaamasukha.m naabhinandato yo sukhaaya vedanaaya raagaanusayo, so naanuseti. so taasa.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava.m ca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tassa taasa.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanato, yo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya avijjaanusayo, so naanuseti. so sukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, visa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. dukkha~nce vedana.m vedayati ^a^P4.0210^ea^, visa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. adukkhamasukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, visa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, `sutavaa ariyasaavako visa~n~nutto jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi ^a^T4.0260^ea^ ^a^V2.0207^ea^, visa~n~nutto dukkhasmaa'ti vadaami. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso, aya.m adhippayaaso, ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanenaa''ti.
[21] ``na vedana.m vedayati sapa~n~no,
[27] sukhampi dukkhampi bahussutopi.
[26] aya~nca dhiirassa puthujjanena,
[22] mahaa {aya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} viseso kusalassa hoti..
[21] ``sa"nkhaatadhammassa ^a^M2.0412^ea^ bahussutassa,
[27] vipassato {sampassato (sii0 pii0)} lokamima.m para~nca.
[26] i.t.thassa dhammaa na mathenti citta.m,
[22] ani.t.thato no pa.tighaatameti..
[21] ``tassaanurodhaa athavaa virodhaa,
[27] vidhuupitaa atthagataa na santi.
[26] pada~nca ~natvaa viraja.m asoka.m,
[22] sammaa pajaanaati bhavassa paaraguu''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena gilaanasaalaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi ^a^P4.0211^ea^ --
[03] ``sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaano kaala.m aagameyya. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m; vedanaasu vedanaanupassii ^a^V2.0208^ea^ viharati...pe0... citte cittaanupassii viharati...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m ^a^T4.0261^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sato hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaano hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave ^a^M2.0413^ea^ sampajaanakaarii hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaanakaarii hoti. sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sampajaano kaala.m aagameyya. aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii.

[03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno eva.m satassa sampajaanassa appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati sukhaa vedanaa, so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppannaa kho myaaya.m sukhaa vedanaa. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no appa.ticca. ki.m pa.ticca? imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca. aya.m kho pana kaayo anicco sa"nkhato pa.ticcasamuppanno. anicca.m kho pana sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m kaaya.m pa.ticca uppannaa sukhaa vedanaa kuto niccaa bhavissatii'ti! so kaaye ca sukhaaya ca vedanaaya aniccaanupassii viharati, vayaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. tassa kaaye ca sukhaaya ca vedanaaya aniccaanupassino viharato, vayaanupassino viharato, viraagaanupassino viharato, nirodhaanupassino viharato, pa.tinissaggaanupassino ^a^T4.0262^ea^ ^a^P4.0212^ea^ viharato, yo kaaye ca sukhaaya ca vedanaaya raagaanusayo, so pahiiyati.

[03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno eva.m satassa sampajaanassa appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati dukkhaa vedanaa. so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppannaa kho myaaya.m dukkhaa vedanaa. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no appa.ticca. ki.m pa.ticca? imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca. aya.m kho pana kaayo anicco sa"nkhato pa.ticcasamuppanno. anicca.m kho pana sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m kaaya.m pa.ticca uppannaa dukkhaa vedanaa kuto niccaa bhavissatii'ti! so kaaye ca dukkhaaya vedanaaya ^a^V2.0209^ea^ aniccaanupassii viharati, vayaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. tassa kaaye ca dukkhaaya ca vedanaaya aniccaanupassino viharato...pe0... pa.tinissaggaanupassino viharato, yo kaaye ca dukkhaaya ca vedanaaya pa.tighaanusayo, so pahiiyati.

[03] ``tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno eva.m satassa sampajaanassa appamattassa aataapino pahitattassa viharato uppajjati adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa, so eva.m pajaanaati -- `uppannaa kho myaaya.m adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. saa ca kho pa.ticca, no appa.ticca. ki.m pa.ticca? imameva kaaya.m pa.ticca. aya.m kho pana kaayo anicco sa"nkhato pa.ticcasamuppanno. anicca.m kho pana sa"nkhata.m pa.ticcasamuppanna.m kaaya.m ^a^M2.0414^ea^ pa.ticca uppannaa ^a^T4.0263^ea^ adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa kuto niccaa bhavissatii'ti! so kaaye ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaaya aniccaanupassii viharati, vayaanupassii viharati, viraagaanupassii viharati, nirodhaanupassii viharati, pa.tinissaggaanupassii viharati. tassa kaaye ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaaya aniccaanupassino viharato...pe0... pa.tinissaggaanupassino viharato, yo kaaye ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaaya avijjaanusayo, so pahiiyati.

[03] ``so ^a^P4.0213^ea^ sukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, saa aniccaati pajaanaati, anajjhositaati pajaanaati, anabhinanditaati pajaanaati; dukkha~nce vedana.m vedayati, saa aniccaati pajaanaati, anajjhositaati pajaanaati, anabhinanditaati pajaanaati; adukkhamasukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, saa aniccaati pajaanaati, anajjhositaati pajaanaati, anabhinanditaati pajaanaati. so sukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, visa~n~nutto na.m vedayati; dukkha~nce vedana.m vedayati, visa~n~nutto na.m vedayati; adukkhamasukha~nce vedana.m vedayati, visa~n~nutto na.m vedayati. so kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati, jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `kaayassa bhedaa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti {siitibhavissantiiti (sii0 pii0 ka0)} pajaanaati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, tela~nca pa.ticca va.t.ti~nca pa.ticca telappadiipo jhaayeyya, tasseva telassa ca va.t.tiyaa ca pariyaadaanaa anaahaaro nibbaayeyya; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaayapariyantika.m ^a^V2.0210^ea^ vedana.m vedayamaano ^a^T4.0264^ea^ `kaayapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayamaano `jiivitapariyantika.m vedana.m vedayaamii'ti pajaanaati. `kaayassa bhedaa uddha.m jiivitapariyaadaanaa idheva sabbavedayitaani anabhinanditaani siitiibhavissantii'ti pajaanaatii''ti. sattama.m.
