vaacaa niruddhaa hoti. dutiya.m jhaana.m ^a^T4.0269^ea^ samaapannassa vitakkavicaaraa niruddhaa honti. tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa piiti niruddhaa hoti. catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapannassa assaasapassaasaa niruddhaa honti. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa ruupasa~n~naa niruddhaa hoti. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naa niruddhaa hoti. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naa niruddhaa hoti. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naa niruddhaa hoti. sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca niruddhaa honti. khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti. atha kho, bhikkhu, mayaa anupubbasa"nkhaaraana.m vuupasamo akkhaato. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa ^a^V2.0214^ea^ vaacaa vuupasantaa hoti. dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vitakkavicaaraa vuupasantaa honti...pe0... sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca vuupasantaa honti. khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago vuupasanto hoti, doso vuupasanto hoti, moho vuupasanto hoti. chayimaa, bhikkhu, passaddhiyo. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vitakkavicaaraa pa.tippassaddhaa honti. tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa piiti pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapannassa assaasapassaasaa pa.tippassaddhaa ^a^T4.0270^ea^ honti ^a^P4.0218^ea^. sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca pa.tippassaddhaa honti. khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago pa.tippassaddho hoti, doso pa.tippassaddho hoti, moho pa.tippassaddho hotii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aakaase vividhaa vaataa vaayanti. puratthimaapi vaataa vaayanti, pacchimaapi vaataa vaayanti, uttaraapi vaataa vaayanti, dakkhi.naapi vaataa vaayanti, sarajaapi vaataa vaayanti, arajaapi vaataa vaayanti, siitaapi vaataa vaayanti, u.nhaapi vaataa vaayanti, parittaapi vaataa vaayanti, adhimattaapi vaataa ^a^M2.0419^ea^ vaayanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmi.m kaayasmi.m vividhaa vedanaa uppajjanti, sukhaapi vedanaa uppajjati, dukkhaapi vedanaa uppajjati, adukkhamasukhaapi vedanaa uppajjatii''ti.
[21] ``yathaapi vaataa aakaase, vaayanti vividhaa puthuu.
[22] puratthimaa pacchimaa caapi, uttaraa atha dakkhi.naa..
[21] ``sarajaa arajaa capi, siitaa u.nhaa ca ekadaa.
[22] adhimattaa parittaa ca, puthuu vaayanti maalutaa..
[21] ``tathevimasmi.m kaayasmi.m, samuppajjanti vedanaa.
[22] sukhadukkhasamuppatti, adukkhamasukhaa ca yaa..
[21] ``yato ^a^V2.0215^ea^ ca bhikkhu aataapii, sampaja~n~na.m na ri~ncati {sampajaano niruupadhi (ka0)}.
[22] tato so vedanaa sabbaa, parijaanaati pa.n.dito..
[21] ``so ^a^T4.0271^ea^ vedanaa pari~n~naaya, di.t.the dhamme anaasavo.
[22] kaayassa bhedaa dhamma.t.tho, sa"nkhya.m nopeti vedaguu''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi ^a^P4.0219^ea^, bhikkhave, aakaase vividhaa vaataa vaayanti. puratthimaapi vaataa vaayanti...pe0... adhimattaapi vaataa vaayanti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmi.m kaayasmi.m vividhaa vedanaa uppajjanti, sukhaapi vedanaa uppajjati, dukkhaapi vedanaa uppajjati, adukkhamasukhaapi vedanaa uppajjatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aagantukaagaara.m. tattha puratthimaayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, pacchimaayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, uttaraayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, dakkhi.naayapi disaaya aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti. khattiyaapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, braahma.naapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, vessaapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti, suddaapi aagantvaa vaasa.m kappenti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmi.m kaayasmi.m vividhaa vedanaa ^a^M2.0420^ea^ uppajjanti. sukhaapi vedanaa uppajjati, dukkhaapi vedanaa uppajjati, adukkhamasukhaapi vedanaa uppajjati. saamisaapi sukhaa vedanaa uppajjati, saamisaapi dukkhaa vedanaa uppajjati, saamisaapi adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa uppajjati. niraamisaapi sukhaa vedanaa uppajjati, niraamisaapi dukkhaa vedanaa uppajjati, niraamisaapi adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa uppajjatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T4.0272^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^V2.0216^ea^, ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamaa nu kho, bhante, vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamo vedanaanirodho, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii ^a^P4.0220^ea^ pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.nanti? tisso imaa, aananda, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, aananda, vedanaa. phassasamudayaa vedanaasamudayo; phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ya.m vedana.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m vedanaaya assaado. yaa vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m vedanaaya aadiinavo. yo vedanaaya chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m vedanaaya nissara.na.m. atha kho panaananda, mayaa anupubbasa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho akkhaato. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa niruddhaa hoti...pe0... sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^T4.0273^ea^ samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca niruddhaa honti. khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti. atha kho panaananda, mayaa anupubbasa"nkhaaraana.m vuupasamo akkhaato. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa vuupasantaa hoti...pe0... sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca vuupasantaa honti. khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago vuupasanto hoti, doso vuupasanto hoti, moho vuupasanto hoti. atha kho panaananda, mayaa anupubbasa"nkhaaraana.m pa.tippassaddhi akkhaataa. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti...pe0... aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa ruupasa~n~naa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samaapannassa aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~naa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa ^a^M2.0421^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~naa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samaapannassa aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~naa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca pa.tippassaddhaa honti. khii.naasavassa ^a^P4.0221^ea^ bhikkhuno raago pa.tippassaddho hoti, doso pa.tippassaddho hoti, moho pa.tippassaddho hotii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katamaa nu kho, aananda, vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamo vedanaanirodho ^a^V2.0217^ea^, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na''nti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa bhagavannettikaa bhagavampa.tisara.naa. saadhu, bhante, bhagavanta~n~neva pa.tibhaatu etassa ^a^T4.0274^ea^ bhaasitassa attho. bhagavato sutvaa bhikkhuu dhaaressantii''ti. ``tena hi, aananda, su.nohi, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``tisso imaa, aananda, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, aananda, vedanaa...pe0... phassasamudayaa...pe0... khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago pa.tippassaddho hoti, doso pa.tippassaddho hoti, moho pa.tippassaddho hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``katamaa nu kho, bhante, vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamo vedanaanirodho, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na''nti? ``tisso ^a^P4.0222^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, vedanaa. phassasamudayaa ^a^M2.0422^ea^ vedanaasamudayo; phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho. ayameva ^a^V2.0218^ea^ ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ya.m vedana.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m vedanaaya assaado. yaa vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m vedanaaya aadiinavo. yo vedanaaya ^a^T4.0275^ea^ chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m vedanaaya nissara.na.m.

[03] ``atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayaa anupubbasa"nkhaaraana.m nirodho akkhaato. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa niruddhaa hoti...pe0... khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti. atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayaa anupubbasa"nkhaaraana.m vuupasamo akkhaato. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa vuupasantaa hoti...pe0... khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago vuupasanto hoti, doso vuupasanto hoti, moho vuupasanto hoti. chayimaa, bhikkhave, passaddhiyo. pa.thama.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vaacaa pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. dutiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa vitakkavicaaraa pa.tippassaddhaa honti. tatiya.m jhaana.m samaapannassa piiti pa.tippassaddhaa hoti. catuttha.m jhaana.m samaapannassa assaasapassaasaa pa.tippassaddhaa honti. sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapannassa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca pa.tippassaddhaa honti. khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raago pa.tippassaddho hoti, doso pa.tippassaddho hoti, moho pa.tippassaddho hotii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu...pe0... ekamanta.m ^a^P4.0223^ea^ nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katamaa nu kho, bhikkhave, vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamo ^a^T4.0276^ea^ vedanaanirodho, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na''nti? ``bhagava.mmuulakaa no, bhante, dhammaa...pe0...'' ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, vedanaa...pe0... phassasamudayaa...pe0.... (yathaa purimasuttante, tathaa vitthaaretabbo.) ^a^V2.0219^ea^ a.t.thama.m.

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0423^ea^ kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati yenaayasmaa udaayii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m udaayi.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, bhante udaayi, vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti? ``tisso kho, thapati, vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, thapati, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. eva.m vutte, pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, bhante udaayi, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa. yaaya.m, bhante, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa, santasmi.m esaa pa.niite sukhe vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. dutiyampi kho aayasmaa udaayii pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, thapati, dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa tisso vedanaa ^a^T4.0277^ea^ vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. dutiyampi kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m ^a^P4.0224^ea^ etadavoca -- ``na kho, bhante udaayi, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa. yaaya.m, bhante, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa, santasmi.m esaa pa.niite sukhe vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. tatiyampi kho ^a^V2.0220^ea^ aayasmaa udaayii pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, thapati, dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. tatiyampi kho pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m etadavoca -- ``na kho, bhante udaayi, tisso vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa. dve vedanaa vuttaa bhagavataa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa. yaaya.m, bhante, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa, santasmi.m esaa pa.niite sukhe vuttaa bhagavataa''ti. neva sakkhi aayasmaa udaayii pa~ncaka"nga.m thapati.m sa~n~naapetu.m, na panaasakkhi pa~ncaka"ngo thapati aayasmanta.m udaayi.m sa~n~naapetu.m. assosi kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmato udaayissa pa~ncaka"ngena thapatinaa saddhi.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando yaavatako ^a^M2.0424^ea^ aayasmato udaayissa pa~ncaka"ngena thapatinaa saddhi.m ahosi kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m bhagavato aarocesi.

[03] ``santameva, aananda, pariyaaya.m pa~ncaka"ngo ^a^T4.0278^ea^ thapati udaayissa bhikkhuno naabbhanumodi; santa~nca panaananda, pariyaaya.m udaayii bhikkhu pa~ncaka"ngassa thapatino naabbhanumodi. dvepi mayaa, aananda, vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. tissopi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. pa~ncapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. chapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. a.t.thaarasaapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. chatti.msaapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. a.t.thasatampmppi ^a^P4.0225^ea^ mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. eva.m pariyaayadesito kho, aananda, mayaa dhammo. eva.m pariyaayadesite kho, aananda, mayaa dhamme ye a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m sulapita.m, na samanuma~n~nissanti, na samanujaanissanti, na samanumodissanti, tesa.m eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharissantiiti {viharissanti (sii0 pii0 ka0)}. eva.m pariyaayadesito kho, aananda, mayaa dhammo. eva.m pariyaayadesite kho, aananda, mayaa dhamme ye a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m sulapita.m samanuma~n~nissanti samanujaanissanti samanumodissanti, tesa.m eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharissantii''ti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, aananda, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, aananda, pa~nca kaamagu.naa ^a^T4.0279^ea^. ya.m kho, aananda ^a^V2.0221^ea^, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m -- ida.m vuccati kaamasukha.m. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye ^a^P4.0226^ea^ kho, aananda, eva.m ^a^M2.0425^ea^ vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m ^a^T4.0280^ea^ nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda ^a^V2.0222^ea^, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami ^a^P4.0227^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda ^a^T4.0281^ea^, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa, pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa, naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa, `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m ^a^M2.0426^ea^ sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma, `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma, `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca ^a^T4.0282^ea^. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda ^a^V2.0223^ea^, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda ^a^P4.0228^ea^, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca. ye kho, aananda, eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `eta.mparama.m santa.m sukha.m somanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedentii'ti -- ida.m nesaaha.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? atthaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``katama~ncaananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca? idhaananda, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, aananda, etamhaa sukhaa a~n~na.m sukha.m abhikkantatara~nca pa.niitatara~nca.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aananda, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m sama.no gotamo aaha, ta~nca sukhasmi.m ^a^M2.0427^ea^ pa~n~napeti. tayida.m ki.msu, tayida.m katha.msuu'ti? eva.mvaadino, aananda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `na kho, aavuso ^a^T4.0283^ea^, bhagavaa sukha~n~neva vedana.m sandhaaya sukhasmi.m pa~n~napeti. yattha yattha, aavuso, sukha.m upalabbhati, yahi.m yahi.m {ya.m hiya.m hi sukha.m (sii0 pii0), yahi.m yahi.m sukha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) ma0 ni0 2.91}, ta.m ta.m tathaagato sukhasmi.m pa~n~napetii'''ti. navama.m.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ``dvepi mayaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena, tissopi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena, pa~ncapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena, chapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena, a.t.thaarasaapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena, chatti.msaapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena, a.t.thasatampi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. eva.m pariyaayadesito, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo. eva.m pariyaayadesite kho, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme ye a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m sulapita.m na samanuma~n~nissanti, na samanujaanissanti, na samanumodissanti, tesa.m eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m ^a^P4.0229^ea^ -- bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharissantiiti. eva.m pariyaayadesito, bhikkhave, mayaa dhammo. eva.m pariyaayadesite kho, bhikkhave, mayaa dhamme ye a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m sulapita.m samanuma~n~nissanti samanujaanissanti samanumodissanti, tesa.m ^a^V2.0224^ea^ eta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- samaggaa sammodamaanaa avivadamaanaa khiirodakiibhuutaa a~n~nama~n~na.m piyacakkhuuhi sampassantaa viharissantiiti.

[03] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa...pe0... .thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhikkhave, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m ^a^T4.0284^ea^ sama.no gotamo aaha, ta~nca sukhasmi.m pa~n~napeti. tayida.m ki.msu, tayida.m katha.msuu'ti? eva.mvaadino, bhikkhave, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `na kho, aavuso, bhagavaa sukha~n~neva vedana.m sandhaaya sukhasmi.m pa~n~napeti. yattha yattha, aavuso, sukha.m upalabbhati yahi.m yahi.m {ya.m hi ya.m hi (sii0 pii0)}, ta.m ta.m tathaagato sukhasmi.m pa~n~napetii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] rahogatavaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] rahogata.m ^a^M2.0428^ea^ dve aakaasa.m, agaara.m dve ca aanandaa.
[22] sambahulaa duve vuttaa, pa~ncaka"ngo ca bhikkhunaati..

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0285^ea^ ^a^P4.0230^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho mo.liyasiivako paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho mo.liyasiivako paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santi, bho gotama, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetuu'ti. idha {idha pana (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} bhava.m gotamo kimaahaa''ti?

[03] ``pittasamu.t.thaanaanipi ^a^V2.0225^ea^ kho, siivaka, idhekaccaani vedayitaani uppajjanti. saamampi kho eta.m, siivaka, veditabba.m {eva.m veditabba.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} yathaa pittasamu.t.thaanaanipi idhekaccaani vedayitaani uppajjanti; lokassapi kho eta.m, siivaka, saccasammata.m yathaa pittasamu.t.thaanaanipi idhekaccaani vedayitaani uppajjanti. tatra, siivaka, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetuu'ti. ya~nca saama.m ~naata.m ta~nca atidhaavanti, ya~nca loke saccasammata.m ta~nca atidhaavanti. tasmaa tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m micchaati vadaami.

[03] ``semhasamu.t.thaanaanipi kho, siivaka...pe0... vaatasamu.t.thaanaanipi kho, siivaka...pe0... ^a^T4.0286^ea^ sannipaatikaanipi kho, siivaka...pe0... utupari.naamajaanipi kho, siivaka...pe0... visamaparihaarajaanipi kho, siivaka...pe0... opakkamikaanipi kho, siivaka...pe0... kammavipaakajaanipi ^a^P4.0231^ea^ kho, siivaka, idhekaccaani vedayitaani uppajjanti. saamampi kho eta.m, siivaka, veditabba.m. yathaa kammavipaakajaanipi idhekaccaani ^a^M2.0429^ea^ vedayitaani uppajjanti; lokassapi kho eta.m, siivaka, saccasammata.m. yathaa kammavipaakajaanipi idhekaccaani vedayitaani uppajjanti; tatra, siivaka, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ya.m ki~ncaaya.m purisapuggalo pa.tisa.mvedeti sukha.m vaa dukkha.m vaa adukkhamasukha.m vaa sabba.m ta.m pubbekatahetuu'ti. ya~nca saama.m ~naata.m ta~nca atidhaavanti ya~nca loke saccasammata.m ta~nca atidhaavanti. tasmaa tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m micchaati vadaamiiti. eva.m vutte, mo.liyasiivako paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- `abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama ...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata'''nti.
[21] ``pitta.m semha~nca vaato ca, sannipaataa utuuni ca.
[22] visama.m opakkamika.m, kammavipaakena a.t.thamii''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.thasatapariyaaya.m vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyaaya.m desessaami. ta.m su.naatha. katamo ^a^V2.0226^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, a.t.thasatapariyaayo, dhammapariyaayo? dvepi mayaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena; tissopi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena; pa~ncapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena; chapi ^a^T4.0287^ea^ mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena; a.t.thaarasaapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena; chatti.msaapi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena; a.t.thasatampi mayaa vedanaa vuttaa pariyaayena. ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, dve vedanaa? kaayikaa ca cetasikaa ca -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, dve vedanaa. katamaa ^a^P4.0232^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaa? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, tisso vedanaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, pa~nca vedanaa? sukhindriya.m, dukkhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, domanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, pa~nca vedanaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, cha vedanaa? cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa...pe0... manosamphassajaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, cha vedanaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, a.t.thaarasa vedanaa? cha somanassuupavicaaraa, cha domanassuupavicaaraa, cha upekkhuupavicaaraa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, a.t.thaarasa vedanaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, chatti.msa vedanaa? cha gehasitaani {gehassitaani (a.t.tha0)} somanassaani, cha nekkhammasitaani {nekkhammassitaani (a.t.tha0)} somanassaani, cha gehasitaani domanassaani, cha nekkhammasitaani ^a^M2.0430^ea^ domanassaani, cha gehasitaa upekkhaa ^a^T4.0288^ea^, cha nekkhammasitaa upekkhaa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, chatti.msa vedanaa. katama~nca, bhikkhave, a.t.thasata.m vedanaa? atiitaa chatti.msa vedanaa, anaagataa chatti.msa vedanaa, paccuppannaa chatti.msa vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, a.t.thasata.m vedanaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, a.t.thasatapariyaayo dhammapariyaayo''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ atha kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``katamaa nu kho, bhante, vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamaa vedanaasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa? katamo vedanaanirodho, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na''nti?

[01] ``tisso ^a^P4.0233^ea^ imaa, bhikkhu, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. imaa vuccanti, bhikkhu, vedanaa. phassasamudayaa vedanaasamudayo. ta.nhaa vedanaasamudayagaaminii ^a^V2.0227^ea^ pa.tipadaa. phassanirodhaa vedanaanirodho. ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. ya.m vedana.m pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, aya.m vedanaaya assaado; yaa vedanaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa, aya.m vedanaaya aadiinavo; yo vedanaaya chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m, ida.m vedanaaya nissara.na''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ ``pubbeva ^a^T4.0289^ea^ me, bhikkhave, sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi -- `katamaa nu kho vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamaa vedanaasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa, katamo vedanaanirodho, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na'nti? tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `tisso imaa vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. imaa vuccanti vedanaa. phassasamudayaa vedanaasamudayo. ta.nhaa vedanaasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa...pe0... yo vedanaaya chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m. ida.m vedanaaya nissara.na'''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ```imaa ^a^M2.0431^ea^ vedanaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadi. `aya.m vedanaasamudayo'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi...pe0... aaloko udapaadi. `aya.m vedanaasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi...pe0... `aya.m vedanaanirodho'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ...pe0... `aya.m ^a^P4.0234^ea^ vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi...pe0... `aya.m vedanaaya assaado'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu...pe0... ^a^T4.0290^ea^ `aya.m vedanaaya aadiinavo'ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu...pe0... `ida.m kho nissara.na'nti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhu.m udapaadi, ~naa.na.m udapaadi, pa~n~naa udapaadi, vijjaa udapaadi, aaloko udapaadii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ atha kho sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``katamaa nu kho, bhante, vedanaa, katamo vedanaasamudayo, katamaa vedanaasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa? katamo vedanaanirodho, katamaa vedanaanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? ko vedanaaya assaado, ko aadiinavo, ki.m nissara.na''nti? ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa -- sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. imaa vuccanti, bhikkhave, vedanaa. phassasamudayaa vedanaasamudayo. ta.nhaa vedanaasamudayagaaminii pa.tipadaa. phassanirodhaa...pe0... yo vedanaaya chandaraagavinayo chandaraagappahaana.m. ida.m vedanaaya nissara.na''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``tisso imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa ^a^M2.0432^ea^ vaa braahma.naa vaa imaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti. na me te, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu vaa sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ^a^V2.0229^ea^ vaa braahma.nasammataa, na ca pana te aayasmanto saama~n~nattha.m vaa brahma~n~nattha.m vaa di.t.theva ^a^T4.0291^ea^ dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharanti. ye ca kho keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava.m ca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti. te kho me, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa sama.nesu ceva sama.nasammataa braahma.nesu ca braahma.nasammataa. te ca panaayasmanto saama~n~nattha~nca brahma~n~nattha~nca, di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^P4.0235^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa. ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa imaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti...pe0... pajaananti...pe0... saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa vedana.m nappajaananti, vedanaasamudaya.m nappajaananti, vedanaanirodha.m nappajaananti, vedanaanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m nappajaananti...pe0... pajaananti...pe0... saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ ``tisso ^a^V2.0230^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, tisso ^a^T4.0292^ea^ vedanaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^M2.0433^ea^, bhikkhave, saamisaa piiti, atthi niraamisaa piiti, atthi niraamisaa niraamisataraa piiti; atthi saamisa.m sukha.m, atthi niraamisa.m sukha.m, atthi niraamisaa niraamisatara.m sukha.m; atthi saamisaa upekkhaa, atthi niraamisaa upekkhaa, atthi niraamisaa niraamisataraa upekkhaa; atthi saamiso vimokkho, atthi niraamiso vimokkho, atthi niraamisaa niraamisataro vimokkho. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, saamisaa piiti? pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. yaa kho, bhikkhave, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati piiti, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saamisaa piiti.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^P4.0236^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, niraamisaa piiti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, niraamisaa piiti.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T4.0293^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, niraamisaa niraamisataraa piiti? yaa kho, bhikkhave, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raagaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato, dosaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato, mohaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato uppajjati piiti, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, niraamisaa niraamisataraa piiti.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^V2.0231^ea^, bhikkhave, saamisa.m sukha.m? pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. ya.m kho, bhikkhave, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati sukha.m somanassa.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saamisa.m sukha.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^M2.0434^ea^, bhikkhave, niraamisa.m sukha.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, niraamisa.m sukha.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, niraamisaa niraamisatara.m sukha.m? ya.m kho, bhikkhave, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raagaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato, dosaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato ^a^P4.0237^ea^, mohaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato uppajjati ^a^T4.0294^ea^ sukha.m somanassa.m, ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, niraamisaa niraamisatara.m sukha.m.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, saamisaa upekkhaa? pa~ncime, bhikkhave, kaamagu.naa. katame pa~nca? cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa.mhitaa rajaniiyaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca kaamagu.naa. yaa kho, bhikkhave, ime pa~nca kaamagu.ne pa.ticca uppajjati upekkhaa, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, saamisaa upekkhaa.

[01] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, niraamisaa upekkhaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa, dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m ^a^V2.0232^ea^ catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, niraamisaa upekkhaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, niraamisaa niraamisataraa upekkhaa? yaa kho, bhikkhave, khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno raagaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato, dosaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato, mohaa citta.m vimutta.m paccavekkhato uppajjati upekkhaa, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, niraamisaa niraamisataraa upekkhaa.
[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, saamiso vimokkho? ruupappa.tisa.myutto vimokkho saamiso vimokkho.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^T4.0296^ea^ ^a^V2.0233^ea^ ^a^M2.0436^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato maatugaamo ekantaamanaapo hoti purisassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? na ca ruupavaa hoti, na ca bhogavaa hoti, na ca siilavaa hoti, alaso ca hoti, paja~ncassa na labhati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato maatugaamo ekantaamanaapo hoti purisassa. pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato maatugaamo ekantamanaapo hoti purisassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? ruupavaa ca hoti, bhogavaa ca hoti, siilavaa ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, paja~ncassa labhati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato maatugaamo ekantamanaapo hoti purisassaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato puriso ekantaamanaapo hoti maatugaamassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? na ca ruupavaa hoti, na ca bhogavaa hoti, na ca siilavaa hoti, alaso ca hoti, paja~ncassa na labhati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi ^a^P4.0239^ea^ a"ngehi samannaagato puriso ekantaamanaapo hoti maatugaamassa. pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato puriso ekantamanaapo hoti maatugaamassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? ruupavaa ca hoti, bhogavaa ca hoti, siilavaa ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, paja~ncassa labhati -- imehi ^a^V2.0234^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi a"ngehi samannaagato puriso ^a^T4.0297^ea^ ekantamanaapo hoti maatugaamassaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa aave.nikaani dukkhaani, yaani maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehi. katamaani pa~nca? idha, bhikkhave ^a^M2.0437^ea^, maatugaamo daharova samaano patikula.m gacchati, ~naatakehi vinaa hoti. ida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa pa.thama.m aave.nika.m dukkha.m, ya.m maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehi. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamo utunii hoti. ida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa dutiya.m aave.nika.m dukkha.m, ya.m maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehi. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamo gabbhinii hoti. ida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa tatiya.m aave.nika.m dukkha.m, ya.m maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehi. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamo vijaayati. ida.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa catuttha.m aave.nika.m dukkha.m, ya.m maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehi. puna capara.m, bhikkhave, maatugaamo purisassa paaricariya.m upeti. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa pa~ncama.m aave.nika.m dukkha.m, ya.m maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehi. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa aave.nikaani dukkhaani, yaani maatugaamo paccanubhoti, a~n~natreva purisehii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ ``tiihi ^a^T4.0298^ea^ ^a^P4.0240^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo yebhuyyena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. katamehi tiihi? idha, bhikkhave, maatugaamo pubba.nhasamaya.m maccheramalapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati. majjhanhikasamaya.m issaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati. saayanhasamaya.m kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, tiihi dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo yebhuyyena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0235^ea^ kho aayasmaa anuruddho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa anuruddho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, maatugaama.m passaami dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanta.m. katiihi nu kho, bhante, dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo ^a^M2.0438^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii''ti?

[03] ``pa~ncahi kho, anuruddha, dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. katamehi pa~ncahi? assaddho ca hoti, ahiriko ca hoti, anottappii ca hoti, kodhano ca hoti, duppa~n~no ca hoti -- imehi kho, anuruddha, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato ^a^P4.0241^ea^ maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T4.0304^ea^ ^a^V2.0241^ea^ ^a^M2.0443^ea^ ^a^P4.0246^ea^, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa balaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruupabala.m, bhogabala.m, ~naatibala.m, puttabala.m, siilabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa balaani. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi balehi samannaagato maatugaamo visaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa balaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruupabala.m, bhogabala.m, ~naatibala.m, puttabala.m, siilabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa balaani. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi balehi samannaagato maatugaamo saamika.m pasayha agaara.m ajjhaavasatii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa balaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruupabala.m, bhogabala.m, ~naatibala.m, puttabala.m, siilabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa balaani. imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi balehi samannaagato maatugaamo saamika.m abhibhuyya vattatii''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``ekena ca kho, bhikkhave, balena samannaagato puriso maatugaama.m abhibhuyya vattati. katamena ekena balena? issariyabalena abhibhuuta.m maatugaama.m neva ruupabala.m taayati, na ^a^V2.0242^ea^ bhogabala.m taayati, na ~naatibala.m taayati, na puttabala.m taayati, na siilabala.m taayatii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^T4.0305^ea^ ^a^P4.0247^ea^, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa balaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruupabala.m, bhogabala.m, ~naatibala.m, puttabala.m, siilabala.m. ruupabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, na ca bhogabalena -- eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamo ruupabalena ca samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca -- eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. ruupabalena ^a^M2.0444^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, na ca ~naatibalena -- eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamo ruupabalena ca samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca -- eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. ruupabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca, na ca puttabalena -- eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamo ruupabalena ca samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca, puttabalena ca -- eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. ruupabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca, puttabalena ca, na ca siilabalena -- eva.m so tena"ngena aparipuuro hoti. yato ca kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamo ruupabalena ca samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca, puttabalena ca, siilabalena ca -- eva.m so tena"ngena paripuuro hoti. imaani kho ^a^T4.0306^ea^, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa balaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa balaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruupabala.m, bhogabala.m, ~naatibala.m, puttabala.m, siilabala.m. ruupabalena ^a^P4.0248^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, na ca siilabalena, naasenteva na.m, kule na vaasenti. ruupabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, na ca siilabalena, naasenteva na.m, kule na vaasenti. ruupabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca, na ca siilabalena, naasenteva na.m, kule na vaasenti. ruupabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, bhogabalena ca, ~naatibalena ca ^a^V2.0243^ea^, puttabalena ca, na ca siilabalena, naasenteva na.m, kule na vaasenti. siilabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, na ca ruupabalena, vaasenteva na.m, kule na naasenti. siilabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, na ca bhogabalena, vaasenteva na.m, kule na naasenti. siilabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, na ca ~naatibalena, vaasenteva na.m, kule na naasenti. siilabalena ca, bhikkhave, maatugaamo samannaagato hoti, na ca puttabalena, vaasenteva na.m, kule na naasenti. imaani ^a^T4.0307^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa balaanii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^M2.0445^ea^, bhikkhave, maatugaamassa balaani. katamaani pa~nca? ruupabala.m, bhogabala.m, ~naatibala.m, puttabala.m, siilabala.m. na, bhikkhave, maatugaamo ruupabalahetu vaa bhogabalahetu vaa ~naatibalahetu vaa puttabalahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. siilabalahetu kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamo kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca maatugaamassa balaanii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncimaani ^a^P4.0249^ea^, bhikkhave, .thaanaani dullabhaani akatapu~n~nena maatugaamena. katamaani pa~nca? patiruupe kule jaayeyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m .thaana.m dullabha.m akatapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa patiruupa.m kula.m gaccheyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m .thaana.m dullabha.m akatapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa, patiruupa.m kula.m gantvaa, asapatti agaara.m ajjhaavaseyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m .thaana.m dullabha.m akatapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa, patiruupa.m kula.m gantvaa, asapatti agaara.m ajjhaavasantii puttavatii assanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m .thaana.m dullabha.m akatapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa, patiruupa.m kula.m gantvaa, asapatti agaara.m ajjhaavasantii puttavatii samaanaa saamika.m abhibhuyya vatteyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m .thaana.m dullabha.m akatapu~n~nena ^a^V2.0244^ea^ maatugaamena ^a^T4.0308^ea^. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca .thaanaani dullabhaani akatapu~n~nena maatugaamenaati.

[03] ``pa~ncimaani, bhikkhave, .thaanaani sulabhaani katapu~n~nena maatugaamena. katamaani pa~nca? patiruupe kule jaayeyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m .thaana.m sulabha.m katapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa patiruupa.m kula.m gaccheyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m .thaana.m sulabha.m katapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa patiruupa.m kula.m gantvaa asapatti agaara.m ajjhaavaseyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m .thaana.m sulabha.m katapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule jaayitvaa patiruupa.m kula.m gantvaa asapatti agaara.m ajjhaavasantii puttavatii assanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m .thaana.m sulabha.m katapu~n~nena maatugaamena. patiruupe kule ^a^P4.0250^ea^ jaayitvaa patiruupa.m kula.m gantvaa asapatti agaara.m ajjhaavasantii ^a^M2.0446^ea^ puttavatii samaanaa saamika.m abhibhuyya vatteyyanti -- ida.m, bhikkhave, pa~ncama.m .thaana.m sulabha.m katapu~n~nena maatugaamena. imaani kho, bhikkhave, pa~nca .thaanaani sulabhaani katapu~n~nena maatugaamenaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo visaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasati. katamehi pa~ncahi? paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato ca hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ca hoti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato ca hoti, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato ca hoti ^a^T4.0309^ea^, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato ca hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi dhammehi samannaagato maatugaamo visaarado agaara.m ajjhaavasatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi, bhikkhave, va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaanaa ariyasaavikaa ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati saaraadaayinii ca hoti varaadaayinii ca kaayassa. katamehi pa~ncahi? saddhaaya va.d.dhati, siilena va.d.dhati, sutena va.d.dhati, caagena va.d.dhati, pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncahi ^a^V2.0245^ea^ va.d.dhiihi va.d.dhamaanaa ariyasaavikaa ariyaaya va.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati, saaraadaayinii ca hoti, varaadaayinii ca kaayassaa''ti.
[21] ``saddhaaya siilena ca yaadha va.d.dhati,
[27] pa~n~naaya caagena sutena cuubhaya.m.
[26] saa taadisii siilavatii upaasikaa,
[22] aadiiyati saaramidheva attano''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] balavaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m ^a^P4.0251^ea^ --
[21] visaaradaa pasayha abhibhuyya, eka.m a"ngena pa~ncama.m.
[22] naasenti hetu .thaana~nca, visaarado va.d.dhinaa dasaati..
[06] maatugaamasa.myutta.m samatta.m.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0310^ea^ ^a^V2.0246^ea^ ^a^M2.0447^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto magadhesu viharati naalakagaamake. atha kho jambukhaadako paribbaajako yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jambukhaadako paribbaajako aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```nibbaana.m, nibbaana'nti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, nibbaana''nti? ``yo kho, aavuso, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m vuccati nibbaana''nti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``katamo ^a^P4.0252^ea^ panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ ```arahatta.m, arahatta'nti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katama.m nu ^a^T4.0311^ea^ kho, aavuso ^a^V2.0247^ea^, arahatta''nti? ``yo kho, aavuso, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m vuccati arahatta''nti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``katamo ^a^M2.0448^ea^ panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho aavuso, maggo, aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa etassa arahattassa sacchikiriyaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ``ke nu kho, aavuso saariputta, loke dhammavaadino, ke loke suppa.tipannaa, ke loke sugataa''ti? ``ye kho, aavuso, raagappahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, dosappahaanaaya ^a^P4.0253^ea^ dhamma.m desenti, mohappahaanaaya dhamma.m desenti, te loke dhammavaadino. ye kho, aavuso, raagassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, dosassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, mohassa pahaanaaya pa.tipannaa, te loke suppa.tipannaa. yesa.m kho, aavuso, raago pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, doso pahiino ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, moho pahiino ucchinnamuulo ^a^T4.0312^ea^ taalaavatthukato anabhaava"nkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo, te loke sugataa''ti.

[03] ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti. ``katamo, panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo ^a^V2.0248^ea^ bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etassa raagassa dosassa mohassa pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ``kimatthiya.m ^a^M2.0449^ea^, aavuso saariputta, sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti? ``dukkhassa kho, aavuso, pari~n~nattha.m bhagavati brahmacariya.m vussatii''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaa''ti?

[03] ``ayameva ^a^P4.0254^ea^ kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo ^a^T4.0313^ea^ aya.m pa.tipadaa etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etassa dukkhassa pari~n~naaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ```assaasappatto, assaasappatto'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, assaasappatto hotii''ti? ``yato kho, aavuso, bhikkhu channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, assaasappatto hotii''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa assaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa assaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etassa assaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo etassa assaasassa sacchikiriyaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso ^a^V2.0249^ea^, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etassa assaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etassa assaasassa sacchikiriyaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ```paramassaasappatto, paramassaasappatto'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, aavuso, paramassaasappatto hotii''ti? ``yato ^a^M2.0450^ea^ kho, aavuso, bhikkhu channa.m phassaayatanaana.m samudaya~nca ^a^P4.0255^ea^ attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca ^a^T4.0314^ea^ aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m viditvaa anupaadaavimutto hoti, ettaavataa kho, aavuso, paramassaasappatto hotii''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa paramassaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa paramassaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``katamo pana, aavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etassa paramassaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo etassa paramassaasassa sacchikiriyaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etassa paramassaasassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etassa paramassaasassa sacchikiriyaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ```vedanaa, vedanaa'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, aavuso, vedanaa''ti? ``tisso imaavuso, vedanaa. katamaa tisso? sukhaa vedanaa, dukkhaa vedanaa, adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- imaa kho, aavuso, tisso vedanaa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko ^a^T4.0315^ea^ maggo, etaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo ^a^V2.0250^ea^ sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m tissanna.m vedanaana.m pari~n~naaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ ```aasavo ^a^P4.0256^ea^, aasavo'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamo nu kho, aavuso, aasavo''ti? ``tayo me, aavuso, aasavaa ^a^M2.0451^ea^. kaamaasavo, bhavaasavo, avijjaasavo -- ime kho, aavuso, tayo aasavaa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etesa.m aasavaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa etesa.m aasavaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etesa.m aasavaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo etesa.m aasavaana.m pahaanaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etesa.m aasavaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m aasavaana.m pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ```avijjaa, avijjaa'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, aavuso, avijjaa''ti? ``ya.m kho, aavuso, dukkhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ^a^T4.0316^ea^ a~n~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccataavuso, avijjaa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etissaa avijjaaya pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etissaa avijjaaya pahaanaayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etissaa avijjaaya pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etissaa avijjaaya pahaanaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo ^a^V2.0251^ea^ sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etissaa avijjaaya pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etissaa avijjaaya ^a^P4.0257^ea^ pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ```ta.nhaa, ta.nhaa'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamaa nu kho, aavuso, ta.nhaa''ti? ``tisso imaa, aavuso, ta.nhaa. kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa -- imaa kho, aavuso, tisso ta.nhaa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m ta.nhaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m ta.nhaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``katamo ^a^M2.0452^ea^ panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m ta.nhaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etaasa.m ta.nhaana.m pahaanaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m ta.nhaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa ^a^T4.0317^ea^, etaasa.m ta.nhaana.m pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ```ogho, ogho'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamo nu kho, aavuso, ogho''ti? ``cattaarome, aavuso, oghaa. kaamogho, bhavogho, di.t.thogho, avijjogho -- ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro oghaa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etesa.m oghaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etesa.m oghaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m oghaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etesa.m oghaana.m pahaanaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi ^a^P4.0258^ea^. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etesa.m oghaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako ^a^V2.0252^ea^, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m oghaana.m pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ ```upaadaana.m, upaadaana'nti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, upaadaana''nti? ``cattaarimaani, aavuso, upaadaanaani. kaamupaadaana.m, di.t.thupaadaana.m siilabbatupaadaana.m, attavaadupaadaana.m -- imaani kho, aavuso, cattaari upaadaanaanii''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etesa.m upaadaanaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etesa.m upaadaanaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti ^a^T4.0318^ea^. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m upaadaanaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etesa.m upaadaanaana.m pahaanaaya, seyyathida.m ^a^M2.0453^ea^ -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etesa.m upaadaanaana.m pahaanaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m upaadaanaana.m pahaanaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ```bhavo, bhavo'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamo nu kho, aavuso, bhavo''ti? ``tayo me, aavuso, bhavaa. kaamabhavo, ruupabhavo, aruupabhavo -- ime kho, aavuso, tayo bhavaa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etesa.m bhavaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etesa.m bhavaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``katamo, panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m bhavaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``ayameva ^a^P4.0259^ea^ kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etesa.m bhavaana.m pari~n~naaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etesa.m bhavaana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etesa.m bhavaana.m pari~n~naaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. terasama.m.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ```dukkha.m ^a^V2.0253^ea^, dukkha'nti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, dukkha''nti? ``tisso imaa, aavuso, dukkhataa. dukkhadukkhataa, sa"nkhaaradukkhataa ^a^T4.0319^ea^, vipari.naamadukkhataa -- imaa kho, aavuso, tisso dukkhataa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m dukkhataana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m dukkhataana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m dukkhataana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etaasa.m dukkhataana.m pari~n~naaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m dukkhataana.m pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etaasa.m dukkhataana.m pari~n~naaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. cuddasama.m.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ```sakkaayo ^a^M2.0454^ea^, sakkaayo'ti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katamo nu kho, aavuso, sakkaayo''ti? ``pa~ncime, aavuso, upaadaanakkhandhaa sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa, seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho, vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho ^a^P4.0260^ea^. ime kho, aavuso, pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa sakkaayo vutto bhagavataa''ti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa sakkaayassa pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa sakkaayassa pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``katamo panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa, etassa sakkaayassa pari~n~naayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etassa sakkaayassa pari~n~naaya ^a^T4.0320^ea^, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etassa sakkaayassa pari~n~naayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etassa sakkaayassa pari~n~naaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. pannarasama.m.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m ^a^V2.0254^ea^ nu kho, aavuso saariputta, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dukkara''nti? ``pabbajjaa kho, aavuso, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dukkaraa''ti. ``pabbajitena panaavuso, ki.m dukkara''nti? ``pabbajitena kho, aavuso, abhirati dukkaraa''ti. ``abhiratena panaavuso, ki.m dukkara''nti? ``abhiratena kho, aavuso, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti dukkaraa''ti. ``kiivacira.m panaavuso, dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhu araha.m assaa''ti? ``nacira.m, aavuso''ti. so.lasama.m.
[06] jambukhaadakasa.myutta.m samatta.m.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] nibbaana.m arahatta~nca, dhammavaadii ^a^P4.0261^ea^ kimatthiya.m.
[27] assaaso paramassaaso, vedanaa aasavaavijjaa.
[26] ta.nhaa oghaa upaadaana.m, bhavo dukkha~nca sakkaayo..
[22] imasmi.m dhammavinaye dukkaranti..

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0321^ea^ ^a^V2.0255^ea^ ^a^M2.0455^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa saariputto vajjiisu viharati ukkacelaaya.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa tiire. atha kho saama.n.dako {saama.n.dakaani (sii0)} paribbaajako yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho saama.n.dako paribbaajako aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ```nibbaana.m, nibbaana'nti, aavuso saariputta, vuccati. katama.m nu kho, aavuso, nibbaana''nti? ``yo kho, aavuso, raagakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo -- ida.m vuccati nibbaana''nti. ``atthi panaavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``atthi kho, aavuso, maggo atthi pa.tipadaa, etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti.

[03] ``katamo ^a^P4.0262^ea^ panaavuso, maggo katamaa pa.tipadaa etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti? ``ayameva kho, aavuso, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi sammaasa"nkappo sammaavaacaa sammaakammanto sammaaaajiivo sammaavaayaamo sammaasati sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho, aavuso, maggo aya.m pa.tipadaa, etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaayaa''ti. ``bhaddako, aavuso, maggo bhaddikaa pa.tipadaa, etassa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya. ala~nca panaavuso saariputta, appamaadaayaa''ti. pa.thama.m.
[03] (yathaa jambukhaadakasa.myutta.m, tathaa vitthaaretabba.m).

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ ``ki.m ^a^V2.0256^ea^ ^a^M2.0456^ea^ nu kho, aavuso saariputta, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dukkara''nti ^a^T4.0322^ea^? ``pabbajjaa kho, aavuso, imasmi.m dhammavinaye dukkaraa''ti. ``pabbajitena panaavuso, ki.m dukkara''nti? ``pabbajitena kho, aavuso, abhirati dukkaraa''ti. ``abhiratena panaavuso, ki.m dukkara''nti? ``abhiratena kho, aavuso, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti dukkaraa''ti. ``kiivacira.m panaavuso, dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno bhikkhu araha.m assaa''ti? ``nacira.m, aavuso''ti. so.lasama.m.
[03] (purimakasadisa.m uddaana.m.)
[06] saama.n.dakasa.myutta.m samatta.m.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0323^ea^ ^a^V2.0257^ea^ ^a^M2.0457^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra ^a^P4.0263^ea^ kho aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, bhikkhave''ti. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa mahaamoggallaano etadavoca --

[03] ``idha mayha.m, aavuso, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `pa.thama.m jhaana.m, pa.thama.m jhaana'nti vuccati. katama.m nu kho pa.thama.m jhaananti? tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati pa.thama.m jhaana'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato kaamasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `moggallaana, moggallaana! maa, braahma.na, pa.thama.m jhaana.m pamaado, pa.thame jhaane citta.m sa.n.thapehi, pa.thame jhaane citta.m ekodi.m karohi {ekodikarohi (pii0)}, pa.thame jhaane citta.m samaadahaa'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi ^a^T4.0324^ea^ savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. ya~nhi ta.m, aavuso, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `satthaaraanuggahito saavako mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto'ti, mama.m ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `satthaaraanuggahito saavako mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto'''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ ```dutiya.m ^a^V2.0258^ea^ ^a^M2.0458^ea^ jhaana.m, dutiya.m jhaana'nti vuccati. katama.m nu kho dutiya.m jhaananti? tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m ^a^P4.0264^ea^ vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati dutiya.m jhaana'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato vitakkasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `moggallaana, moggallaana! maa, braahma.na, dutiya.m jhaana.m pamaado, dutiye jhaane citta.m sa.n.thapehi, dutiye jhaane citta.m ekodi.m karohi, dutiye jhaane citta.m samaadahaa'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. ya~nhi ta.m, aavuso, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `satthaaraanuggahito saavako mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto'ti, mama.m ta.m ^a^T4.0325^ea^ sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `satthaaraanuggahito saavako mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto'''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ```tatiya.m jhaana.m, tatiya.m jhaana'nti vuccati. katama.m nu kho tatiya.m jhaananti? tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- idha bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati tatiya.m jhaananti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharaami sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedemi. ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato piitisahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti.

[03] ``atha ^a^V2.0259^ea^ ^a^M2.0459^ea^ ^a^P4.0265^ea^ kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `moggallaana, moggallaana! maa, braahma.na, tatiya.m jhaana.m pamaado, tatiye jhaane citta.m sa.n.thapehi, tatiye jhaane citta.m ekodi.m karohi, tatiye jhaane citta.m samaadahaa'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharaami sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedemi, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. ya~nhi ta.m aavuso sammaa vadamaano vadeyya...pe0... mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ```catuttha.m jhaana.m ^a^T4.0326^ea^, catuttha.m jhaana'nti vuccati. katama.m nu kho catuttha.m jhaananti? tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati catuttha.m jhaana'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato sukhasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `moggallaana, moggallaana! maa, braahma.na, catuttha.m jhaana.m pamaado, catutthe jhaane citta.m sa.n.thapehi, catutthe jhaane citta.m ekodi.m karohi, catutthe jhaane citta.m samaadahaa'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m ^a^P4.0266^ea^ attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. ya~nhi ta.m, aavuso, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya...pe0... mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ```aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m, aakaasaana~ncaayatana'nti vuccati. katama.m nu kho aakaasaana~ncaayatananti ^a^V2.0260^ea^? tassa mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `idha ^a^M2.0460^ea^ bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m ^a^T4.0327^ea^ amanasikaaraa ananto aakaasoti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati aakaasaana~ncaayatana'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa ananto aakaasoti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato ruupasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ```vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana'nti vuccati. katama.m nu kho vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatananti? tassa ^a^P4.0267^ea^ mayha.m, aavuso, etadahosi -- `idha bhikkhu sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ananta.m vi~n~naa.nanti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana'nti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ananta.m vi~n~naa.nanti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharaami ^a^T4.0328^ea^. tassa mayha.m, aavuso, iminaa vihaarena viharato aakaasaana~ncaayatanasahagataa sa~n~naamanasikaaraa samudaacaranti.

[03] ``atha kho ma.m, aavuso, bhagavaa iddhiyaa upasa"nkamitvaa etadavoca -- `moggallaana, moggallaana! maa, braahma.na, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m pamaado, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane ^a^V2.0261^ea^ citta.m sa.n.thapehi, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m ekodi.m karohi, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane citta.m samaadahaa'ti. so khvaaha.m, aavuso, aparena samayena sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma ananta.m vi~n~naa.nanti ^a^M2.0461^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja vihaasi.m. ya~nhi ta.m, aavuso, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya...pe0... mahaabhi~n~nata.m patto''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] ```sa.myojana'nti vaa, bhante, `sa.myojaniyaa dhammaa'ti vaa ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca. tena hi, bhante, upama.m vo karissaami. upamaayapidhekacce vi~n~nuu purisaa bhaasitassa attha.m aajaananti. seyyathaapi, bhante, kaa.lo ca baliibaddo odaato ca baliibaddo ^a^T4.0349^ea^ ekena daamena vaa yottena vaa sa.myuttaa assu. yo nu kho eva.m vadeyya -- `kaa.lo baliibaddo odaatassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana.m ^a^P4.0283^ea^, odaato baliibaddo kaa.lassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana'nti, sammaa nu kho so vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, gahapati! na kho, gahapati, kaa.lo baliibaddo odaatassa baliibaddassa sa.myojana.m, napi odaato baliibaddo kaa.lassa ba.liibaddassa sa.myojana.m; yena kho te ekena daamena vaa yottena vaa sa.myuttaa ta.m tattha sa.myojana''nti. ``evameva kho, bhante, na cakkhu ruupaana.m sa.myojana.m, na ruupaa cakkhussa sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. na sota.m saddaana.m... na ghaana.m gandhaana.m... na jivhaa rasaana.m... na kaayo pho.t.thabbaana.m sa.myojana.m, na pho.t.thabbaa kaayassa sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago ta.m tattha sa.myojana.m. na mano dhammaana.m sa.myojana.m, na dhammaa manassa sa.myojana.m; ya~nca tattha tadubhaya.m pa.ticca uppajjati chandaraago ta.m tattha sa.myojana''nti. ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati, yassa te gambhiire buddhavacane pa~n~naacakkhu kamatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu macchikaasa.n.de viharanti ambaa.takavane. atha kho citto gahapati yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^T4.0350^ea^ nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhuu etadavoca ^a^V2.0277^ea^ -- ``adhivaasentu me, bhante, theraa svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesu.m kho theraa bhikkhuu tu.nhiibhaavena ^a^M2.0476^ea^. atha kho citto gahapati theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha ^a^P4.0284^ea^ kho theraa bhikkhuu tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.msu.

[03] atha kho citto gahapati yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ```dhaatunaanatta.m, dhaatunaanatta'nti, bhante thera, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti? eva.m vutte aayasmaa thero tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ```dhaatunaanatta.m, dhaatunaanatta'nti, bhante thera, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti? dutiyampi kho aayasmaa thero tu.nhii ahosi. tatiyampi kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ```dhaatunaanatta.m, dhaatunaanatta'nti, bhante thera, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti? tatiyampi kho aayasmaa thero tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] tena ^a^T4.0351^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa isidatto tasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe sabbanavako hoti. atha kho aayasmaa isidatto aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``byaakaromaha.m, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino eta.m pa~nha''nti? ``byaakarohi tva.m, aavuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino eta.m pa~nha''nti. ``eva~nhi tva.m, gahapati, pucchasi -- `dhaatunaanatta.m, dhaatunaanattanti, bhante thera, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, dhaatunaanatta.m, vutta.m bhagavataa'''ti? ``eva.m ^a^P4.0285^ea^, bhante''. ``ida.m kho, gahapati, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa -- cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu...pe0... manodhaatu, dhammadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu. ettaavataa kho, gahapati, dhaatunaanatta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti.

[03] atha kho citto gahapati aayasmato isidattassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa there bhikkhuu pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu bhuttaavino oniitapattapaa.nino u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu. atha kho aayasmaa thero aayasmanta.m ^a^V2.0278^ea^ isidatta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu kho ta.m, aavuso isidatta ^a^M2.0477^ea^, eso pa~nho pa.tibhaasi, neso pa~nho ma.m pa.tibhaasi. tenahaavuso isidatta, yadaa a~n~nathaapi {yadaa a~n~nadaapi (sii0 pii0) a~n~nadaapi (?)} evaruupo pa~nho aagaccheyya, ta~n~nevettha pa.tibhaaseyyaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu macchikaasa.n.de viharanti ambaa.takavane. atha kho citto gahapati yena theraa bhikkhuu ^a^T4.0352^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``adhivaasentu me, bhante theraa, svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesu.m kho theraa bhikkhuu tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho citto gahapati theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena cittassa gahapatissa nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.msu.
