[03] atha ^a^P4.0286^ea^ kho citto gahapati yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``yaa imaa, bhante thera, anekavihitaa di.t.thiyo loke uppajjanti -- `sassato lokoti vaa, asassato lokoti vaa, antavaa lokoti vaa, anantavaa lokoti vaa, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariiranti vaa, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariiranti vaa, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa. yaani cimaani dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani brahmajaale bha.nitaani; imaa nu kho, bhante, di.t.thiyo kismi.m sati honti, kismi.m asati na hontii''ti?

[03] eva.m ^a^T4.0353^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa thero tu.nhii ahosi. dutiyampi kho citto gahapati...pe0... tatiyampi kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``yaa imaa, bhante thera, anekavihitaa di.t.thiyo loke ^a^M2.0478^ea^ uppajjanti -- sassato lokoti vaa, asassato lokoti vaa, antavaa lokoti vaa, anantavaa ^a^V2.0279^ea^ lokoti vaa, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariiranti vaa, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariiranti vaa, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa. yaani cimaani dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani brahmajaale bha.nitaani; imaa nu kho, bhante, di.t.thiyo kismi.m sati honti, kismi.m asati na hontii''ti? tatiyampi kho aayasmaa thero tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa isidatto tasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe sabbanavako hoti. atha kho aayasmaa isidatto aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``byaakaromaha.m, bhante thera, cittassa gahapatino eta.m pa~nha''nti? ``byaakarohi tva.m, aavuso isidatta, cittassa gahapatino eta.m pa~nha''nti. ``eva~nhi ^a^P4.0287^ea^ tva.m, gahapati, pucchasi -- `yaa imaa, bhante thera, anekavihitaa di.t.thiyo loke uppajjanti -- sassato lokoti vaa...pe0...; imaa nu kho, bhante, di.t.thiyo kismi.m ^a^T4.0354^ea^ sati honti, kismi.m asati na hontii'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``yaa imaa, gahapati, anekavihitaa di.t.thiyo loke uppajjanti -- `sassato lokoti vaa, asassato lokoti vaa, antavaa lokoti vaa anantavaa lokoti vaa, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariiranti vaa, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariiranti vaa, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa. yaani cimaani dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani brahmajaale bha.nitaani; imaa kho, gahapati, di.t.thiyo sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa sati honti, sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa asati na hontii'''ti.

[03] ``katha.m pana, bhante, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti? ``idha, gahapati, assutavaa puthujjano ariyaana.m adassaavii ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme aviniito, sappurisaana.m adassaavii sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme aviniito ruupa.m attato samanupassati, ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani vaa ruupa.m, ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m; vedana.m attato samanupassati...pe0... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m, attani ^a^M2.0479^ea^ vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho, gahapati, sakkaayadi.t.thi hotii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^V2.0280^ea^ pana, bhante, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti? ``idha, gahapati, sutavaa ^a^T4.0355^ea^ ariyasaavako ariyaana.m dassaavii ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suviniito sappurisaana.m dassaavii sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suviniito na ruupa.m attato samanupassati, na ruupavanta.m vaa attaana.m, na attani vaa ruupa.m, na ruupasmi.m vaa attaana.m; na vedana.m... na sa~n~na.m... na sa"nkhaare... na vi~n~naa.na.m attato samanupassati, na vi~n~naa.navanta.m vaa attaana.m, na attani vaa vi~n~naa.na.m, na vi~n~naa.nasmi.m vaa attaana.m. eva.m kho, gahapati, sakkaayadi.t.thi na hotii''ti.

[01] ``kuto ^a^P4.0288^ea^, bhante, ayyo isidatto aagacchatii''ti? ``avantiyaa kho, gahapati, aagacchaamii''ti. ``atthi, bhante, avantiyaa isidatto naama kulaputto amhaaka.m adi.t.thasahaayo pabbajito? di.t.tho so aayasmataa''ti? ``eva.m, gahapatii''ti. ``kaha.m nu kho so, bhante, aayasmaa etarahi viharatii''ti? eva.m vutte, aayasmaa isidatto tu.nhii ahosi. ``ayyo no, bhante, isidatto''ti? ``eva.m, gahapatii''ti. ``abhiramatu, bhante, ayyo isidatto macchikaasa.n.de. rama.niiya.m ambaa.takavana.m. aha.m ayyassa isidattassa ussukka.m karissaami ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. ``kalyaa.na.m vuccati, gahapatii''ti.

[03] atha kho citto gahapati aayasmato isidattassa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa there bhikkhuu pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu bhuttaavino oniitapattapaa.nino ^a^T4.0356^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu. atha kho aayasmaa thero aayasmanta.m isidatta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu kho ta.m, aavuso isidatta, eso pa~nho pa.tibhaasi. neso pa~nho ma.m pa.tibhaasi. tenahaavuso isidatta, yadaa a~n~nathaapi evaruupo pa~nho aagaccheyya, ta~n~nevettha pa.tibhaaseyyaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa isidatto senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya macchikaasa.n.damhaa pakkaami. ya.m macchikaasa.n.damhaa pakkaami, tathaa pakkantova ahosi, na puna paccaagacchiiti. tatiya.m.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0281^ea^ ^a^M2.0480^ea^ samaya.m sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu macchikaasa.n.de viharanti ambaa.takavane. atha ^a^P4.0289^ea^ kho citto gahapati yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``adhivaasentu me, bhante theraa, svaatanaaya gokule bhatta''nti. adhivaasesu.m kho theraa bhikkhuu tu.nhiibhaavena. atha kho citto gahapati theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa there bhikkhuu abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena cittassa gahapatino gokula.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi.msu.

[03] atha kho citto gahapati there bhikkhuu pa.niitena sappipaayaasena sahatthaa santappesi ^a^T4.0357^ea^ sampavaaresi. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu bhuttaavino oniitapattapaa.nino u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu. cittopi kho gahapati `sesaka.m vissajjethaa'ti vatvaa there bhikkhuu pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhi. tena kho pana samayena u.nha.m hoti kuthita.m {ku.t.thita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}; te ca theraa bhikkhuu paveliyamaanena ma~n~ne kaayena gacchanti, yathaa ta.m bhojana.m bhuttaavino.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa mahako tasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe sabbanavako hoti. atha kho aayasmaa mahako aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu khvassa, bhante thera, siitako ca vaato vaayeyya, abbhasampilaapo {abbhasa.mbilaapo (sii0), abbhasa.mvilaapo (pii0)} ca assa, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayeyyaa''ti.

[03] ``saadhu khvassa, aavuso mahaka, ya.m siitako ca vaato vaayeyya, abbhasampilaapo ca assa, devo ca ekameka.m phusaayeyyaa''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahako tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m ^a^P4.0290^ea^ abhisa"nkhari {abhisa"nkhaasi (sii0)} yathaa siitako ca vaato vaayi, abbhasampilaapo ca assa {aasi (?)}, devo ca ekameka.m phusi. atha kho cittassa gahapatino etadahosi -- ``yo kho imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe sabbanavako bhikkhu tassaaya.m evaruupo iddhaanubhaavo''ti ^a^M2.0481^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa mahako aaraama.m sampaapu.nitvaa aayasmanta.m thera.m etadavoca -- ``alamettaavataa, bhante theraa''ti? ``alamettaavataa, aavuso mahaka! katamettaavataa, aavuso mahaka! puujitamettaavataa, aavuso mahako''ti ^a^V2.0282^ea^. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu yathaavihaara.m agama.msu. aayasmaapi mahako saka.m vihaara.m agamaasi.

[03] atha kho citto gahapati yenaayasmaa mahako ^a^T4.0358^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m mahaka.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m mahaka.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, ayyo mahako uttarimanussadhamma.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetuu''ti. ``tena hi tva.m, gahapati, aalinde uttaraasa"nga.m pa~n~napetvaa ti.nakalaapa.m okaasehii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho citto gahapati aayasmato mahakassa pa.tissutvaa aalinde uttaraasa"nga.m pa~n~napetvaa ti.nakalaapa.m okaasesi. atha kho aayasmaa mahako vihaara.m pavisitvaa suucigha.tika.m datvaa tathaaruupa.m iddhaabhisa"nkhaara.m abhisa"nkhari yathaa taalacchigga.lena ca agga.lantarikaaya ca acci nikkhamitvaa ti.naani jhaapesi, uttaraasa"nga.m na jhaapesi. atha kho citto gahapati uttaraasa"nga.m pappho.tetvaa sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. atha kho aayasmaa mahako vihaaraa nikkhamitvaa citta.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``alamettaavataa, gahapatii''ti?

[03] ``alamettaavataa ^a^P4.0291^ea^, bhante mahaka! katamettaavataa, bhante, mahaka! puujitamettaavataa, bhante mahaka! abhiramatu, bhante, ayyo mahako macchikaasa.n.de. rama.niiya.m ambaa.takavana.m. aha.m ayyassa mahakassa ussukka.m karissaami ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. ``kalyaa.na.m vuccati, gahapatii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahako senaasana.m sa.msaametvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya macchikaasa.n.damhaa pakkaami. ya.m macchikaasa.n.damhaa pakkaami, tathaa pakkantova ahosi; na puna paccaagacchiiti. catuttha.m.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0359^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa kaamabhuu macchikaasa.n.de viharati ambaa.takavane. atha kho citto gahapati yenaayasmaa kaamabhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m kaamabhu.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi ^a^M2.0482^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho citta.m gahapati.m aayasmaa kaamabhuu etadavoca --
[03] ``vuttamida.m ^a^V2.0283^ea^, gahapati --
[21] ``nela"ngo setapacchaado, ekaaro vattatii ratho.
[22] aniigha.m passa aayanta.m {appatta.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, chinnasota.m abandhana''nti..

[03] ``imassa nu kho, gahapati, sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa katha.m vitthaarena attho da.t.thabbo''ti? ``ki.m nu kho eta.m, bhante, bhagavataa bhaasita''nti? ``eva.m, gahapatii''ti. ``tena hi, bhante, muhutta.m aagamehi yaavassa attha.m pekkhaamii''ti. atha kho citto gahapati muhutta.m tu.nhii hutvaa aayasmanta.m kaamabhu.m etadavoca --

[03] ```nela"nga'nti ^a^P4.0292^ea^ kho, bhante, siilaanameta.m adhivacana.m. `setapacchaado'ti kho, bhante, vimuttiyaa eta.m adhivacana.m. `ekaaro'ti kho, bhante, satiyaa eta.m adhivacana.m. `vattatii'ti kho, bhante, abhikkamapa.tikkamasseta.m adhivacana.m. `ratho'ti kho, bhante, imasseta.m caatumahaabhuutikassa kaayassa adhivacana.m maataapettikasambhavassa odanakummaasuupacayassa aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanaviddha.msanadhammassa. raago kho, bhante, niigho, doso niigho, moho niigho. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu `aniigho'ti vuccati. `aayanta'nti ^a^T4.0360^ea^ kho, bhante, arahato eta.m adhivacana.m. `soto'ti kho, bhante, ta.nhaayeta.m adhivacana.m. saa khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu `chinnasoto'ti vuccati. raago kho, bhante, bandhana.m, doso bandhana.m, moho bandhana.m. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. tasmaa khii.naasavo bhikkhu `abandhano'ti vuccati. iti kho, bhante, ya.m ta.m bhagavataa vutta.m --
[21] ``nela"ngo setapacchaado, ekaaro vattatii ratho.
[22] aniigha.m passa aayanta.m, chinnasota.m abandhana''nti..

[03] ``imassa ^a^M2.0483^ea^ kho, bhante, bhagavataa sa.mkhittena bhaasitassa eva.m vitthaarena attha.m aajaanaamii''ti ^a^V2.0284^ea^. ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! yassa te gambhiire buddhavacane pa~n~naacakkhu kamatii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^P4.0293^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa kaamabhuu macchikaasa.n.de viharati ambaa.takavane. atha kho citto gahapati yenaayasmaa kaamabhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati aayasmanta.m kaamabhu.m etadavoca -- ``kati nu kho, bhante, sa"nkhaaraa''ti? ``tayo kho, gahapati, sa"nkhaaraa -- kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa"nkhaaro, cittasa"nkhaaro''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho citto gahapati aayasmato kaamabhussa bhaasita.m ^a^T4.0361^ea^ abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa aayasmanta.m kaamabhu.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``katamo pana, bhante, kaayasa"nkhaaro, katamo vaciisa"nkhaaro, katamo cittasa"nkhaaro''ti? ``assaasapassaasaa kho, gahapati, kaayasa"nkhaaro, vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro, sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho citto gahapati...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``kasmaa pana, bhante, assaasapassaasaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, kasmaa vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro, kasmaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti? ``assaasapassaasaa kho, gahapati, kaayikaa. ete dhammaa kaayappa.tibaddhaa, tasmaa assaasapassaasaa kaayasa"nkhaaro. pubbe kho, gahapati, vitakketvaa vicaaretvaa pacchaa vaaca.m bhindati, tasmaa vitakkavicaaraa vaciisa"nkhaaro. sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cetasikaa. ete dhammaa cittappa.tibaddhaa, tasmaa sa~n~naa ca vedanaa ca cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.

[03] saadhu...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``katha.m pana, bhante, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapatti hotii''ti? ``na kho, gahapati, sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantassa bhikkhuno eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjissa'nti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjaamii'ti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno'ti vaa ^a^P4.0294^ea^. atha khvassa pubbeva tathaa citta.m bhaavita.m hoti ya.m ta.m tathattaaya upanetii''ti.

[03] saadhu ^a^M2.0484^ea^ ...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantassa ^a^T4.0362^ea^ pana, bhante ^a^V2.0285^ea^, bhikkhuno katame dhammaa pa.thama.m nirujjhanti, yadi vaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa vaciisa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa cittasa"nkhaaro''ti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapajjantassa kho, gahapati, bhikkhuno vaciisa"nkhaaro pa.thama.m nirujjhati, tato kaayasa"nkhaaro, tato cittasa"nkhaaro''ti.

[03] saadhu...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``yvaaya.m, bhante, mato kaala"nkato, yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno, imesa.m ki.m naanaakara.na''nti? ``yvaaya.m gahapati, mato kaala"nkato tassa kaayasa"nkhaaro niruddho pa.tippassaddho, vaciisa"nkhaaro niruddho pa.tippassaddho, cittasa"nkhaaro niruddho pa.tippassaddho, aayu parikkhii.no, usmaa vuupasantaa, indriyaani viparibhinnaani. yo ca khvaaya.m, gahapati, bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno, tassapi kaayasa"nkhaaro niruddho pa.tippassaddho, vaciisa"nkhaaro niruddho pa.tippassaddho, cittasa"nkhaaro niruddho pa.tippassaddho, aayu aparikkhii.no, usmaa avuupasantaa, indriyaani vippasannaani. yvaaya.m, gahapati, mato kaala"nkato, yo caaya.m bhikkhu sa~n~naavedayitanirodha.m samaapanno, ida.m nesa.m naanaakara.na''nti.

[03] saadhu...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``katha.m pana, bhante, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thaana.m hotii''ti? ``na kho, gahapati, sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa bhikkhuno eva.m hoti -- `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahissa'nti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahaamii'ti vaa `aha.m sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa ^a^T4.0363^ea^ vu.t.thito'ti vaa. atha khvassa pubbeva tathaa citta.m bhaavita.m hoti, ya.m ta.m tathattaaya upanetii''ti.

[03] saadhu ^a^P4.0295^ea^, bhante...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa pana, bhante, bhikkhuno katame dhammaa pa.thama.m uppajjanti, yadi vaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa vaciisa"nkhaaro, yadi vaa cittasa"nkhaaro''ti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thahantassa, gahapati, bhikkhuno cittasa"nkhaaro pa.thama.m uppajjati, tato kaayasa"nkhaaro, tato vaciisa"nkhaaro''ti.

[03] saadhu...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thita.m pana, bhante ^a^V2.0286^ea^, bhikkhu.m kati phassaa phusanti''? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thita.m ^a^M2.0485^ea^ kho, gahapati, bhikkhu.m tayo phassaa phusanti -- su~n~nato phasso, animitto phasso, appa.nihito phasso''ti.

[03] saadhu...pe0... uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi -- ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thitassa pana, bhante, bhikkhuno ki.mninna.m citta.m hoti, ki.mpo.na.m, ki.mpabbhaara''nti? ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa vu.t.thitassa kho, gahapati, bhikkhuno vivekaninna.m citta.m hoti vivekapo.na.m vivekapabbhaara''nti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho citto gahapati aayasmato kaamabhussa bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa aayasmanta.m kaamabhu.m uttari.m pa~nha.m apucchi ^a^T4.0364^ea^ -- ``sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa pana, bhante, kati dhammaa bahuupakaaraa''ti? ``addhaa kho tva.m, gahapati, ya.m pa.thama.m pucchitabba.m ta.m pucchasi. api ca tyaaha.m byaakarissaami. sa~n~naavedayitanirodhasamaapattiyaa kho, gahapati, dve dhammaa bahuupakaaraa -- samatho ca vipassanaa caa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa godatto macchikaasa.n.de viharati ambaa.takavane. atha ^a^P4.0296^ea^ kho citto gahapati yenaayasmaa godatto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m godatta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho citta.m gahapati.m aayasmaa godatto etadavoca -- ``yaa caaya.m, gahapati, appamaa.naa cetovimutti, yaa ca aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti, yaa ca su~n~nataa cetovimutti, yaa ca animittaa cetovimutti, ime dhammaa naanatthaa naanaabya~njanaa udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti? ``atthi, bhante, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca. atthi pana, bhante, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhante, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca? idha, bhante, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa ^a^V2.0287^ea^ dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m {catutthi.m (?)}. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya ^a^T4.0365^ea^ sabbaavanta.m loka.m ^a^M2.0486^ea^ mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena {abyaapajjhena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), abyaabajjhena (?)} pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhante, appamaa.naa cetovimutti.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhante, aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti? idha, bhante, bhikkhu sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma, `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhante, aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimutti.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhante, su~n~nataa cetovimutti? idha, bhante, bhikkhu ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `su~n~namida.m attena vaa ^a^P4.0297^ea^ attaniyena vaa'ti. aya.m vuccati, bhante, su~n~nataa cetovimutti.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhante, animittaa cetovimutti? idha, bhante, bhikkhu sabbanimittaana.m amanasikaaraa animitta.m cetosamaadhi.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhante, animittaa cetovimutti. aya.m kho, bhante, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva ^a^T4.0366^ea^ naanaabya~njanaa ca.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhante, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ime dhammaa ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana.m? raago, bhante, pamaa.nakara.no, doso pamaa.nakara.no, moho pamaa.nakara.no. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, bhante, appamaa.naa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho pana akuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. raago kho, bhante, ki~ncana.m, doso ki~ncana.m, moho ki~ncana.m. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho ^a^V2.0288^ea^, bhante, aaki~nca~n~naa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho ^a^M2.0487^ea^ pana akuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. raago kho, bhante, nimittakara.no, doso nimittakara.no, moho nimittakara.no. te khii.naasavassa bhikkhuno pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yaavataa kho, bhante, animittaa cetovimuttiyo, akuppaa taasa.m cetovimutti aggamakkhaayati. saa kho pana akuppaa cetovimutti su~n~naa raagena, su~n~naa dosena, su~n~naa mohena. aya.m kho, bhante, pariyaayo ya.m pariyaaya.m aagamma ^a^T4.0367^ea^ ime dhammaa ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti. ``laabhaa te, gahapati, suladdha.m te, gahapati! yassa te gambhiire buddhavacane pa~n~naacakkhu kamatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naataputto (sii0)} macchikaasa.n.da.m ^a^P4.0298^ea^ anuppatto hoti mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi.m. assosi kho citto gahapati -- ``niga.n.tho kira naa.taputto macchikaasa.n.da.m anuppatto mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi''nti. atha kho citto gahapati sambahulehi upaasakehi saddhi.m yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.thena naa.taputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho citta.m gahapati.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto etadavoca -- ``saddahasi tva.m, gahapati, sama.nassa gotamassa -- atthi avitakko avicaaro samaadhi, atthi vitakkavicaaraana.m nirodho''ti?

[03] ``na khvaaha.m ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhaaya gacchaami. atthi avitakko avicaaro samaadhi, atthi vitakkavicaaraana.m nirodho''ti. eva.m vutte, niga.n.tho naa.taputto ulloketvaa {saka.m parisa.m apaloketvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), oloketvaa (sii0 a.t.tha0 syaa0 a.t.tha0)} etadavoca -- ``ida.m bhavanto passantu, yaava ujuko caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava asa.tho caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava amaayaavii caaya.m citto gahapati, vaata.m vaa so jaalena baadhetabba.m ma~n~neyya, yo vitakkavicaare ^a^T4.0368^ea^ nirodhetabba.m ma~n~neyya ^a^M2.0488^ea^, sakamu.t.thinaa vaa so ga"ngaaya sota.m aavaaretabba.m ma~n~neyya, yo vitakkavicaare nirodhetabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0289^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, bhante, katama.m nu kho pa.niitatara.m -- ~naa.na.m vaa saddhaa vaa''ti? ``saddhaaya kho, gahapati, ~naa.na.myeva pa.niitatara''nti. ``aha.m kho, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami ^a^P4.0299^ea^. aha.m kho, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aha.m kho, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aha.m kho, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. na so khvaaha.m, bhante, eva.m jaananto eva.m passanto kassa a~n~nassa sama.nassa vaa braahma.nassa vaa saddhaaya gamissaami? atthi avitakko avicaaro samaadhi, atthi vitakkavicaaraana.m nirodho''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, niga.n.tho naa.taputto saka.m parisa.m apaloketvaa etadavoca -- ``ida.m bhavanto passantu, yaava anujuko caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava sa.tho caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava maayaavii caaya.m citto gahapatii''ti.

[03] ``idaaneva kho te {idaaneva ca pana (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} maya.m, bhante, bhaasita.m -- `eva.m aajaanaama ^a^T4.0369^ea^ ida.m bhavanto passantu, yaava ujuko caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava asa.tho caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava amaayaavii caaya.m citto gahapatii'ti. idaaneva ca pana maya.m, bhante, bhaasita.m -- `eva.m aajaanaama ida.m bhavanto passantu, yaava anujuko caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava sa.tho caaya.m citto gahapati, yaava maayaavii caaya.m citto gahapatii'ti. sace te, bhante, purima.m sacca.m, pacchima.m te micchaa. sace pana te, bhante, purima.m micchaa, pacchima.m te sacca.m. ime kho pana, bhante, dasa sahadhammikaa pa~nhaa aagacchanti. yadaa nesa.m attha.m aajaaneyyaasi, atha ma.m pa.tihareyyaasi saddhi.m niga.n.thaparisaaya. eko pa~nho, eko uddeso, eka.m veyyaakara.na.m. dve pa~nhaa, dve uddesaa, dve veyyaakara.naani. tayo pa~nhaa, tayo uddesaa, tii.ni veyyaakara.naani. cattaaro pa~nhaa, cattaaro uddesaa, cattaari ^a^M2.0489^ea^ veyyaakara.naani. pa~nca pa~nhaa, pa~nca uddesaa, pa~nca veyyaakara.naani. cha pa~nhaa, cha uddesaa, cha veyyaakara.naani. satta pa~nhaa, satta uddesaa, satta veyyaakara.naani ^a^V2.0290^ea^. a.t.tha pa~nhaa, a.t.tha ^a^P4.0300^ea^ uddesaa, a.t.tha veyyaakara.naani. nava pa~nhaa, nava uddesaa, nava veyyaakara.naani. dasa pa~nhaa, dasa uddesaa, dasa veyyaakara.naanii''ti. atha kho citto gahapati niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m ime dasa sahadhammike pa~nhe aapucchitvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^T4.0370^ea^ kho pana samayena acelo kassapo macchikaasa.n.da.m anuppatto hoti cittassa gahapatino puraa.nagihisahaayo. assosi kho citto gahapati -- ``acelo kira kassapo macchikaasa.n.da.m anuppatto amhaaka.m puraa.nagihisahaayo''ti. atha kho citto gahapati yena acelo kassapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa acelena kassapena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho citto gahapati acela.m kassapa.m etadavoca -- ``kiivacira.m pabbajitassa, bhante, kassapaa''ti? ``ti.msamattaani kho me, gahapati, vassaani pabbajitassaa''ti. ``imehi pana te, bhante, ti.msamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttarimanussadhammaa {uttarimanussadhammo (syaa0 ka.m0)} alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``imehi kho me, gahapati, ti.msamattehi vassehi pabbajitassa natthi koci uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato phaasuvihaaro, a~n~natra naggeyyaa ca mu.n.deyyaa ca paava.lanippho.tanaaya caa''ti. eva.m vutte, citto gahapati acela.m kassapa.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! dhammassa svaakkhaatataa {sabbatthapi evameva dissati} yatra hi naama ti.msamattehi vassehi na koci ^a^P4.0301^ea^ uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso adhigato abhavissa phaasuvihaaro, a~n~natra naggeyyaa ca mu.n.deyyaa ca paava.lanippho.tanaaya caa''ti!

[03] ``tuyha.m pana, gahapati, kiivacira.m ^a^T4.0371^ea^ upaasakatta.m upagatassaa''ti? ``mayhampi kho pana, bhante, ti.msamattaani vassaani upaasakatta.m upagatassaa''ti. ``imehi pana te, gahapati, ti.msamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso ^a^M2.0490^ea^ adhigato phaasuvihaaro''ti? ``gihinopi siyaa, bhante. aha~nhi, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aha~nhi, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ^a^V2.0291^ea^ ...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aha~nhi, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. aha~nhi, bhante, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami, sukhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami. sace kho panaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato {bhagavataa (syaa0 ka.m0)} pa.thamatara.m kaala.m kareyya.m, anacchariya.m kho paneta.m ya.m ma.m bhagavaa eva.m byaakareyya -- `natthi ta.m sa.myojana.m yena sa.myojanena sa.myutto citto gahapati puna ima.m loka.m aagaccheyyaa'''ti. eva.m vutte, acelo kassapo citta.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho! dhammassa svaakkhaatataa, yatra hi naama gihii odaatavasano {gihii odaatavasanaa (sii0 pii0)} evaruupa.m uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m adhigamissati {adhigamissanti (sii0 pii0)} phaasuvihaara.m. labheyyaaha.m, gahapati ^a^P4.0302^ea^, imasmi.m dhammavinaye pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti.

[03] atha kho citto gahapati ^a^T4.0372^ea^ acela.m kassapa.m aadaaya yena theraa bhikkhuu tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa there bhikkhuu etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, acelo kassapo amhaaka.m puraa.nagihisahaayo. ima.m theraa pabbaajentu upasampaadentu. ahamassa ussukka.m karissaami ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana''nti. alattha kho acelo kassapo imasmi.m dhammavinaye pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno ca panaayasmaa kassapo eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa kassapo arahata.m ahosiiti. navama.m.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^M2.0491^ea^ kho pana samayena citto gahapati aabaadhiko hoti dukkhito baa.lhagilaano. atha kho sambahulaa aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu ^a^V2.0292^ea^ adhivatthaa devataa sa"ngamma samaagamma citta.m gahapati.m etadavocu.m -- ``pa.nidhehi, gahapati, anaagatamaddhaana.m raajaa assa.m cakkavattii''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, citto gahapati taa aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaa devataa etadavoca -- ``tampi anicca.m, tampi addhuva.m, tampi pahaaya gamaniiya''nti. eva.m ^a^T4.0373^ea^ vutte, cittassa gahapatino mittaamaccaa ~naatisaalohitaa ^a^P4.0303^ea^ citta.m gahapati.m etadavocu.m -- ``sati.m, ayyaputta, upa.t.thapehi, maa vippalapii''ti. ``ki.m taaha.m vadaami ya.m ma.m tumhe eva.m vadetha -- `sati.m, ayyaputta, upa.t.thapehi, maa vippalapii'''ti? ``eva.m kho tva.m, ayyaputta, vadesi -- `tampi anicca.m, tampi addhuva.m, tampi pahaaya gamaniiya'''nti. ``tathaa hi pana ma.m aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaa devataa evamaaha.msu -- `pa.nidhehi, gahapati, anaagatamaddhaana.m raajaa assa.m cakkavattii'ti. taaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `tampi anicca.m...pe0... tampi pahaaya gamaniiya'''nti. ``ki.m pana taa, ayyaputta, aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaa devataa atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa evamaaha.msu -- `pa.nidhehi, gahapati, anaagatamaddhaana.m raajaa assa.m cakkavattii'''ti? ``taasa.m kho aaraamadevataana.m vanadevataana.m rukkhadevataana.m osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaana.m devataana.m eva.m hoti -- `aya.m kho citto gahapati, siilavaa {siilavanto (ka0)} kalyaa.nadhammo. sace pa.nidahissati -- anaagatamaddhaana.m raajaa assa.m cakkavattii'ti, `tassa kho aya.m ijjhissati, siilavato cetopa.nidhi visuddhattaa dhammiko dhammika.m phala.m anupassatii'ti. ima.m kho taa aaraamadevataa vanadevataa rukkhadevataa osadhiti.navanappatiisu adhivatthaa devataa atthavasa.m sampassamaanaa evamaaha.msu -- `pa.nidhehi, gahapati, anaagatamaddhaana.m raajaa assa.m ^a^T4.0374^ea^ cakkavattii'ti. taaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `tampi anicca.m, tampi addhuva.m, tampi pahaaya gamaniiya'''nti.

[03] ``tena ^a^M2.0492^ea^ hi, ayyaputta, amhepi ovadaahii''ti. ``tasmaa hi vo eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- buddhe ^a^P4.0304^ea^ aveccappasaadena samannaagataa bhavissaama -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagataa bhavissaama -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. sa"nghe aveccappasaadena ^a^V2.0293^ea^ samannaagataa bhavissaama -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. ya.m kho pana ki~nci kule deyyadhamma.m sabba.m ta.m appa.tivibhatta.m bhavissati siilavantehi kalyaa.nadhammehiiti eva~nhi vo sikkhitabba''nti. atha kho citto gahapati mittaamacce ~naatisaalohite buddhe ca dhamme ca sa"nghe ca caage ca samaadapetvaa kaalamakaasiiti. dasama.m.
[06] cittasa.myutta.m samatta.m.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sa.myojana.m ^a^T4.0375^ea^ dve isidattaa, mahako kaamabhuupi ca.
[22] godatto ca niga.n.tho ca, acelena gilaanadassananti..

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V2.0294^ea^ ^a^M2.0493^ea^. atha ^a^T4.0376^ea^ ^a^P4.0305^ea^ kho ca.n.do gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ca.n.do gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco ca.n.do ca.n.dotveva {yena midhekacco ca.n.doteva (sii0 pii0)} sa"nkha.m gacchati. ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva {yena midhekacco suratoteva (sii0 pii0)} sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti? ``idha, gaama.ni, ekaccassa raago appahiino hoti. raagassa appahiinattaa pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamaano kopa.m paatukaroti. so ca.n.dotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. doso appahiino hoti. dosassa appahiinattaa pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamaano kopa.m paatukaroti. so ca.n.dotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. moho appahiino hoti. mohassa appahiinattaa pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamaano kopa.m paatukaroti. so ca.n.dotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. aya.m kho, gaama.ni, hetu, aya.m paccayo yena midhekacco ca.n.do ca.n.dotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati''.

[03] ``idha pana, gaama.ni, ekaccassa raago pahiino hoti. raagassa pahiinattaa pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamaano kopa.m na paatukaroti. so soratotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. doso pahiino hoti. dosassa pahiinattaa pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamaano kopa.m ^a^T4.0377^ea^ na paatukaroti. so soratotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. moho pahiino hoti. mohassa pahiinattaa pare na kopenti, parehi kopiyamaano kopa.m na paatukaroti. so soratotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. aya.m kho, gaama.ni, hetu aya.m paccayo yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva sa"nkha.m gacchatii''ti.

[01] eva.m ^a^V2.0295^ea^ ^a^P4.0306^ea^ vutte, ca.n.do gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa ^a^M2.0494^ea^ vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho taalapu.to {taalaputto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} na.tagaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho taalapu.to na.tagaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m na.taana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti, so ^a^T4.0378^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti? ``ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m. maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti. dutiyampi kho taalapu.to na.tagaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m na.taana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti? ``ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m. maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti. tatiyampi kho taalapu.to na.tagaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m na.taana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti, so ^a^P4.0307^ea^ kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti?

[03] ``addhaa kho tyaaha.m, gaama.ni, na labhaami {naalattha.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} -- `ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m, maa ma.m eta.m pucchii'ti. api ca tyaaha.m byaakarissaami. pubbe kho, gaama.ni, sattaa aviitaraagaa raagabandhanabaddhaa. tesa.m na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhammaa rajaniiyaa te upasa.mharati bhiyyosomattaaya. pubbe kho, gaama.ni, sattaa aviitadosaa dosabandhanabaddhaa. tesa.m na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhammaa ^a^M2.0495^ea^ dosaniiyaa te ^a^T4.0379^ea^ upasa.mharati bhiyyosomattaaya. pubbe kho, gaama.ni ^a^V2.0296^ea^, sattaa aviitamohaa mohabandhanabaddhaa. tesa.m na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhammaa mohaniiyaa te upasa.mharati bhiyyosomattaaya. so attanaa matto pamatto pare madetvaa pamaadetvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaaso naama nirayo tattha upapajjati. sace kho panassa eva.mdi.t.thi hoti -- `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti, saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi. micchaadi.t.thikassa kho panaaha.m, gaama.ni, purisapuggalassa dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, taalapu.to na.tagaama.ni, parodi, assuuni pavattesi. ``eta.m kho tyaaha.m, gaama.ni, naalattha.m -- `ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii'''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante, eta.m rodaami ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha; api caaha.m, bhante, pubbakehi aacariyapaacariyehi na.tehi diigharatta.m nikato va~ncito paluddho -- `yo so na.to ra"ngamajjhe ^a^P4.0308^ea^ samajjamajjhe saccaalikena jana.m haaseti rameti so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa pahaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'''ti. ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa ^a^T4.0380^ea^ magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya -- cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantiiti; evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca. labheyyaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, labheyya.m upasampada''nti. alattha kho taalapu.to na.tagaama.ni bhagavato santike pabbajja.m, alattha upasampada.m. aciruupasampanno ca panaayasmaa taalapu.to...pe0... arahata.m ahosiiti. dutiya.m.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ atha kho yodhaajiivo gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... ekamanta.m nisinno kho yodhaajiivo gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m yodhaajiivaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so yodhaajiivo sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ^a^M2.0496^ea^ ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti? ``ala.m ^a^V2.0297^ea^, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho yodhaajiivo gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m yodhaajiivaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so yodhaajiivo sa"ngaame ^a^T4.0381^ea^ ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti?

[03] ``addhaa ^a^P4.0309^ea^ kho tyaaha.m, gaama.ni, na labhaami -- `ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii'ti. api ca tyaaha.m byaakarissaami. yo so, gaama.ni, yodhaajiivo sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tassa ta.m citta.m pubbe gahita.m {hiina.m (sii0 pii0)} dukka.ta.m duppa.nihita.m -- `ime sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa bajjhantu vaa ucchijjantu vaa vinassantu vaa maa vaa ahesu.m iti vaa'ti. tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti; so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajito naama nirayo tattha upapajjatiiti. sace kho panassa eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `yo so yodhaajiivo sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti, saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi. micchaadi.t.thikassa kho panaaha.m, gaama.ni, purisapuggalassa dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte, yodhaajiivo gaama.ni parodi, assuuni pavattesi. ``eta.m kho tyaaha.m, gaama.ni, naalattha.m -- `ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii'''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante, eta.m rodaami ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha ^a^T4.0382^ea^; apicaaha.m, bhante, pubbakehi aacariyapaacariyehi yodhaajiivehi diigharatta.m nikato va~ncito paluddho -- `yo so yodhaajiivo sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'''ti. ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0298^ea^ ^a^M2.0497^ea^ ^a^P4.0310^ea^ kho hatthaaroho gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gatanti. catuttha.m.

[03] 357^b^.^eb^ atha kho assaaroho gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho assaaroho gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m assaarohaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so assaaroho sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti? ``ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii''ti. dutiyampi kho...pe0... tatiyampi kho assaaroho gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, pubbakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m assaarohaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `yo so assaaroho sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m ^a^T4.0383^ea^ pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti. idha bhagavaa kimaahaa''ti?

[03] ``addhaa kho tyaaha.m, gaama.ni, na labhaami -- `ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii'ti. api ca kho tyaaha.m byaakarissaami. yo so, gaama.ni, assaaroho sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati tassa ^a^P4.0311^ea^ ta.m citta.m pubbe gahita.m dukka.ta.m duppa.nihita.m -- `ime sattaa ha~n~nantu vaa bajjhantu vaa ucchijjantu vaa vinassantu vaa maa ahesu.m iti vaa'ti. tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajito naama nirayo tattha upapajjati. sace kho panassa eva.m di.t.thi hoti -- `yo so assaaroho sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'ti, saassa hoti micchaadi.t.thi. micchaadi.t.thikassa kho panaaha.m gaama.ni, purisapuggalassa dvinna.m gatiina.m a~n~natara.m gati.m vadaami -- niraya.m vaa tiracchaanayoni.m vaa''ti.

[01] eva.m ^a^V2.0299^ea^ ^a^M2.0498^ea^ vutte, assaaroho gaama.ni parodi, assuuni pavattesi. ``eta.m kho tyaaha.m, gaama.ni, naalattha.m -- `ala.m, gaama.ni, ti.t.thateta.m; maa ma.m eta.m pucchii'''ti. ``naaha.m, bhante, eta.m rodaami ya.m ma.m bhagavaa evamaaha. apicaaha.m, bhante, pubbakehi aacariyapaacariyehi assaarohehi diigharatta.m nikato va~ncito paluddho -- `yo ^a^T4.0384^ea^ so assaaroho sa"ngaame ussahati vaayamati, tamena.m ussahanta.m vaayamanta.m pare hananti pariyaapaadenti, so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa parajitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjatii'''ti. ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 358^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha ^a^P4.0312^ea^ kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``braahma.naa, bhante, pacchaa bhuumakaa kaama.n.dalukaa sevaalamaalikaa udakorohakaa aggiparicaarakaa. te mata.m kaala"nkata.m uyyaapenti naama sa~n~naapenti naama sagga.m naama okkaamenti. bhagavaa pana, bhante, araha.m sammaasambuddho pahoti tathaa kaatu.m yathaa sabbo loko kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaa''ti? ``tena hi, gaama.ni, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, idhassa puriso paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thiko. tamena.m mahaa janakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya -- `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatuu'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni ^a^T4.0385^ea^, api nu so puriso mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu ^a^V2.0300^ea^ vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalikaa anuparisakkanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, puriso mahati.m puthusila.m gambhiire udakarahade pakkhipeyya. tamena.m mahaa janakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya ^a^M2.0499^ea^ pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya -- `ummujja, bho puthusile, uplava, bho puthusile ^a^P4.0313^ea^, thalamuplava, bho puthusile'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu saa puthusilaa mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalikaa anuparisakkanahetu vaa ummujjeyya vaa uplaveyya vaa thala.m vaa uplaveyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, gaama.ni, yo so puriso paa.naatipaatii adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thiko. ki~ncaapi ta.m mahaa janakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya -- `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjatuu'''ti, atha kho so puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, idhassa {idha (ka0), idha cassa (?)} puriso paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato musaavaadaa pa.tivirato pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ^a^T4.0386^ea^ samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato anabhijjhaalu abyaapannacitto sammaadi.t.thiko. tamena.m mahaa janakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya -- `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatuu'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu so puriso mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalikaa anuparisakkanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, puriso sappikumbha.m vaa telakumbha.m vaa gambhiire udakarahade ogaahetvaa bhindeyya. tatra yaassa sakkharaa vaa ka.thalaa vaa saa adhogaamii {adhogaaminii (?)} assa; ya~nca khvassa tatra sappi vaa tela.m vaa ta.m uddha.m gaami ^a^P4.0314^ea^ assa. tamena.m mahaa janakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya -- `osiida, bho sappitela, sa.msiida ^a^V2.0301^ea^, bho sappitela, adho gaccha, bho sappitelaa'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api ^a^M2.0500^ea^ nu ta.m sappitela.m mahato janakaayassa aayaacanahetu vaa thomanahetu vaa pa~njalikaa anuparisakkanahetu vaa osiideyya vaa sa.msiideyya vaa adho vaa gaccheyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``evameva kho, gaama.ni, yo so puriso paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ^a^T4.0387^ea^, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato, anabhijjhaalu, abyaapannacitto, sammaadi.t.thiko, ki~ncaapi ta.m mahaa janakaayo sa"ngamma samaagamma aayaaceyya thomeyya pa~njaliko anuparisakkeyya -- `aya.m puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjatuu'ti, atha kho so puriso kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjeyyaa''ti. eva.m vutte, asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``nanu, bhante, bhagavaa sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharatii''ti? ``eva.m, gaama.ni, tathaagato sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharatii''ti. ``atha ki~ncarahi, bhante, bhagavaa ekaccaana.m sakkacca.m dhamma.m deseti, ekaccaana.m no tathaa sakkacca.m dhamma.m desetii''ti? ``tena ^a^P4.0315^ea^ hi, gaama.ni, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, idhassu {idha (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kassakassa gahapatino tii.ni khettaani -- eka.m khetta.m agga.m, eka.m khetta.m majjhima.m, eka.m khetta.m hiina.m ja"ngala.m uusara.m ^a^T4.0388^ea^ paapabhuumi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, asu kassako gahapati biijaani pati.t.thaapetukaamo kattha pa.thama.m pati.t.thaapeyya, ya.m vaa adu.m khetta.m agga.m ^a^V2.0302^ea^, ya.m vaa adu.m khetta.m majjhima.m, ya.m vaa adu.m khetta.m hiina.m ja"ngala.m uusara.m paapabhuumii''ti? ``asu, bhante, kassako gahapati biijaani pati.t.thaapetukaamo ya.m adu.m khetta.m agga.m tattha pati.t.thaapeyya ^a^M2.0501^ea^. tattha pati.t.thaapetvaa ya.m adu.m khetta.m majjhima.m tattha pati.t.thaapeyya. tattha pati.t.thaapetvaa ya.m adu.m khetta.m hiina.m ja"ngala.m uusara.m paapabhuumi tattha pati.t.thaapeyyapi, nopi pati.t.thaapeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? antamaso gobhattampi bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, ya.m adu.m khetta.m agga.m; evameva mayha.m bhikkhubhikkhuniyo. tesaaha.m dhamma.m desemi -- aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. ta.m kissa hetu? ete hi, gaama.ni, ma.mdiipaa ma.mle.naa ma.mtaa.naa ma.msara.naa viharanti. seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, ya.m adu.m khetta.m majjhima.m; evameva mayha.m upaasakaupaasikaayo. tesa.m paaha.m dhamma.m desemi -- aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m, saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. ta.m kissa hetu? ete hi, gaama.ni, ma.mdiipaa ma.mle.naa ma.mtaa.naa ma.msara.naa viharanti. seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, ya.m adu.m khetta.m hiina.m ja"ngala.m ^a^P4.0316^ea^ uusara.m paapabhuumi; evameva mayha.m a~n~natitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naparibbaajakaa ^a^T4.0389^ea^. tesa.m paaha.m dhamma.m desemi -- aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama eka.m padampi aajaaneyyu.m ta.m nesa.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, purisassa tayo udakama.nikaa -- eko udakama.niko acchiddo ahaarii aparihaarii, eko udakama.niko acchiddo haarii parihaarii, eko udakama.niko chiddo haarii parihaarii. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, asu puriso udaka.m nikkhipitukaamo kattha pa.thama.m nikkhipeyya, yo vaa so udakama.niko acchiddo ahaarii aparihaarii, yo vaa so udakama.niko acchiddo haarii parihaarii, yo vaa so udakama.niko chiddo haarii parihaarii''ti? ``asu, bhante, puriso udaka.m nikkhipitukaamo, yo so udakama.niko acchiddo ahaarii aparihaarii tattha nikkhipeyya, tattha nikkhipitvaa, yo so udakama.niko acchiddo haarii parihaarii tattha nikkhipeyya, tattha nikkhipitvaa, yo so udakama.niko chiddo haarii ^a^V2.0303^ea^ parihaarii tattha nikkhipeyyapi, nopi nikkhipeyya. ta.m kissa hetu? antamaso bha.n.dadhovanampi bhavissatii''ti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, yo so udakama.niko acchiddo ahaarii aparihaarii; evameva mayha.m bhikkhubhikkhuniyo. tesaaha.m dhamma.m desemi -- aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^M2.0502^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m ^a^T4.0390^ea^, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. ta.m kissa hetu? ete hi, gaama.ni, ma.mdiipaa ma.mle.naa ma.mtaa.naa ma.msara.naa viharanti. seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, yo so udakama.niko acchiddo haarii parihaarii; evameva mayha.m upaasakaupaasikaayo. tesaaha.m ^a^P4.0317^ea^ dhamma.m desemi -- aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. ta.m kissa hetu? ete hi, gaama.ni, ma.mdiipaa ma.mle.naa ma.mtaa.naa ma.msara.naa viharanti. seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, yo so udakama.niko chiddo haarii parihaarii; evameva mayha.m a~n~natitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naparibbaajakaa. tesaaha.m dhamma.m desemi -- aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. ta.m kissa hetu? appeva naama eka.m padampi aajaaneyyu.m, ta.m nesa.m assa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. eva.m vutte, asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni niga.n.thasaavako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho asibandhakaputta.m gaama.ni.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``katha.m nu kho, gaama.ni, niga.n.tho naa.taputto ^a^T4.0391^ea^ saavakaana.m dhamma.m desetii''ti? ``eva.m kho, bhante, niga.n.tho naa.taputto saavakaana.m dhamma.m deseti -- `yo koci paa.na.m atipaateti, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko, yo koci adinna.m aadiyati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko ^a^V2.0304^ea^, yo koci kaamesu micchaa carati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko, yo koci musaa bha.nati sabbo, so aapaayiko nerayiko. ya.mbahula.m ya.mbahula.m viharati, tena tena niiyatii'ti. eva.m kho, bhante, niga.n.tho naa.taputto saavakaana.m dhamma.m desetii''ti. ```ya.mbahula.m ya.mbahula~nca, gaama.ni, viharati, tena tena ^a^P4.0318^ea^ niiyati', eva.m sante na koci aapaayiko nerayiko bhavissati, yathaa niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa vacana.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^M2.0503^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, yo so puriso paa.naatipaatii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya, katamo bahutaro samayo, ya.m vaa so paa.namatipaateti, ya.m vaa so paa.na.m naatipaatetii''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso paa.naatipaatii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya, appataro so samayo ya.m so paa.namatipaateti, atha kho sveva bahutaro samayo ya.m so paa.na.m naatipaatetii''ti. ```ya.mbahula.m ya.mbahula~nca, gaama.ni, viharati tena tena niiyatii'ti, eva.m sante na koci aapaayiko nerayiko bhavissati, yathaa niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa vacana.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, yo so puriso adinnaadaayii rattiyaa ^a^T4.0392^ea^ vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya, katamo bahutaro samayo, ya.m vaa so adinna.m aadiyati, ya.m vaa so adinna.m naadiyatii''ti. ``yo so, bhante, puriso adinnaadaayii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya appataro so samayo, ya.m so adinna.m aadiyati, atha kho sveva bahutaro samayo, ya.m so adinna.m naadiyatii''ti. ```ya.mbahula.m ya.mbahula~nca, gaama.ni, viharati tena tena niiyatii'ti, eva.m sante na koci aapaayiko nerayiko bhavissati, yathaa niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa vacana.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, yo so puriso kaamesumicchaacaarii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya, katamo bahutaro samayo, ya.m vaa so kaamesu micchaa carati, ya.m vaa so kaamesu micchaa na caratii''ti? ``yo so, bhante, puriso kaamesumicchaacaarii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya, appataro so samayo ya.m so kaamesu micchaa carati, atha kho sveva bahutaro samayo, ya.m so kaamesu micchaa na caratii''ti. ```ya.mbahula.m ^a^V2.0305^ea^ ya.mbahula~nca, gaama.ni, viharati tena tena niiyatii'ti ^a^P4.0319^ea^, eva.m sante na koci aapaayiko nerayiko bhavissati, yathaa niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa vacana.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, yo so puriso musaavaadii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya, katamo bahutaro samayo, ya.m vaa so musaa bha.nati, ya.m vaa so musaa na bha.natii''ti? ``yo so, bhante ^a^T4.0393^ea^, puriso musaavaadii rattiyaa vaa divasassa vaa samayaasamaya.m upaadaaya ^a^M2.0504^ea^, appataro so samayo, ya.m so musaa bha.nati, atha kho sveva bahutaro samayo, ya.m so musaa na bha.natii''ti. ```ya.mbahula.m ya.mbahula~nca, gaama.ni, viharati tena tena niiyatii'ti, eva.m sante na koci aapaayiko nerayiko bhavissati, yathaa niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa vacana.m''.

[03] ``idha, gaama.ni, ekacco satthaa eva.mvaadii hoti eva.mdi.t.thi {eva.mdi.t.thii (ka0)} -- `yo koci paa.namatipaateti, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko, yo koci adinna.m aadiyati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko, yo koci kaamesu micchaa carati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko, yo koci musaa bha.nati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayiko'ti. tasmi.m kho pana, gaama.ni, satthari saavako abhippasanno hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `mayha.m kho satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- yo koci paa.namatipaateti, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayikoti. atthi kho pana mayaa paa.no atipaatito, ahampamhi aapaayiko nerayikoti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. ta.m, gaama.ni, vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. mayha.m kho satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- yo koci adinna.m aadiyati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayikoti. atthi kho pana mayaa adinna.m aadinna.m ahampamhi aapaayiko nerayikoti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. ta.m, gaama.ni, vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m ^a^T4.0394^ea^ appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. mayha.m kho satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- yo koci kaamesu micchaa carati, sabbo so ^a^P4.0320^ea^ aapaayiko nerayiko'ti. atthi kho pana mayaa kaamesu micchaa ci.n.na.m. `ahampamhi aapaayiko nerayiko'ti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. ta.m, gaama.ni, vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. mayha.m kho satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- yo koci musaa bha.nati, sabbo so aapaayiko nerayikoti. atthi kho pana mayaa musaa bha.nita.m. `ahampamhi ^a^V2.0306^ea^ aapaayiko nerayiko'ti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. ta.m, gaama.ni, vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0505^ea^ pana, gaama.ni, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so anekapariyaayena paa.naatipaata.m garahati vigarahati, `paa.naatipaataa viramathaa'ti caaha. adinnaadaana.m garahati vigarahati, `adinnaadaanaa viramathaa'ti caaha. kaamesumicchaacaara.m garahati, vigarahati `kaamesumicchaacaaraa viramathaa'ti caaha. musaavaada.m garahati vigarahati `musaavaadaa viramathaa'ti caaha. tasmi.m kho pana, gaama.ni, satthari saavako abhippasanno hoti. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `bhagavaa kho anekapariyaayena paa.naatipaata.m garahati ^a^T4.0395^ea^ vigarahati, paa.naatipaataa viramathaati caaha. atthi kho pana mayaa paa.no atipaatito yaavatako vaa taavatako vaa. yo kho pana mayaa paa.no atipaatito yaavatako vaa taavatako vaa, ta.m na su.t.thu, ta.m na saadhu. aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho pana tappaccayaa vippa.tisaarii assa.m. na meta.m paapa.m kamma.m {paapakamma.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} akata.m bhavissatii'ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya ta~nceva paa.naatipaata.m pajahati. aayati~nca paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ```bhagavaa kho anekapariyaayena adinnaadaana.m garahati vigarahati, adinnaadaanaa viramathaati caaha. atthi kho pana mayaa adinna.m aadinna.m yaavataka.m vaa taavataka.m vaa. ya.m kho pana mayaa adinna.m aadinna.m yaavataka.m vaa taavataka.m vaa ta.m na su.t.thu, ta.m na saadhu. aha~nceva kho pana tappaccayaa vippa.tisaarii assa.m, na meta.m paapa.m kamma.m akata.m bhavissatii'ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya ta~nceva adinnaadaana.m ^a^P4.0321^ea^ pajahati. aayati~nca adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ```bhagavaa kho pana anekapariyaayena kaamesumicchaacaara.m garahati vigarahati, kaamesumicchaacaaraa viramathaati caaha. atthi kho pana mayaa kaamesu micchaa ci.n.na.m yaavataka.m vaa taavataka.m vaa. ya.m kho pana ^a^T4.0396^ea^ mayaa kaamesu micchaa ci.n.na.m yaavataka.m vaa taavataka.m vaa ta.m ^a^V2.0307^ea^ na su.t.thu, ta.m na saadhu. aha~nceva kho pana tappaccayaa vippa.tisaarii assa.m, na ^a^M2.0506^ea^ meta.m paapa.m kamma.m akata.m bhavissatii'ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya ta~nceva kaamesumicchaacaara.m pajahati, aayati~nca kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ```bhagavaa kho pana anekapariyaayena musaavaada.m garahati vigarahati, musaavaadaa viramathaati caaha. atthi kho pana mayaa musaa bha.nita.m yaavataka.m vaa taavataka.m vaa. ya.m kho pana mayaa musaa bha.nita.m yaavataka.m vaa taavataka.m vaa ta.m na su.t.thu, ta.m na saadhu. aha~nceva kho pana tappaccayaa vippa.tisaarii assa.m, na meta.m paapa.m kamma.m akata.m bhavissatii'ti. so iti pa.tisa"nkhaaya ta~nceva musaavaada.m pajahati, aayati~nca musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapassa kammassa samatikkamo hoti.

[03] ``so paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti. adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti. musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti. pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti. pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti. samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti. abhijjha.m pahaaya ^a^T4.0397^ea^ anabhijjhaalu hoti. byaapaadappadosa.m ^a^P4.0322^ea^ pahaaya abyaapannacitto hoti. micchaadi.t.thi.m pahaaya sammaadi.t.thiko hoti.

[03] ``sa kho so, gaama.ni, ariyasaavako eva.m vigataabhijjho vigatabyaapaado asammuu.lho sampajaano pa.tissato mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, balavaa sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva catuddisaa vi~n~naapeyya; evameva kho, gaama.ni, eva.m bhaavitaaya mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa eva.m bahuliikataaya ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m, na ta.m tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thati.

[03] ``sa ^a^M2.0507^ea^ kho so, gaama.ni, ariyasaavako eva.m vigataabhijjho vigatabyaapaado asammuu.lho sampajaano ^a^V2.0308^ea^ pa.tissato karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0.... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. seyyathaapi, gaama.ni, balavaa sa"nkhadhamo appakasireneva catuddisaa vi~n~naapeyya; evameva kho, gaama.ni, eva.m bhaavitaaya upekkhaaya cetovimuttiyaa eva.m bahuliikataaya ya.m pamaa.nakata.m kamma.m ^a^T4.0398^ea^ na ta.m tatraavasissati, na ta.m tatraavati.t.thatii''ti. eva.m vutte, asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa kosalesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m yena naa.landaa tadavasari ^a^P4.0323^ea^. tatra suda.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane.

[03] tena kho pana samayena naa.landaa dubbhikkhaa hoti dviihitikaa seta.t.thikaa salaakaavuttaa. tena kho pana samayena niga.n.tho naa.taputto naa.landaaya.m pa.tivasati mahatiyaa niga.n.thaparisaaya saddhi.m. atha kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni niga.n.thasaavako yena niga.n.tho naa.taputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho asibandhakaputta.m gaama.ni.m niga.n.tho naa.taputto etadavoca -- ``ehi tva.m, gaama.ni, sama.nassa gotamassa vaada.m aaropehi. eva.m te kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchissati -- `asibandhakaputtena gaama.ninaa sama.nassa gotamassa eva.mmahiddhikassa eva.mmahaanubhaavassa vaado aaropito'''ti.

[03] ``katha.m panaaha.m, bhante, sama.nassa gotamassa eva.mmahiddhikassa eva.mmahaanubhaavassa vaada.m aaropessaamii''ti ^a^V2.0309^ea^? ``ehi tva.m, gaama.ni, yena sama.no gotamo tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa sama.na.m gotama.m eva.m ^a^M2.0508^ea^ vadehi -- `nanu, bhante, bhagavaa anekapariyaayena kulaana.m ^a^T4.0399^ea^ anuddaya.m {anudaya.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} va.n.neti, anurakkha.m va.n.neti, anukampa.m va.n.netii'ti? sace kho, gaama.ni, sama.no gotamo eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaroti -- `eva.m, gaama.ni, tathaagato anekapariyaayena kulaana.m anuddaya.m va.n.neti, anurakkha.m va.n.neti, anukampa.m va.n.netii'ti, tamena.m tva.m eva.m vadeyyaasi -- `atha ki~ncarahi, bhante, bhagavaa dubbhikkhe dviihitike seta.t.thike salaakaavutte mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m caarika.m carati? ucchedaaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno, anayaaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno, upaghaataaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno'ti! ima.m kho te, gaama.ni, sama.no gotamo ubhatoko.tika.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho neva sakkhati {sakkhiti (sii0) ma0 ni0 2.83} uggilitu.m, neva sakkhati ogilitu''nti. ``eva.m ^a^P4.0324^ea^, bhante''ti kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa pa.tissutvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa niga.n.tha.m naa.taputta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``nanu, bhante, bhagavaa anekapariyaayena kulaana.m anuddaya.m va.n.neti, anurakkha.m va.n.neti, anukampa.m va.n.netii''ti? ``eva.m, gaama.ni, tathaagato anekapariyaayena kulaana.m anuddaya.m va.n.neti, anurakkha.m va.n.neti, anukampa.m va.n.netii''ti. ``atha ki~ncarahi, bhante, bhagavaa dubbhikkhe dviihitike seta.t.thike salaakaavutte mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m caarika.m ^a^T4.0400^ea^ carati? ucchedaaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno, anayaaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno, upaghaataaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno''ti. ``ito so, gaama.ni, ekanavutikappe {ekanavuto kappo (syaa0 ka.m0), ekanavutikappo (pii0)} yamaha.m anussaraami, naabhijaanaami ki~nci kula.m pakkabhikkhaanuppadaanamattena upahatapubba.m. atha kho yaani taani kulaani a.d.dhaani mahaddhanaani mahaabhogaani pahuutajaataruuparajataani pahuutavittuupakara.naani pahuutadhanadha~n~naani, sabbaani taani daanasambhuutaani ceva saccasambhuutaani ca saama~n~nasambhuutaani ca. a.t.tha kho, gaama.ni, hetuu, a.t.tha paccayaa kulaana.m upaghaataaya. raajato vaa kulaani upaghaata.m gacchanti, corato vaa kulaani upaghaata.m gacchanti, aggito vaa kulaani upaghaata.m gacchanti ^a^M2.0509^ea^, udakato vaa kulaani upaghaata.m gacchanti, nihita.m vaa .thaanaa vigacchati {nihita.m vaa naadhigacchanti (sii0 pii0)}, duppayuttaa vaa kammantaa vipajjanti, kule vaa kula"ngaaroti {kulaana.m vaa kula"ngaaro (sii0)} uppajjati, yo te bhoge vikirati ^a^P4.0325^ea^ vidhamati viddha.mseti, aniccataaye a.t.thamiiti. ime kho, gaama.ni, a.t.tha hetuu, a.t.tha paccayaa kulaana.m upaghaataaya ^a^V2.0310^ea^. imesu kho, gaama.ni, a.t.thasu hetuusu, a.t.thasu paccayesu sa.mvijjamaanesu yo ma.m eva.m vadeyya -- `ucchedaaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno, anayaaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno, upaghaataaya bhagavaa kulaana.m pa.tipanno'ti, ta.m, gaama.ni, vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye''ti. eva.m ^a^T4.0401^ea^ vutte, asibandhakaputto gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. navama.m.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena raajantepure raajaparisaaya sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- ``kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m, saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata''nti!

[03] tena kho pana samayena ma.nicuu.lako gaama.ni tassa.m parisaaya.m nisinno hoti. atha kho ma.nicuu.lako gaama.ni ta.m parisa.m etadavoca -- ``maa ayyo {ayyaa (sii0 pii0)} eva.m avacuttha. na kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m, na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, nappa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataa''ti. asakkhi kho ma.nicuu.lako gaama.ni ta.m parisa.m sa~n~naapetu.m. atha kho ma.nicuu.lako gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m ^a^P4.0326^ea^ nisinno kho ma.nicuu.lako gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idha, bhante, raajantepure raajaparisaaya sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m, saadiyanti sama.naa ^a^T4.0402^ea^ sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, pa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata'nti. eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhante, ta.m parisa.m etadavoca.m -- `maa ayyo eva.m avacuttha. na kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m ^a^V2.0311^ea^ jaataruuparajata.m, na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, nappa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa ^a^M2.0510^ea^ jaataruuparajata.m, nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataa'ti. asakkhi.m khvaaha.m, bhante, ta.m parisa.m sa~n~naapetu.m. kaccaaha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhaami, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti?

[03] ``taggha tva.m, gaama.ni, eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva me hosi, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhasi, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchati. na hi, gaama.ni, kappati sama.naana.m sakyaputtiyaana.m jaataruuparajata.m, na saadiyanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, nappa.tigga.nhanti sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jaataruuparajata.m, nikkhittama.nisuva.n.naa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa apetajaataruuparajataa. yassa kho, gaama.ni, jaataruuparajata.m kappati, pa~ncapi tassa kaamagu.naa kappanti. yassa pa~nca kaamagu.naa kappanti ( ) {(tassapi jaataruuparajata.m kappati,) (syaa0 ka.m0)}, eka.mseneta.m ^a^T4.0403^ea^, gaama.ni, dhaareyyaasi assama.nadhammo asakyaputtiyadhammoti. api caaha.m, gaama.ni, eva.m vadaami -- ti.na.m ti.natthikena pariyesitabba.m, daaru daarutthikena pariyesitabba.m, saka.ta.m saka.tatthikena pariyesitabba.m, puriso purisatthikena ^a^P4.0327^ea^ pariyesitabbo {pariyesitabbo''ti (?)}. natvevaaha.m, gaama.ni, kenaci pariyaayena `jaataruuparajata.m saaditabba.m pariyesitabba'nti vadaamii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa mallesu viharati uruvelakappa.m naama mallaana.m nigamo. atha kho bhadrako gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho bhadrako gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa dukkhassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca desetuu''ti. ``aha~nce {aha~nca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} te, gaama.ni, atiitamaddhaana.m aarabbha ^a^M2.0511^ea^ dukkhassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca deseyya.m -- `eva.m ahosi atiitamaddhaana'nti, tatra te siyaa ka"nkhaa, siyaa vimati. aha.m ce {aha~nca (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} te, gaama.ni, anaagatamaddhaana.m aarabbha dukkhassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca deseyya.m -- `eva.m bhavissati anaagatamaddhaana'nti, tatraapi te siyaa ka"nkhaa, siyaa vimati. api caaha.m, gaama.ni, idheva nisinno ^a^V2.0312^ea^ ettheva te nisinnassa dukkhassa samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca desessaami. ta.m su.naahi ^a^T4.0404^ea^, saadhuka.m manasi karohi; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho bhadrako gaama.ni bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, atthi te uruvelakappe manussaa yesa.m te vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``atthi me, bhante, uruvelakappe manussaa yesa.m me vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti. ``atthi pana te, gaama.ni, uruvelakappe manussaa yesa.m te ^a^P4.0328^ea^ vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa nuppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``atthi me, bhante, uruvelakappe manussaa yesa.m me vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa nuppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti. ``ko nu kho, gaama.ni, hetu, ko paccayo yena te ekaccaana.m uruvelakappiyaana.m manussaana.m vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``yesa.m me, bhante, uruvelakappiyaana.m manussaana.m vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa, atthi me tesu chandaraago ^a^T4.0405^ea^. yesa.m pana, bhante, uruvelakappiyaana.m manussaana.m vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa nuppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa, natthi me tesu chandaraago''ti. ``iminaa tva.m, gaama.ni, dhammena di.t.thena viditena akaalikena pattena pariyogaa.lhena atiitaanaagate naya.m nehi -- `ya.m kho ki~nci atiitamaddhaana.m dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajji {uppajjati (sabbattha)} sabba.m ta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m. chando hi muula.m dukkhassa. yampi hi ki~nci anaagatamaddhaana.m dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjissati, sabba.m ta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m. chando hi muula.m dukkhassaa'''ti ^a^M2.0512^ea^. ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m {subhaasitamida.m (sii0 pii0)}, bhante, bhagavataa {ya"nki~nci atiitamaddhaana.m dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjati, sabbanta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m, chando hi muula.m dukkhassaati, ya"nki~nci anaagatamaddhaana.m dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjissati sabbanta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m, chando hi muula.m dukkhassaa''ti (syaa0 ka.m0)} -- `ya.m ki~nci dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m ^a^P4.0329^ea^ uppajjati, sabba.m ta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m. chando hi muula.m dukkhassaa'ti. {``ya"nki~nci atiitamaddhaana.m dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjati, sabbanta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m, chando hi muula.m duukkhassaati, ya"nki~nci anaagatamaddhaana.m dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjissati, sabbanta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m, chando hi muula.m dukkhassaa''ti (syaa0 ka.m)} atthi me, bhante, ciravaasii naama kumaaro bahi aavasathe {aavesane (?)} pa.tivasati. so khvaaha.m, bhante, kaalasseva vu.t.thaaya purisa.m uyyojemi {uyyojesi.m (ka0)} -- `gaccha, bha.ne, ciravaasi.m kumaara.m jaanaahii'ti. yaavakiiva~nca, bhante, so puriso naagacchati, tassa me hoteva a~n~nathatta.m -- `maa heva ciravaasissa kumaarassa ki~nci aabaadhayitthaa'''ti {aabaadhayethaati (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)}.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0313^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, ciravaasissa kumaarassa vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti ^a^T4.0406^ea^? ``ciravaasissa me, bhante, kumaarassa vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa jiivitassapi siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, ki.m pana me nuppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti. ``iminaapi kho eta.m, gaama.ni, pariyaayena veditabba.m -- `ya.m ki~nci dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjati, sabba.m ta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m. chando hi muula.m dukkhassaa'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, yadaa te ciravaasimaataa {ciravaasissa maataa (sii0 pii0)} adi.t.thaa ahosi, assutaa ahosi, te ciravaasimaatuyaa chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``dassana.m vaa te, gaama.ni, aagamma savana.m vaa eva.m te ahosi -- `ciravaasimaatuyaa chando vaa raago vaa pema.m vaa'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, ciravaasimaatuyaa te vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa uppajjeyyu.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti? ``ciravaasimaatuyaa ^a^P4.0330^ea^ me, bhante, vadhena vaa bandhena vaa jaaniyaa vaa garahaaya vaa jiivitassapi siyaa a~n~nathatta.m, ki.m pana me nuppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa''ti! ``iminaapi kho eta.m, gaama.ni, pariyaayena veditabba.m -- `ya.m ki~nci dukkha.m uppajjamaana.m uppajjati, sabba.m ta.m chandamuulaka.m chandanidaana.m. chando hi muula.m dukkhassaa'''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T4.0407^ea^ ^a^M2.0513^ea^ kho raasiyo gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raasiyo gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante, `sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhajiivi.m eka.msena upavadati upakkosatii'ti {upakkosati upavadatiiti (dii0 ni0 1.381)}. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhajiivi.m eka.msena upavadati upakkosatii'ti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato vuttavaadino, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti? ``ye ^a^V2.0314^ea^ te, gaama.ni, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo sabba.m tapa.m garahati, sabba.m tapassi.m luukhajiivi.m eka.msena upavadati upakkosatii'ti, na me te vuttavaadino, abbhaacikkhanti ca pana ma.m te asataa tucchaa abhuutena''.

[03] ``dveme, gaama.ni, antaa pabbajitena na sevitabbaa -- yo caaya.m kaamesu kaamasukhallikaanuyogo hiino gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasa.mhito, yo caaya.m attakilamathaanuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasa.mhito. ete te, gaama.ni, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa ^a^P4.0331^ea^ -- cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. katamaa ca saa, gaama.ni, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa -- cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m kho saa, gaama.ni, majjhimaa pa.tipadaa ^a^T4.0408^ea^ tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa -- cakkhukara.nii ~naa.nakara.nii upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
