[03] ``tayo kho me, gaama.ni, kaamabhogino santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii adhammena bhoge pariyesati, saahasena adhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasena na attaana.m sukheti na pii.neti na sa.mvibhajati na pu~n~naani karoti. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasena. adhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati na pu~n~naani karoti. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii adhammena bhoge pariyesati ^a^M2.0514^ea^ saahasena. adhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti.

[03] ``idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenapi asaahasenapi. dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasenapi asaahasenapi na ^a^P4.0332^ea^ attaana.m sukheti, na pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenapi asaahasenapi. dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasenapi asaahasenapi attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesati, saahasenapi asaahasenapi ^a^V2.0315^ea^. dhammaadhammena bhoge ^a^T4.0409^ea^ pariyesitvaa saahasenapi asaahasenapi attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti.

[03] ``idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena. dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena na attaana.m sukheti, na pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena. dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena. dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti. te ca bhoge gadhito {gathito (sii0)} mucchito ajjhopanno anaadiinavadassaavii anissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena. dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena ^a^P4.0333^ea^ attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti. te ca bhoge agadhito amucchito anajjhopanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati.

[03] ``tatra ^a^M2.0515^ea^, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasena, adhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasena na attaana.m sukheti, na pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho. katamehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho? adhammena ^a^T4.0410^ea^ bhoge pariyesati saahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. na attaana.m sukheti na pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena gaarayho. na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasena, adhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho, ekena .thaanena paasa.mso. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho? adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena gaarayho. katamena ekena .thaanena ^a^V2.0316^ea^ paasa.mso? attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho, iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasena, adhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasena ^a^P4.0334^ea^ attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii ekena .thaanena gaarayho, dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso. katamena ekena .thaanena gaarayho? adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenaati, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso? attaana.m ^a^T4.0411^ea^ sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho, imehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenapi asaahasenapi, dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasenapi asaahasenapi na attaana.m sukheti, na pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na ^a^M2.0516^ea^ pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii ekena .thaanena paasa.mso, tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho. katamena ekena .thaanena paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso. katamehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho? adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. na attaana.m sukheti, na pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena gaarayho. na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso, imehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenapi asaahasenapi, dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasenapi asaahasenapi attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, dviihi ^a^T4.0412^ea^ .thaanehi gaarayho. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso ^a^P4.0335^ea^. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho? adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena ^a^V2.0317^ea^ gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, imehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenapi asaahasenapi, dhammaadhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa saahasenapi asaahasenapi attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii tiihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, ekena .thaanena gaarayho. katamehi tiihi .thaanehi paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. katamena ekena .thaanena gaarayho? adhammena bhoge pariyesati saahasenaati ^a^M2.0517^ea^, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi tiihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena ^a^T4.0413^ea^, dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena, na attaana.m sukheti, na pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii ekena .thaanena paasa.mso, dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho. katamena ekena .thaanena paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho? na attaana.m sukheti, na pii.netiiti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso, imehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra ^a^P4.0336^ea^, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena, dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti, na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karoti. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, ekena .thaanena gaarayho. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. katamena ekena .thaanena gaarayho ^a^V2.0318^ea^? na sa.mvibhajati, na pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena ^a^T4.0414^ea^, dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti, te ca bhoge gadhito mucchito ajjhopanno anaadiinavadassaavii anissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii tiihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, ekena .thaanena gaarayho. katamehi tiihi .thaanehi paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena paasa.mso ^a^M2.0518^ea^. katamena ekena .thaanena gaarayho? te ca bhoge gadhito mucchito ajjhopanno anaadiinavadassaavii anissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njatiiti, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi tiihi .thaanehi paasa.mso, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m kaamabhogii dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasena, dhammena bhoge pariyesitvaa asaahasena attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karoti. te ^a^P4.0337^ea^ ca bhoge agadhito amucchito anajjhopanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii catuuhi .thaanehi paasa.mso. katamehi catuuhi .thaanehi paasa.mso? dhammena bhoge pariyesati asaahasenaati, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. attaana.m sukheti pii.netiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso. sa.mvibhajati pu~n~naani karotiiti, iminaa tatiyena ^a^T4.0415^ea^ .thaanena paasa.mso. te ca bhoge agadhito amucchito anajjhopanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njatiiti, iminaa catutthena .thaanena paasa.mso. aya.m, gaama.ni, kaamabhogii imehi catuuhi .thaanehi paasa.mso.

[03] ``tayome, gaama.ni, tapassino luukhajiivino santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame tayo? idha, gaama.ni, ekacco tapassii luukhajiivii saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `appeva naama kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya.m, appeva naama uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m ^a^V2.0319^ea^ sacchikareyya'nti. so attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, kusala~nca dhamma.m naadhigacchati, uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m na sacchikaroti.

[03] ``idha pana, gaama.ni, ekacco tapassii luukhajiivii saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `appeva naama kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya.m, appeva naama uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikareyya'nti. so attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, kusala~nhi kho dhamma.m adhigacchati, uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m na sacchikaroti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M2.0519^ea^ ^a^P4.0338^ea^ pana, gaama.ni, ekacco tapassii luukhajiivii saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `appeva naama kusala.m dhamma.m adhigaccheyya.m, appeva naama uttarimanussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikareyya'nti. so attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti ^a^T4.0416^ea^, kusala~nca dhamma.m adhigacchati, uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaroti.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m tapassii luukhajiivii attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, kusala~nca dhamma.m naadhigacchati, uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m na sacchikaroti. aya.m, gaama.ni, tapassii luukhajiivii tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho. katamehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho? attaana.m aataapeti paritaapetiiti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. kusala~nca dhamma.m naadhigacchatiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena gaarayho. uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m na sacchikarotiiti, iminaa tatiyena .thaanena gaarayho. aya.m, gaama.ni, tapassii luukhajiivii, imehi tiihi .thaanehi gaarayho.

[03] ``tatra, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m tapassii luukhajiivii attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, kusala~nhi kho dhamma.m adhigacchati, uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m na sacchikaroti. aya.m, gaama.ni, tapassii luukhajiivii dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho, ekena .thaanena paasa.mso. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho? attaana.m aataapeti paritaapetiiti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena gaarayho. uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m na sacchikarotiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena gaarayho. katamena ekena .thaanena paasa.mso? kusala~nhi kho dhamma.m adhigacchatiiti, iminaa ^a^V2.0320^ea^ ekena .thaanena paasa.mso. aya.m, gaama.ni, tapassii luukhajiivii imehi ^a^T4.0417^ea^ dviihi .thaanehi gaarayho, iminaa ekena .thaanena paasa.mso.

[03] ``tatra ^a^P4.0339^ea^, gaama.ni, yvaaya.m tapassii luukhajiivii attaana.m aataapeti paritaapeti, kusala~nca dhamma.m adhigacchati, uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikaroti. aya.m, gaama.ni, tapassii luukhajiivii ekena .thaanena gaarayho, dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso. katamena ekena .thaanena gaarayho? attaana.m aataapeti paritaapetiiti, iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho. katamehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso? kusala~nca dhamma.m adhigacchatiiti, iminaa pa.thamena .thaanena paasa.mso. uttari ca manussadhammaa alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m sacchikarotiiti, iminaa dutiyena .thaanena paasa.mso ^a^M2.0520^ea^. aya.m, gaama.ni, tapassii luukhajiivii iminaa ekena .thaanena gaarayho, imehi dviihi .thaanehi paasa.mso.

[03] ``tisso imaa, gaama.ni, sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhi. katamaa tisso? ya.m ratto raagaadhikara.na.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti. raage pahiine nevattabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti. sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhi. ya.m du.t.tho dosaadhikara.na.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ^a^T4.0418^ea^ ceteti. dose pahiine nevattabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti. sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa ^a^P4.0340^ea^ akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhi. ya.m muu.lho mohaadhikara.na.m attabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, parabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti, ubhayabyaabaadhaayapi ceteti. mohe pahiine nevattabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti, na ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti. sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhi. imaa kho, gaama.ni, tisso sandi.t.thikaa nijjaraa akaalikaa ehipassikaa opaneyyikaa paccatta.m veditabbaa vi~n~nuuhii''ti.
[03] eva.m vutte, raasiyo gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. dvaadasama.m.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^V2.0321^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa koliyesu viharati uttara.m naama {uttaraka.m naama (sii0)} koliyaana.m nigamo. atha kho paa.taliyo gaama.ni yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho paa.taliyo gaama.ni bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``suta.m meta.m, bhante -- `sama.no gotamo maaya.m jaanaatii'ti. ye te, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo maaya.m jaanaatii'ti, kacci te, bhante, bhagavato ^a^M2.0521^ea^ vuttavaadino, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m ^a^T4.0419^ea^ .thaana.m aagacchati? anabbhaacikkhitukaamaa hi maya.m, bhante, bhagavanta''nti. ``ye te, gaama.ni, evamaaha.msu -- `sama.no gotamo maaya.m jaanaatii'ti, vuttavaadino ceva me, te na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaronti, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatiiti, sacca.myeva ^a^P4.0341^ea^ kira, bho, maya.m tesa.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m na saddahaama -- `sama.no gotamo maaya.m jaanaatiiti, sama.no khalu bho gotamo maayaavii'ti. yo nu kho, gaama.ni, eva.m vadeti -- `aha.m maaya.m jaanaamii'ti, so eva.m vadeti -- `aha.m maayaavii'ti. tatheva ta.m bhagavaa hoti, tatheva ta.m sugata hotii''ti. tena hi, gaama.ni, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami; yathaa te khameyya, tathaa ta.m byaakareyyaasi --

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, jaanaasi tva.m koliyaana.m lambacuu.lake bha.te''ti? ``jaanaamaha.m, bhante, koliyaana.m lambacuu.lake bha.te''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, kimatthiyaa koliyaana.m lambacuu.lakaa bha.taa''ti? ``ye ca, bhante, koliyaana.m coraa te ca pa.tisedhetu.m, yaani ca koliyaana.m duuteyyaani taani ca vahaatu.m {taani ca pahaatu.m (syaa0 ka.m0), taani ca yaatu.m (katthaci), taani caavahaatu.m (?)}, etadatthiyaa, bhante, koliyaana.m lambacuu.lakaa bha.taa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, jaanaasi tva.m koliyaana.m lambacuu.lake bha.te siilavante vaa te dussiile vaa''ti? ``jaanaamaha.m, bhante, koliyaana.m lambacuu.lake bha.te dussiile paapadhamme ^a^T4.0420^ea^; ye ca loke dussiilaa paapadhammaa koliyaana.m lambacuu.lakaa bha.taa tesa.m a~n~nataraa''ti. ``yo nu kho, gaama.ni, eva.m vadeyya -- `paa.taliyo gaama.ni jaanaati koliyaana.m lambacuu.lake bha.te dussiile paapadhamme, paa.taliyopi gaama.ni dussiilo paapadhammo'ti, sammaa nu kho so vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante! a~n~ne, bhante, koliyaana.m lambacuu.lakaa bha.taa, a~n~nohamasmi. a~n~nathaadhammaa koliyaana.m lambacuu.lakaa bha.taa, a~n~nathaadhammohamasmii''ti. ``tva~nhi ^a^V2.0322^ea^ ^a^P4.0342^ea^ naama, gaama.ni, lacchasi -- `paa.taliyo gaama.ni jaanaati koliyaana.m lambacuu.lake bha.te dussiile paapadhamme, na ca paa.taliyo gaama.ni dussiilo paapadhammo'ti, kasmaa tathaagato na lacchati -- `tathaagato maaya.m jaanaati, na ca tathaagato maayaavii'ti? maaya.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, maayaaya ^a^M2.0522^ea^ ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca maayaavii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami''.

[03] ``paa.naatipaata.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, paa.naatipaatassa ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca paa.naatipaatii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. adinnaadaana.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, adinnaadaanassa ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca adinnaadaayii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. kaamesumicchaacaara.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, kaamesumicchaacaarassa ^a^T4.0421^ea^ ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca kaamesumicchaacaarii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. musaavaada.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, musaavaadassa ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca musaavaadii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. pisu.navaaca.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, pisu.navaacaaya ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca pisu.navaaco kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. pharusavaaca.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, pharusavaacaaya ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca pharusavaaco kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. samphappalaapa.m ^a^P4.0343^ea^ caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, samphappalaapassa ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca samphappalaapii kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. abhijjha.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, abhijjhaaya ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca abhijjhaalu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. byaapaadapadosa.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, byaapaadapadosassa ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ca byaapannacitto kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami. micchaadi.t.thi.m caaha.m, gaama.ni, pajaanaami, micchaadi.t.thiyaa ca vipaaka.m, yathaapa.tipanno ^a^T4.0422^ea^ ca micchaadi.t.thiko kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati ta~nca pajaanaami.

[03] ``santi ^a^V2.0323^ea^ hi, gaama.ni, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yo koci paa.namatipaateti, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. yo koci adinna.m aadiyati, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme ^a^M2.0523^ea^ dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. yo koci kaamesu micchaa carati, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayati. yo koci musaa bha.nati, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii'''ti.

[03] ``dissati kho pana, gaama.ni, idhekacco maalii ku.n.dalii sunhaato {sunahaato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaarento. tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi maalii ku.n.dalii sunhaato suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'ti? tamena.m ^a^P4.0344^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ra~n~no paccatthika.m pasayha jiivitaa voropesi. tassa raajaa attamano abhihaaramadaasi. tenaaya.m puriso maalii ku.n.dalii sunhaato suvilitto kappitakesamassu, itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'''ti.

[03] ``dissati kho, gaama.ni, idhekacco da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathiyaaya rathiya.m {rathikaaya rathika.m (sii0)} si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa, dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa, dakkhi.nato ^a^T4.0423^ea^ nagarassa siisa.m chijjamaano. tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi, da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindatii'ti {chijjatiiti (katthaci)}? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso raajaverii itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa jiivitaa voropesi, tena na.m raajaano gahetvaa evaruupa.m kammakaara.na.m kaarentii'''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu te evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti. ``tatra, gaama.ni, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yo koci paa.namatipaateti, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii'ti, sacca.m vaa te aaha.msu musaa vaa''ti? ``musaa, bhante''. ``ye pana te tuccha.m musaa vilapanti, siilavanto vaa te dussiilaa vaa''ti? ``dussiilaa ^a^P4.0345^ea^, bhante''. ``ye pana te dussiilaa ^a^M2.0524^ea^ paapadhammaa micchaapa.tipannaa vaa te sammaapa.tipannaa vaa''ti? ``micchaapa.tipannaa, bhante'' ^a^V2.0324^ea^. ``ye pana te micchaapa.tipannaa micchaadi.t.thikaa vaa te sammaadi.t.thikaa vaa''ti? ``micchaadi.t.thikaa, bhante''. ``ye pana te micchaadi.t.thikaa kalla.m nu tesu pasiiditu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``dissati kho pana, gaama.ni, idhekacco maalii ku.n.dalii...pe0... itthikaamehi ^a^T4.0424^ea^ raajaa ma~n~ne paricaarento. tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi maalii ku.n.dalii...pe0... itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'ti? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ra~n~no paccatthikassa pasayha ratana.m ahaasi {pasayha adinna.m ratana.m aadiyi (ka0)}. tassa raajaa attamano abhihaaramadaasi. tenaaya.m puriso maalii ku.n.dalii...pe0... itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'''ti.

[03] ``dissati kho, gaama.ni, idhekacco da.lhaaya rajjuyaa...pe0... dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chijjamaano tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi da.lhaaya rajjuyaa...pe0... dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindatii'ti? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso gaamaa vaa ara~n~naa vaa adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi. tena na.m raajaano gahetvaa evaruupa.m kammakaara.na.m kaarentii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu te evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti. ``tatra ^a^P4.0346^ea^, gaama.ni, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yo koci adinna.m aadiyati, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii'ti, sacca.m vaa te aaha.msu musaa vaati...pe0... kalla.m nu tesu pasiiditu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``dissati kho pana, gaama.ni, idhekacco maalii ku.n.dalii...pe0... itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaarento. tamena.m evamaaha.msu ^a^T4.0425^ea^ -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi maalii ku.n.dalii...pe0... itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'ti? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ra~n~no paccatthikassa daaresu caaritta.m aapajji. tassa raajaa attamano abhihaaramadaasi. tenaaya.m puriso maalii ku.n.dalii...pe0... itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'''ti.

[03] ``dissati ^a^V2.0325^ea^ ^a^M2.0525^ea^ kho, gaama.ni, idhekacco da.lhaaya rajjuyaa...pe0... dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chijjamaano. tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi da.lhaaya rajjuyaa...pe0... dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindatii'ti? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso kulitthiisu kulakumaariisu caaritta.m aapajji, tena na.m raajaano gahetvaa evaruupa.m kammakaara.na.m kaarentii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu te evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti. ``tatra, gaama.ni, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yo koci kaamesu micchaa carati, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii'ti, sacca.m vaa te aaha.msu musaa vaati...pe0... kalla.m nu tesu pasiiditu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``dissati ^a^P4.0347^ea^ kho pana, gaama.ni, idhekacco maalii ku.n.dalii sunhaato suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaarento. tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi ^a^T4.0426^ea^ maalii ku.n.dalii sunhaato suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'ti? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso raajaana.m musaavaadena haasesi. tassa raajaa attamano abhihaaramadaasi. tenaaya.m puriso maalii ku.n.dalii sunhaato suvilitto kappitakesamassu itthikaamehi raajaa ma~n~ne paricaaretii'''ti.

[03] ``dissati kho, gaama.ni, idhekacco da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chijjamaano. tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso ki.m akaasi da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathiyaaya rathiya.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa, dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa, dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindatii'ti? tamena.m evamaaha.msu -- `ambho! aya.m puriso gahapatissa vaa gahapatiputtassa vaa musaavaadena attha.m bha~nji, tena na.m raajaano gahetvaa evaruupa.m kammakaara.na.m kaarentii'ti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, gaama.ni, api nu te evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m vaa suta.m vaa''ti? ``di.t.tha~nca no ^a^M2.0526^ea^, bhante, suta~nca suyyissati caa''ti. ``tatra, gaama.ni, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `yo koci musaa bha.nati, sabbo so di.t.theva dhamme ^a^P4.0348^ea^ dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedayatii'ti, sacca.m vaa te aaha.msu musaa ^a^T4.0427^ea^ vaa''ti ^a^V2.0326^ea^? ``musaa, bhante''. ``ye pana te tuccha.m musaa vilapanti siilavanto vaa te dussiilaa vaa''ti? ``dussiilaa, bhante''. ``ye pana te dussiilaa paapadhammaa micchaapa.tipannaa vaa te sammaapa.tipannaa vaa''ti? ``micchaapa.tipannaa, bhante''. ``ye pana te micchaapa.tipannaa micchaadi.t.thikaa vaa te sammaadi.t.thikaa vaa''ti? ``micchaadi.t.thikaa, bhante''. ``ye pana te micchaadi.t.thikaa kalla.m nu tesu pasiiditu''nti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! atthi me, bhante, aavasathaagaara.m. tattha atthi ma~ncakaani, atthi aasanaani, atthi udakama.niko, atthi telappadiipo. tattha yo sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa vaasa.m upeti, tenaaha.m yathaasatti yathaabala.m sa.mvibhajaami. bhuutapubba.m, bhante, cattaaro satthaaro naanaadi.t.thikaa naanaakhantikaa naanaarucikaa, tasmi.m aavasathaagaare vaasa.m upagacchu.m''.

[03] ``eko satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako. natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'''ti.

[03] ``eko satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `atthi dinna.m, atthi yi.t.tha.m ^a^P4.0349^ea^, atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, atthi ^a^T4.0428^ea^ aya.m loko, atthi paro loko, atthi maataa, atthi pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa, ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'''ti.

[03] ``eko satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `karoto kaarayato, chindato chedaapayato, pacato paacaapayato, socayato socaapayato, kilamato kilamaapayato, phandato phandaapayato, paa.namatipaatayato, adinna.m aadiyato, sandhi.m chindato, nillopa.m harato, ekaagaarika.m ^a^M2.0527^ea^ karoto, paripanthe ti.t.thato, paradaara.m gacchato, musaa bha.nato, karoto na kariiyati paapa.m. khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissaa pathaviyaa paa.ne eka.m ma.msakhala.m eka.m ma.msapu~nja.m kareyya, natthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, natthi paapassa aagamo. dakkhi.na.m cepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya hananto ghaatento ^a^V2.0327^ea^ chindanto chedaapento pacanto paacaapento, natthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, natthi paapassa aagamo. uttara.m cepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya dadanto daapento yajanto yajaapento, natthi tatonidaana.m pu~n~na.m, natthi pu~n~nassa aagamo. daanena damena sa.myamena saccavajjena natthi pu~n~na.m, natthi pu~n~nassa aagamo'''ti.

[03] ``eko satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `karoto kaarayato, chindato chedaapayato, pacato paacaapayato, socayato socaapayato, kilamato kilamaapayato, phandato phandaapayato, paa.namatipaatayato, adinna.m aadiyato, sandhi.m ^a^T4.0429^ea^ chindato, nillopa.m harato, ekaagaarika.m karoto, paripanthe ti.t.thato, paradaara.m gacchato ^a^P4.0350^ea^, musaa bha.nato, karoto kariiyati paapa.m. khurapariyantena cepi cakkena yo imissaa pathaviyaa paa.ne eka.m ma.msakhala.m eka.m ma.msapu~nja.m kareyya, atthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, atthi paapassa aagamo. dakkhi.na.m cepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya hananto ghaatento chindanto chedaapento pacanto paacaapento, atthi tatonidaana.m paapa.m, atthi paapassa aagamo. uttara.m cepi ga"ngaaya tiira.m gaccheyya dadanto daapento, yajanto yajaapento, atthi tatonidaana.m pu~n~na.m, atthi pu~n~nassa aagamo. daanena damena sa.myamena saccavajjena atthi pu~n~na.m, atthi pu~n~nassa aagamo'''ti.
[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhante, ahudeva ka"nkhaa, ahu vicikicchaa -- `kosu naama imesa.m bhavata.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m sacca.m aaha, ko musaa'''ti?

[03] ``ala~nhi te, gaama.ni, ka"nkhitu.m, ala.m vicikicchitu.m. ka"nkhaniiye ca pana te .thaane vicikicchaa uppannaa''ti. ``eva.m pasannoha.m, bhante, bhagavati. pahoti me bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m yathaaha.m ima.m ka"nkhaadhamma.m pajaheyya''nti.

[03] ``atthi, gaama.ni, dhammasamaadhi. tatra ce tva.m cittasamaadhi.m pa.tilabheyyaasi. eva.m tva.m ima.m ka"nkhaadhamma.m pajaheyyaasi. katamo ca, gaama.ni, dhammasamaadhi? idha, gaama.ni, ariyasaavako paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato ^a^M2.0528^ea^ hoti, adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato ^a^T4.0430^ea^ hoti, kaamesumicchaacaara.m pahaaya kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato hoti, musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato ^a^P4.0351^ea^ hoti, pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti ^a^V2.0328^ea^, pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, abhijjha.m pahaaya anabhijjhaalu hoti, byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto hoti, micchaadi.t.thi.m pahaaya sammaadi.t.thiko hoti.

[03] ``sa kho so, gaama.ni, ariyasaavako eva.m vigataabhijjho vigatabyaapaado asammuu.lho sampajaano pa.tissato mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m, tathaa tatiya.m, tathaa catuttha.m, iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `yvaaya.m satthaa eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko, natthi paro loko, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa, sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii'ti. `sace tassa bhoto satthuno sacca.m vacana.m, apa.n.nakataaya mayha.m, yvaaha.m {yoha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} na ki~nci ^a^T4.0431^ea^ {ka~nci (?)} byaabaadhemi tasa.m vaa thaavara.m vaa? ubhayamettha {ubhayattha me (?) ma0 ni0 2.95 paa.liyaa sa.msandetabba.m} ka.taggaaho, ya.m camhi kaayena sa.mvuto vaacaaya sa.mvuto manasaa sa.mvuto, ya~nca kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjissaamii'ti {para.m mara.naa na upapajjissaamiiti (?)}. tassa paamojja.m jaayati. pamuditassa piiti jaayati. piitimanassa kaayo passambhati. passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedayati. sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m kho, gaama.ni, dhammasamaadhi ^a^P4.0352^ea^. tatra ce tva.m cittasamaadhi.m pa.tilabheyyaasi, eva.m tva.m ima.m ka"nkhaadhamma.m pajaheyyaasi.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo...pe0... katamo ca, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaana.m ^a^M2.0539^ea^ paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo...pe0... katamo ca, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati ^a^V2.0339^ea^ citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo...pe0... katamo ca, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa ^a^P4.0365^ea^ asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, asa"nkhatagaamimaggo...pe0....

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0455^ea^ ^a^M2.0544^ea^ ^a^V2.0345^ea^ ^a^P4.0374^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena khemaa bhikkhunii kosalesu caarika.m caramaanaa antaraa ca saavatthi.m antaraa ca saaketa.m tora.navatthusmi.m vaasa.m upagataa hoti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo saaketaa saavatthi.m gacchanto, antaraa ca saaketa.m antaraa ca saavatthi.m tora.navatthusmi.m ekarattivaasa.m upagacchi. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, tora.navatthusmi.m tathaaruupa.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa jaana yamaha.m ajja payirupaaseyya''nti.

[03] ``eva.m, devaa''ti kho so puriso ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa pa.tissutvaa kevalakappa.m tora.navatthu.m aahi.n.danto {anvaahi.n.danto (sii0)} naaddasa tathaaruupa.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa ya.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo payirupaaseyya. addasaa kho so puriso khema.m bhikkhuni.m tora.navatthusmi.m vaasa.m upagata.m. disvaana yena raajaa pasenadi kosalo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m pasenadi.m kosala.m etadavoca --

[03] ``natthi kho, deva, tora.navatthusmi.m tathaaruupo sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa ya.m devo payirupaaseyya. atthi ca kho, deva, khemaa naama bhikkhunii, tassa bhagavato saavikaa arahato sammaasambuddhassa. tassaa kho pana ayyaaya ^a^T4.0456^ea^ eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato ^a^P4.0375^ea^ -- `pa.n.ditaa, viyattaa medhaavinii bahussutaa cittakathaa kalyaa.napa.tibhaanaa'ti. ta.m devo payirupaasatuu''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V2.0346^ea^ kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo yena khemaa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa khema.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^M2.0545^ea^ nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo khema.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, ayye, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m panayye, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, ayye, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m panayye, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti. ``etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti.

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, ayye, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, iti pu.t.thaa samaanaa -- `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. `ki.m panayye, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.thaa samaanaa -- `etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, ayye, hoti ca ^a^T4.0457^ea^ na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.thaa samaanaa -- `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. `ki.m panayye, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.thaa samaanaa -- `etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. `ko nu kho ^a^P4.0376^ea^, ayye, hetu, ko paccayo yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa'''ti?

[03] ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, atthi te koci ga.nako vaa muddiko vaa sa"nkhaayako vaa yo pahoti ga"ngaaya vaaluka.m {vaalika.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} ga.netu.m -- ettakaa {ettikaa (sii0)} vaalukaa iti vaa, ettakaani vaalukasataani iti vaa, ettakaani vaalukasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani vaalukasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, ayye''. ``atthi pana te koci ga.nako vaa muddiko vaa sa"nkhaayako vaa yo pahoti mahaasamudde ^a^M2.0546^ea^ udaka.m ga.netu.m -- ettakaani udakaa.lhakaani iti vaa, ettakaani udakaa.lhakasataani ^a^V2.0347^ea^ iti vaa, ettakaani udakaa.lhakasahassaani iti vaa, ettakaani udakaa.lhakasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, ayye''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``mahaayye, samuddo gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yena ruupe tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano ^a^T4.0458^ea^ pa~n~naapeyya ta.m ruupa.m tathaagatassa pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava"nkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. ruupasa"nkhaayavimutto kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti.

[03] ``yaaya vedanaaya tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya, ^a^P4.0377^ea^ saa vedanaa tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. vedanaasa"nkhaayavimutto, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti.

[03] ``yaaya sa~n~naa tathaagata.m...pe0... yehi sa"nkhaarehi tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya, te sa"nkhaaraa tathaagatassa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava"nkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. sa"nkhaarasa"nkhaayavimutto kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti ^a^T4.0459^ea^, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti.

[03] ``yena vi~n~naa.ne tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatassa pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava"nkata.m aayati.m ^a^M2.0547^ea^ anuppaadadhamma.m. vi~n~naa.nasa"nkhaayavimutto kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upetii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo khemaaya bhikkhuniyaa ^a^V2.0348^ea^ bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa khema.m bhikkhuni.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo aparena samayena yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m ^a^P4.0378^ea^ kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, mayaa -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m mayaa -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti ^a^T4.0460^ea^? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, mayaa -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m mayaa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, mahaaraaja, mayaa -- hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi...pe0.... ```ki.m pana, bhante, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano -- ```etampi kho, mahaaraaja, abyaakata.m mayaa -- neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti?

[03] ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, ta~n~nevettha pa.tipucchissaami. yathaa te khameyya tathaa na.m byaakareyyaasi. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, atthi te koci ga.nako vaa muddiko vaa sa"nkhaayako vaa yo pahoti ga"ngaaya vaaluka.m ga.netu.m ^a^M2.0548^ea^ -- ettakaa vaalukaa iti vaa...pe0... ettakaani vaalukasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``atthi pana te koci ga.nako vaa muddiko vaa sa"nkhaayako vaa yo pahoti mahaasamudde udaka.m ga.netu.m -- ettakaani udakaa.lhakaani iti vaa...pe0... ettakaani udakaa.lhakasatasahassaani iti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m kissa hetu''? ``mahaa, bhante, samuddo gambhiiro ^a^T4.0461^ea^ appameyyo duppariyogaaho. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yena ruupena tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya, ta.m ruupa.m tathaagatassa pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava"nkata.m aayati.m ^a^P4.0379^ea^ anuppaadadhamma.m. ruupasa"nkhaayavimutto ^a^V2.0349^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti. yaaya vedanaaya...pe0... yaaya sa~n~naaya...pe0... yehi sa"nkhaarehi...pe0...''.

[03] ``yena vi~n~naa.nena tathaagata.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya, ta.m vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatassa pahiina.m ucchinnamuula.m taalaavatthukata.m anabhaava"nkata.m aayati.m anuppaadadhamma.m. vi~n~naa.nasa"nkhaayavimutto kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gambhiiro appameyyo duppariyogaaho -- seyyathaapi mahaasamuddo. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upeti, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipi na upetii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yatra hi naama satthu ceva {satthuno ceva (sii0)} saavikaaya ca atthena attho bya~njanena bya~njana.m sa.msandissati ^a^T4.0462^ea^, samessati, na virodhayissati {vihaayissati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0), vigaayissati (ka0)} yadida.m aggapadasmi.m. ekamidaaha.m, bhante, samaya.m khema.m bhikkhuni.m upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m apucchi.m. saapi me ayyaa etehi padehi etehi bya~njanehi etamattha.m byaakaasi, seyyathaapi bhagavaa. acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yatra hi naama satthu ceva saavikaaya ca atthena attho bya~njanena bya~njana.m sa.msandissati, samessati, na virodhayissati yadida.m aggapadasmi.m. handa daani maya.m, bhante, gacchaama. bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassa daani tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho raajaa pasenadi kosalo bhagavato ^a^M2.0549^ea^ bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa ^a^P4.0380^ea^ anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaamiiti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vesaaliya.m viharati mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa anuraadho bhagavato aviduure ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharati. atha kho sambahulaa a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa yenaayasmaa anuraadho tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa anuraadhena saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu ^a^V2.0350^ea^. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa aayasmanta.m anuraadha.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, aavuso anuraadha, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato imesu catuusu .thaanesu pa~n~naapayamaano ^a^T4.0463^ea^ pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? ``yo so, aavuso, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato a~n~natra imehi catuuhi .thaanehi pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa''ti. eva.m vutte, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa aayasmanta.m anuraadha.m etadavocu.m -- ``so caaya.m {yo caaya.m (sii0)} bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vaa pana baalo abyatto''ti. atha kho te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa aayasmanta.m anuraadha.m navavaadena ca baalavaadena ca apasaadetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu.

[03] atha ^a^P4.0381^ea^ kho aayasmato anuraadhassa acirapakkantesu a~n~natitthiyesu paribbaajakesu etadahosi -- ``sace kho ma.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa uttari.m puccheyyu.m, katha.m byaakaramaano nu khvaaha.m tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato assa.m, na ^a^M2.0550^ea^ ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya.m, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya.m, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti? atha ^a^T4.0464^ea^ kho aayasmaa anuraadho yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa anuraadho bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``idhaaha.m, bhante, bhagavato aviduure ara~n~naku.tikaaya.m viharaami. atha kho, bhante, sambahulaa a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa mayaa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ma.m etadavocu.m -- ``yo so, aavuso anuraadha, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato imesu catuusu .thaanesu pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? eva.m vuttaaha.m, bhante, te a~n~natitthiye paribbaajake etadavoca.m -- ``yo so, aavuso ^a^V2.0351^ea^, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato a~n~natra imehi catuuhi .thaanehi pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti. eva.m vutte, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa ma.m etadavocu.m -- ``so caaya.m bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito thero vaa pana baalo abyatto''ti. atha kho ma.m, bhante, te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa navavaadena ca baalavaadena ca ^a^T4.0465^ea^ apasaadetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkami.msu. tassa mayha.m, bhante, acirapakkantesu tesu a~n~natitthiyesu ^a^P4.0382^ea^ paribbaajakesu etadahosi -- ``sace kho ma.m te a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa uttari.m puccheyyu.m, katha.m byaakaramaano nu khvaaha.m tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato assa.m, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkheyya.m, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakareyya.m, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagaccheyyaa''ti?

[03] ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, anuraadha, ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na ^a^T4.0466^ea^ meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. yaa kaaci vedanaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa...pe0... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na ^a^P4.0383^ea^ meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. eva.m passa.m, anuraadha, sutavaa ariyasaavako ruupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanaayapi nibbindati, sa~n~naayapi nibbindati, sa"nkhaaresupi nibbindati, vi~n~naa.nasmimpi nibbindati. nibbinda.m virajjati; viraagaa vimuccati; vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. `khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa'ti pajaanaati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupa.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedana.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``sa~n~na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``sa"nkhaare tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupasmi.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``a~n~natra ruupaa tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``vedanaaya...pe0... a~n~natra vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya...pe0... ^a^T4.0467^ea^ a~n~natra sa~n~naaya...pe0... sa"nkhaaresu...pe0... a~n~natra sa"nkhaarehi...pe0... vi~n~naa.nasmi.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``a~n~natra vi~n~naa.naa tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V2.0353^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, ruupa.m, vedana.m, sa~n~na.m, sa"nkhaare, vi~n~naa.na.m tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no ^a^P4.0384^ea^ heta.m, bhante''. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, anuraadha, aya.m so aruupii avedano asa~n~nii asa"nkhaaro avi~n~naa.no tathaagatoti samanupassasii''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``ettha ca te, anuraadha, di.t.theva ^a^M2.0552^ea^ dhamme saccato thetato tathaagate anupalabbhiyamaane {tathaagato anupalabbhiyamaano (syaa0 ka0), tathaagate anupalabbhamaane (?)} kalla.m nu te ta.m veyyaakara.na.m {veyyaakara.naaya (sii0)} -- yo so, aavuso, tathaagato uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto, ta.m tathaagato a~n~natra imehi catuuhi .thaanehi pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeti -- ```hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vaa''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``saadhu saadhu, anuraadha! pubbe caaha.m, anuraadha, etarahi ca dukkha~nceva pa~n~naapemi dukkhassa ca nirodha''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto, aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko ^a^T4.0468^ea^ saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m panaavuso, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi ^a^P4.0385^ea^ kho, aavuso, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m panaavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, aavuso, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti.

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, aavuso, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano, `abyaakata.m ^a^V2.0354^ea^ kho eta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa -- hoti tathaagato ^a^M2.0553^ea^ para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi...pe0... `ki.m panaavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `etampi kho, aavuso, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. ko nu kho, aavuso, hetu, ko paccayo yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti?

[03] ``hoti ^a^T4.0469^ea^ tathaagato para.m mara.naati kho, aavuso, ruupagatameta.m. na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, ruupagatameta.m. hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, ruupagatameta.m. neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, ruupagatameta.m. hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati kho, aavuso, vedanaagatameta.m. na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, vedanaagatameta.m. hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, vedanaagatameta.m. neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, vedanaagatameta.m. hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati kho, aavuso, sa~n~naagatameta.m. na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, sa~n~naagatameta.m. hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, sa~n~naagatameta.m. neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, sa~n~naagatameta.m. hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati kho, aavuso, sa"nkhaaragatameta.m ^a^P4.0386^ea^. na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, sa"nkhaaragatameta.m. hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, sa"nkhaaragatameta.m. neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, sa"nkhaaragatameta.m. hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati kho, aavuso, vi~n~naa.nagatameta.m. na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, vi~n~naa.nagatameta.m. hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, vi~n~naa.nagatameta.m. neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati, vi~n~naa.nagatameta.m. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T4.0470^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto, aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye...pe0... (saayeva ^a^M2.0554^ea^ pucchaa) ``ko nu kho, aavuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``ruupa.m kho, aavuso, ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, ruupasamudaya.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, ruupanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m ^a^V2.0355^ea^, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m...pe0... sa"nkhaare...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `na hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^P4.0387^ea^ mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''tipissa hoti.

[03] ``ruupa~nca kho, aavuso, jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, ruupasamudaya.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, ruupanirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, ruupanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^T4.0471^ea^ mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. vedana.m...pe0... sa~n~na.m...pe0... sa"nkhaare...pe0... vi~n~naa.na.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, vi~n~naa.nasamudaya.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, vi~n~naa.nanirodhagaamini.m pa.tipada.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti; `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu aya.m paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M2.0555^ea^ samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto, aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye...pe0... (saayeva pucchaa) ``ko nu kho, aavuso, hetu ko paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``ruupe kho, aavuso, avigataraagassa avigatacchandassa ^a^V2.0356^ea^ avigatapemassa avigatapipaasassa avigatapari.laahassa avigatata.nhassa `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya...pe0... sa"nkhaaresu...pe0... vi~n~naa.ne avigataraagassa avigatacchandassa avigatapemassa avigatapipaasassa avigatapari.laahassa avigatata.nhassa `hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^T4.0472^ea^ mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... `neva ^a^P4.0388^ea^ hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. ruupe ca kho, aavuso, vigataraagassa...pe0... vedanaaya...pe0... sa~n~naaya...pe0... sa"nkhaaresu...pe0... vi~n~naa.ne vigataraagassa vigatacchandassa vigatapemassa vigatapipaasassa vigatapari.laahassa vigatata.nhassa `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu, aya.m paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 415^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa ca saariputto, aayasmaa ca mahaako.t.thiko baaraa.nasiya.m viharanti isipatane migadaaye. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yenaayasmaa mahaako.t.thiko tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaako.t.thikena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto aayasmanta.m mahaako.t.thika.m etadavoca -- ```ki.m nu kho, aavuso ko.t.thika, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti...pe0... `ki.m panaavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `etampi kho, aavuso, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato ^a^M2.0556^ea^ para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi''. ``ko nu kho, aavuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti?

[03] ``ruupaaraamassa ^a^T4.0473^ea^ kho, aavuso, ruuparatassa ruupasammuditassa ruupanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato ^a^P4.0389^ea^ para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti; `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. vedanaaraamassa kho, aavuso, vedanaaratassa vedanaasammuditassa, vedanaanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^V2.0357^ea^ mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... sa~n~naaraamassa kho, aavuso...pe0... sa"nkhaaraaraamassa kho aavuso...pe0... vi~n~naa.naaraamassa kho, aavuso, vi~n~naa.naratassa vi~n~naa.nasammuditassa vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti''.

[03] ``na ruupaaraamassa kho, aavuso, na ruuparatassa na ruupasammuditassa, ruupanirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. na vedanaaraamassa kho, aavuso...pe0... na sa~n~naaraamassa kho, aavuso...pe0... na sa"nkhaaraaraamassa kho, aavuso...pe0... na vi~n~naa.naaraamassa kho, aavuso, na vi~n~naa.naratassa na vi~n~naa.nasammuditassa, vi~n~naa.nanirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0... ^a^T4.0474^ea^ `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. aya.m kho, aavuso, hetu, aya.m paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa panaavuso, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``siyaa, aavuso. bhavaaraamassa kho, aavuso, bhavaratassa bhavasammuditassa, bhavanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. na ^a^M2.0557^ea^ bhavaaraamassa ^a^P4.0390^ea^ kho, aavuso, na bhavaratassa na bhavasammuditassa, bhavanirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. ayampi kho, aavuso, pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa panaavuso, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``siyaa, aavuso. upaadaanaaraamassa kho, aavuso, upaadaanaratassa upaadaanasammuditassa, upaadaananirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. na upaadaanaaraamassa kho, aavuso, na upaadaanaratassa na upaadaanasammuditassa, upaadaananirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti ^a^T4.0475^ea^ tathaagato ^a^V2.0358^ea^ para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0... `neva, hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. ayampi kho aavuso, pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa panaavuso, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``siyaa, aavuso. ta.nhaaraamassa kho, aavuso, ta.nhaaratassa ta.nhaasammuditassa, ta.nhaanirodha.m ajaanato apassato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti...pe0... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa hoti. na ta.nhaaraamassa kho, aavuso, na ta.nhaaratassa na ta.nhaasammuditassa, ta.nhaanirodha.m jaanato passato yathaabhuuta.m, `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti...pe0 ^a^P4.0391^ea^... `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'tipissa na hoti. ayampi kho, aavuso, pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa panaavuso, a~n~nopi pariyaayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m bhagavataa''ti? ``ettha daani, aavuso saariputta, ito uttari ki.m icchasi? ta.nhaasa"nkhayavimuttassa, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhuno va.t.ta.m {vatta.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0) vaddha.m (pii0)} natthi pa~n~naapanaayaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M2.0558^ea^ kho vacchagotto paribbaajako yenaayasmaa mahaamoggallaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa mahaamoggallaanena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbaajako aayasmanta.m ^a^T4.0476^ea^ mahaamoggallaana.m etadavoca --

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho moggallaana, sassato loko''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `sassato loko'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bho moggallaana, asassato loko''ti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `asassato loko'''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, bho moggallaana, antavaa loko''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `antavaa loko'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bho moggallaana, anantavaa loko''ti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `anantavaa loko'''ti. ``ki.m ^a^P4.0392^ea^ nu kho, bho moggallaana, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m ^a^V2.0359^ea^ sariira''nti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'''nti. ``ki.m pana, bho moggallaana, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira''nti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'''nti. ``ki.m nu kho, bho moggallaana, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bho moggallaana, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, bho moggallaana, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bho moggallaana, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti.

[03] ``ko ^a^T4.0477^ea^ nu kho, bho moggallaana, hetu ko paccayo, yena a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m eva.m pu.t.thaana.m eva.m veyyaakara.na.m hoti -- sassato lokoti vaa, asassato lokoti vaa, antavaa lokoti vaa, anantavaa lokoti vaa, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariiranti vaa, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariiranti vaa, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, na hoti tathaagato para.m ^a^M2.0559^ea^ mara.naati vaa, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa? ko ^a^P4.0393^ea^ pana, bho moggallaana, hetu ko paccayo, yena sama.nassa gotamassa eva.m pu.t.thassa na eva.m veyyaakara.na.m hoti -- sassato lokotipi, asassato lokotipi, antavaa lokotipi, anantavaa lokotipi, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariirantipi, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariirantipi, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naatipi, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naatipi, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naatipi, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naatipii''ti?

(ka0)}. navama.m.

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T4.0486^ea^ kho vacchagotto paribbaajako yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, bho gotama, atthattaa''ti? eva.m vutte, bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. ``ki.m pana, bho gotama, natthattaa''ti? dutiyampi kho bhagavaa tu.nhii ahosi. atha kho vacchagotto paribbaajako u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando acirapakkante vacchagotte paribbaajake bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, bhagavaa vacchagottassa paribbaajakassa pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakaasii''ti? ``aha~ncaananda, vacchagottassa paribbaajakassa `atthattaa'ti pu.t.tho samaano `atthattaa'ti byaakareyya.m, ye te, aananda, sama.nabraahma.naa sassatavaadaa tesameta.m saddhi.m {tesameta.m laddhi (sii0)} abhavissa. aha~ncaananda, vacchagottassa paribbaajakassa `natthattaa'ti pu.t.tho samaano `natthattaa'ti byaakareyya.m, ye te, aananda, sama.nabraahma.naa ^a^P4.0401^ea^ ucchedavaadaa tesameta.m saddhi.m abhavissa. aha~ncaananda, vacchagottassa paribbaajakassa `atthattaa'ti pu.t.tho samaano `atthattaa'ti byaakareyya.m, api ^a^V2.0366^ea^ nu me ta.m, aananda, anuloma.m abhavissa ~naa.nassa uppaadaaya -- `sabbe dhammaa anattaa'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''. ``aha~ncaananda, vacchagottassa paribbaajakassa ^a^M2.0566^ea^ `natthattaa'ti pu.t.tho samaano `natthattaa'ti byaakareyya.m ^a^T4.0487^ea^, sammuu.lhassa, aananda, vacchagottassa paribbaajakassa bhiyyo sammohaaya abhavissa -- `ahuvaa me nuuna pubbe attaa, so etarahi natthii'''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa sabhiyo kaccaano ~naatike viharati gi~njakaavasathe. atha kho vacchagotto paribbaajako yenaayasmaa sabhiyo kaccaano tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa sabhiyena kaccaanena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbaajako aayasmanta.m sabhiya.m kaccaana.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho bho, kaccaana, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m pana, bho kaccaana, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bho kaccaana, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti. ``ki.m ^a^P4.0402^ea^ pana, bho kaccaana, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa''ti? ``etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'''ti.

[03] ```ki.m nu kho, bho kaccaana, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi ^a^T4.0488^ea^. `ki.m pana, bho kaccaana, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha, bhagavataa -- na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. `ki.m nu kho, bho kaccaana, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `abyaakata.m kho eta.m, vaccha ^a^V2.0367^ea^, bhagavataa -- hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. `ki.m pana, bho kaccaana, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `etampi kho, vaccha, abyaakata.m bhagavataa -- neva hoti na ^a^M2.0567^ea^ na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti vadesi. ko nu kho, bho kaccaana, hetu, ko paccayo, yeneta.m abyaakata.m sama.nena gotamenaa''ti? ``yo ca, vaccha, hetu, yo ca paccayo pa~n~naapanaaya ruupiiti vaa aruupiiti vaa sa~n~niiti vaa asa~n~niiti vaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niiti vaa, so ca hetu, so ca paccayo sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m aparisesa.m nirujjheyya. kena na.m pa~n~naapayamaano pa~n~naapeyya ruupiiti vaa aruupiiti vaa sa~n~niiti vaa asa~n~niiti vaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niiti vaa''ti. ``kiivacira.m pabbajitosi, bho kaccaanaa''ti? ``nacira.m, aavuso, tii.ni vassaanii''ti. ``yassapa'ssa, aavuso, etamettakena ettakameva ta.mpa'ssa bahu, ko pana vaado eva.m {ko pana vaado eva (sii0 pii0)} abhikkante''ti! ekaadasama.m.
